panguni uttirattil tEr Eri viLaiyADum shankaranE umaiyAL panginanE rAjA
engum niraindavanE EkAntam AnavanE tangattin mEniyanE tArakanE shrI rAjA

pAyirampaNNODu pADalilE magizhndu kOyililE vAzhum shrImAnE durairAjA

name: kandaa vandaruL
other_info: The change that Abheri has gone through in the past two or three centuries is fairly widely known and documented. i.e how some popular vidwan sang it with a D2 instead of D1 and unfortunately it became permanently changed. However this song is still sung with D1, as composed originally by Papanasam Shivan. The same change also needs to be done for

that is also sung always with D1 . In both the cases, the rAgam is still Abheri but it is the old/ original Abheri with a D1. For all the other songs in Abheri rAgam, the D2 is still probably correct because that is what they are sung in, in line with current times. For nagumOmu, it is a moot point because almost everybody sings it with D2 but there are a few like Vedavalli who sing it with D1. I believe that the claim there is that Tyagaraja also composed it with a D1. - from Cuddalore S. Kumar

name: nagumOmu ganalEni
lyrics: nagumOmu ganalEni nAjAli telisi nanu brOvaga rAdA shrI raghuvara nI
nagarAjadhara nIdu paraivAra lella ogibOdhana jEsE vAralu gArE yiTu luNDudure
khagarAju nI yAnati vini vEga canalEdO gaganAni kilaku bahu dUrambaninAdO
jagamEle paramAtma evaritO moraliDudu vaga jUpaku tALanu nannElukOra tyAgarAjanuta nI
meaning: O RAma! Supreme among Raghus! Missing your charming smile-lit face, I languish here. Knowing my mental plight, can't you come and protect me? O One who holds the GOvardhana Hill! Members of your retinue who have the duty of reminding you of your daily engagements cannot fail in their duty. Does not Garuda execute your commands expeditiously? Could he have excused himself saying that he was staying far from the earth in VaikuNTha, your heavenly above? Exalted Lord! Ruler of the Universe! To whom else can I appeal? Please do not disregard me, I can't bear it. Take me into your fold.
More meaning available
here
at Shivkumar Kalyanaraman's Krithi Archive.
other_info: Lyrics contributed by Lakshman Ragde. Meaning from Compositions of Tyagaraja by T.K. Govinda Rao.

name: nanda gopala mArada Ana vilOlananda gopala mArada Ana vilOla

ramaNIya vadana rAsa vilAsa jaya madana vadana

gAnadharaNa nIla suguNa karuNAla gambhIra muralInAda catura

guruvAyupuri vaLar tiru emmAn guruvAit-tandai tAyAi deivamAi namakkaruL

name: veeNaabhEriveeNa abhEri
lyrics: veeNaabhEri vENuvaadyaadi vinOdini mOdini raksha maam
meaning: Oh Mother! Who is delighted with the music of instruments like veeNaa,
bhEri, and vENu. Please protect me.
Who is praised by celestials like GhONeevadanaa - vaaraahi, etc. for her
worshipful conduct. She transcends three guNas - satva, rajas, and tamas
and is revered by Brahma and Guruguha. Her eyes are like those of the dove
and She absolves sins. She is the sister of the lord of Lakshmi and has a
slender waist.
other_info: The change that Abheri has gone through in the past two or three centuries is fairly widely known and documented. i.e how some popular vidwan sang it with a D2 instead of D1 and unfortunately it became permanently changed. However this song is still sung with D1, as composed originally by Dikshitar. The same change also needs to be done for

that is also sung always with D1 . In both the cases, the rAgam is still Abheri but it is the old/ original Abheri with a D1. For all the other songs in Abheri rAgam, the D2 is still probably correct because that is what they are sung in, in line with current times. For nagumOmu, it is a moot point because almost everybody sings it with D2 but there are a few like Vedavalli who sing it with D1. I believe that the claim there is that Tyagaraja also composed it with a D1. - from Cuddalore S. Kumar

Urunnai vaidAlum yAr sati sheidAlum urudiyAi irundu nI uLLanbu sheiguvAi
sUriya jyOtiyai sUrai aNaikkumO sutantara yOgiyait-tollaigaL vaLaikkumO

avaniyil varutunbam anaittaiyum kLaivAi aDi malar paNindana Ananda mUrtiyE

name: jaya naaraayaNajaya naarayaNa
lyrics: jaya nArAyaNa jaya shrI ramaNAjaya jaya ArdhraNa parAyaNA
jaya gaja rakSakA jaya madhu shikSakAjaya raghunAyakA jaya sukhadAyakA
shiva nAmOSTOttara shata kIrtana divya rasanAdhAra varamAna
bhavabhaya hara harE pArvati sOdara ava mAdhava shrI harikEsha mitra

name: karuNatOnu nannu brOvakaruNatOnu nannu brOva
lyrics: karuNatOnu nannu brOva taruNamidE svAmi paramahamsa shrI gurO nIpAda padma golicitini
erugi laukika jIvitamu vyathita manEvika cuTAgi nigama gUDala nerUngaviccu nirata jIviyaina nIvu
dayAsindhu nIku sari samAna vErevarulErani cidAnanda mIvari nIvani nammitini
sadA parabrahma dhyAnamosagumani vEDitini sadAshiva brahmaguru krpa salupumu

name: maamava vidyaadhiraajamamava vidyadiraja
lyrics: mAmava vidhyAdirAja bhaTTaraka mAyAmaya janimOha vidAraka

nitya dayAmaya bhakta janAbhaya nishcala tatva nirata nirAmaya
satya dharmAlaya satva guNAshraya saccinmaya vana tulasI shubhOdaya

name: madilOnE ninnu dalacimadilOnE ninnu dalaci
lyrics: madilOnE ninnu dalaci karagitini dayajEsi rAvE
gati nIvE nannu brOva tAmasamu sEyakavE shAradE

name: mahAshaya hrdaya gOpa nandanamahAshaya hrdaya gOpa nandana
lyrics: mahAshaya hrdaya gOpa nandana matIya praNayAnanda gItEna
1:  madhukara campaka vana vihAra manamOhana madhusUdana nava bhUSaNa
2:  madhukara campaka vana vihAra nava pallava padacara madana gambhIra
3:  madhukara campaka vana vihAra gOvardhana tara bhujaga nartana caraNa
vihAya viSayA viSayAdi kAma vEda dhurantara vinuta nirantara
vikasita pankaja mukhavara gandhita vilasita bambara yuga nayanA
vijita kara mura nara baka shakaTa muSTika cANUra mardana vara gamana
nAda muraLi gAna madhupa gIta bhramara carA madhukarA carita
niranjana su-dhrta naTana nIlabAla gOpa vESa nirupamakara
sAnanda mauLi vinuta suranutA surama tApahara kara
pItAmbaradhara nIlAnga taraLamaNi rjita virAjita sarOruhaja vinutavara

name: mana dAhattaimana dAhattai
lyrics: mana dAhattai mATri aruLvAi vAnamudat-tEnaiyAn arundat-tandE
ghanamAna mAyak-kAnalai virumbEn kATSiyAga ninadu karuNai vENDuginrEn
sattiya jnAnamum sAdhu sngamum cancalam illAda nenjagat-teLivum
shuddha sanmArgattin siddhiyum muttiyum turiya vaLa nATTin ariya vAzhvum Inden

name: manakkurangumanakkurangu
lyrics: manakkuran-gaDangAviDil kiDaiyAdE mana ninaikkum eduvum kaiyaDaiyAdE
manana bhakthi jnAna vairAgyamuDan mAdhavamum sAdhanangaLum duSTa
aDi mudal vENDumenr-Avalum vENDum aDaiya vidAda muyarciyum vENDum
paDiRil UkkamuDan Ekkamum vENDum payanrara aran aruLum vENDum edarkkum

name: manasaarakanE nammakamanasaaraganE namaka
lyrics: manasArakanE nammaka lEdA mA talli nIkE teliya gAdA
sanakAdi sakala dEva vandita kanakAngi kamanIya guNanidhi
dhana dhAnya dAra sukhamulu svappana nATakamadi bAga telisi
vanajAkSi nI pada yugamulu geTTiga ananya cittamutO AsacE prTTaga

name: manasAvrtAmanasAvrtA
lyrics: manasAra sAkSuni krpalEka mana sAmarthya mEmi yunnadi
mana sAhasa yuddamu jEyananta mana sAdhyamulEdani pANDavulu
(or) mana sAhasa yuddamu jEsinadaTa tana sAdhyamu lEka pANDavulu)
manasAra venkaTEsha caraNa mana sArathiyai vacci brOvalEdA

name: manasu nilpamanasu nilpa
lyrics: manasu nilpa shakti lEka pOtE madhura ghaNTa vIrula pUja Emi jEyunu
ghana durmaduDai tA munigitE kAvERi mandAkiNi eTubrOcunu
kAma krOdhuDu tapambOnarcitE gAci rakSincunO tyAgarAjanuta
meaning: If one is not capable of controlling his mind, of what avail will be his showy worship with flowers and dulcet bells? How can a bath in the holy river KAveri or GaNga purify one, if he is puffed up with haughtiness and self-conceit? If the wife of a SOmayAji indulges in illicit love, will his SOmayAga befit him to the Heavenly abode? No amount of austerity can confer spiritual merit on a man if he is given to lust and anger. Please enlighten me, Lord!
other_info: Lyrics contributed by Lakshman Ragde. Meaning from Compositions of Tyagaraja by T.K. Govinda Rao.

lyrics: mAnE avara tAnE varavaghai irukkudu shonnEn vArAda kAraNam ArAyappOi vanda

agaNita munigaNa ghOSaNa hari hari nAma sudhAsayutE
hari hari mAdhava madhusUdana jaya anagha dundubi bhAgyapatE

hari hari mAdhava madhusUdana jaya anagha dundubi bhAgyapatE
ramya sugandha madhukara madugamata rAgamapAda ma pA dha pa  mA

hari hari mAdhava madhusUDana jaya anagha dundubi bhAgyapatE

name: manujuDai puTTimanjuDai puTTi
lyrics: manujuDai puTTi manujuni sEvinci anudinamunu dukkhamantanEla
juTTeDu kaDupukai joranicoDu cocci paTTEDu kUDigai pati mAli
puTTina cOtikE porali manasu viTTi vaTTi lampaTamu vadala neraDu gAna
andarilO puTTi andarilO jEri andari rUpamulaDudAnai
antamaina shRi venkaTAdrisu sEvinci antarAni padamu andenu aDugAna

name: murugan iNaiyaDimurugan iNaiyaDi
lyrics: karuNaik-kunranaiya kATSi onru tarum tirupparam kunram tannil tigazhginra
mAya valaiyil mATTi mati mayakkam UTTi pEi enap-piDittATTum tIya vinaiyai OTTi
tAi enap-parivuDan dayai peridum kATTi tUya neriyil nI ini nirkkat-tiran kUTTa

name: nannu brOvananu brOva
lyrics: nannu brOva nIkinta tAmasamA nApai nEramEmi balkumA
cinnanADe nI celimi galga kOri cintimpa lEdA shrI rAma
nijadAsa varulagu tammulatO nIvu bAga buTTagalEdA
gaja rAja rakSaka tanayulanu kani pencalEdA tyAgarAjanuta
meaning: Why this inexplicable and unreasonable delay in offering me protection? If it is because of any serious lapse of mine, please let me know. Right from my childhood, have I not, of my own accord, chosen you as my God and longed to worship you and be with you? O RAma! In your incarnation as RAma in particular, have you not shown affectionate concern for your brothers, who are your devotees? O Protector of GajEndra, did you not find your sons and bring them up?
other_info: Lyrics contributed by Lakshman Ragde. Meaning from Compositions of Tyagaraja by T.K. Govinda Rao.

name: neelakaNTha niranjananeelakaNTa niranjana
lyrics: halAhala viSa pAnamu amrtamugA jEsitivi guNAnubhava tyAgarAju sEvincina

name: nekkurugee
lyrics: pallavi: Nekku- Considerable, deep, devout, urugi- melting, unnai- to you, panindhAkkal- bowing, do the bowing,nenjam- heart, enakku- to me, aruLvAi- (gracefully) give
Please give a heart that would devoutly melt while bowing to you.
anupallavi: Dhikku- way, direction, veu- other, illai- not, dheena- meek, helpless, Sharanya- Refuge, feet, devar- god(s), munivar �sage, paNi- bowing
I have no other way oh, refuge of the meek.
Oh SubhramaNya, one who is worhsipped by the Gods and sages

caraNam: Mu (moonru)- three, kaN- eye, Indra- lord, magan- son, shanmukhan- six faced, mAyOn �Illusory one (Krishna), marumagan- Nephew, son-in-law, singara- beautiful, vel- spear, guhan- Skandan, secret one, maNavAlan �husband, unnai �to you
Oh, son of the three-eyed (Hiva) and Lord of Um
Oh, one with 6 faces. Oh, nephew of the illusory one (Krishna)
Oh, Singara Velan (A beautiful figure holding a spear) of Sikkil, oh, Skanda
Oh, husband of Valli and Devayani ,
With you in my thoughts, (give me a heart)

name: nIkeppuDu daya vaccunOnIkeppuDu daya vaccunO
lyrics: nIkeppuDu daya vaccunO yaninE gAciyunnAnu rAma
sAkEta vAsa mandahAsa sakala jagannivAsa nannu brOva
samayamu jUci delpu vArevarO jalajAsananuta janakajA nAtha
vimala hrdaya O sadAshivanuta suma shara janaka sArvabhauma rAma
meaning: Lord Rama! I am waiting for your kindness to shower on me sAkEta vAsa - mandahAsa
Oh Rama! You live in sAkEtapura (ayOdhya), You are the one who created this world. When would You come to protect me.

Who is going to tell You that it is about time? You are the one who is worshipped by Brahma and Shiva. You are Sita`s consort. You have the purest heart. You are the father of Manmatha and You are the Emperor.
Meaning:

name: ninnu namminaanuninnu namminaanu
lyrics: kannatalli nIvu gAdA karuNa cEsi nannu kAva vEgamu rAvE kamala lOcani ambA
shankarI shAmbhavI gaurI duSTha caNDamuNDAsura vairi mangaLadAyini
mAni harikEshapuri rANi sankaTamu tIrcci brOvu sakala lOka pAlini

name: orutaram muruganaiorutaram muruganai
lyrics: orutaram muruganai ninaippavarkk-iru vinai arum enruNarvAi manamE dinamum
tiruttaNigai padiyil viruppamuDan amarnda guruparan tiruvaDi pOTrip-paNindu anbAi
bhavappiNi nIngavum pAvangaL tIravum avavinai ozhiyavum Anandam Ongavum
shivan manam magizha Or mozhiyurai seidavanai tavap-payanAi vandu taNigaiyil ninravanai
dEvargaL munivargaL tEDiyum nANAda pAda malar sivakka bhaktar manam uvakka
AvaluDan vandu Arupadi amarnda nAthanai paNittanbAi gItat-tiruppugazhAl

name: paayum oLipAyum oLi
lyrics: pAyum oLi nI enakku pArkkum vizhi nAn unakku tOyum madu nI enakku tumbiyaDi nAnunakku
vAyuraikka varugudillai vAzhi ninran mEnmaiyellAm tUya shuDar vAnoLiyE shUraiyamudE kaNNammA
vINaiyaDi nI enakku mEvum viral nAnunakku pUNum vaDam nI enakku pudu vayiram nAnunakku
kANumindOru ninran kaNNin oLi vIshudaDi mANuDaiya pErarashE vAzhvu nilaiyE kaNNammA
vAna mazhai nI enakku vaNNa mayil nAnunakku pAnamaDi nI enakku bhANDamaDi nAnunakku
jnAna oLI vIshudaDi nangai ninran jyOti mukham Unamaru nallazhagE Uru shuvaiyE kaNNammA
veNNIlavu nI enakku mEvu kaDal nAnunakku paNNU gati nI enakku pATTinimai nAnunakku
eNNi eNNI pArtiDilOr eNNamilai nin shuvaikkE kaNNin maNi pOnravaLE kaTTi amudE kaNNammA
vIshu kamazh nI enakku viriyu malar nAnunakku pEshu poruL nI enakku pENu mozhi nAnunakku
nEshamuLLa vAn shuDarE ninnazhagai EduraippEn Ashai madhuvE kaniyE aLLu shuvaiyE kaNNammA
kAdalaDi nI enakku kAntamaDi nAnunakku vEdamaDi nI enakku viddaiyaDi nAnunakku
bOdhamuTra pOdinilE pongi varum tIn-shuvaiyE nAda vaDivAnavaLE nalla uyirE kaNNammA
nalla uyir nI enakku nADiyaDi nAnunakku shelvamaDi nI enakku kSEma nidhi nAnunakku
ellaiyaTra pErazhagE engum nirai pork-kaDarE mullai nigar punnakaiyAi pOdum inbamE kaNNammA
tAraiyaDi nI enakku taNmatiyam nAnunakku vIramaDi nI enakku veTriyaDi nAnunakku
dAraNiyil vAnulagil shArndirukkum inbamellAm oruvarumAi samaindAi uLLamudE kaNNammA

name: peralAm pErinbam uralAmperalAm pErinbam uralAm
lyrics: peralAm pErinbam uralAm manamE nI marudagiri murugan tozhuvadAl
oru kaNa nAram avan tirunAmattai dinam karudik-karuttazhiya uruginAl urudiyAi
mati vadanam tigazhum atishayamighu azhagum idazhinil tavazhum iniya punmuruvalum
ati vIra gambhIra Ananda svarUpamum idayamadil padiya nidam avanai ninaindAl

name: pEyavaL kaaNpEy avaL kAN
lyrics: pEyavaL kAN engaL annai perum pittuDaiyAL engaL annai
kAyazhal Endiya pittan tanaik-kAdalippAL engal annai
innishaiyAm inbakkaDalil ezhundu Etrum alaittiraL veLLam
tEnshori mAmalar shUDi maduttEkku naDippAL em annai
Odarum shAttiram kOTi uNarndOdi ulagengum vidaippAL
bhAratap-pOrenil eLidO virarp-pArthan kai villiDai oLirvAL
mAradar kOTi vandAlum kaNam vAittuk-kurudiyil tiLalippAL

name: rAmA nI padamurAmA nI padamu
lyrics: rAmA nI padamu paTTinavAralu dhanyulu shrI
dhyAnamutO nija gnAnamutO nAdamutO bhajana gAnamutO
jAli dalaci guNa varuDani pilaci pAlinci brotuvani vEDinavArilO

name: sabaa patikku
lyrics: kripAnidhi ivaraippOla kiDaikkumO inda daraNi tanilE
oru daram siva cidambaran enDru uraittAl pOdumE
Ariyar pulavar mUvar pAdam aDaindAr enDrE purANam
arindu solla kETTOm gOpAlakrishnan pAdum tillai
pallavi: Can there be another god like the SabApati of Cidambaram?
anupallavi: Can we get another merciful one like him on this earth?

caraNam: just once, calling on Siva of Cidambaram, is enough. do you have to do any other penance for ages? All the sages attained his feet, say the scriptures. Let us understand and listen to what Gopalakrishan sings.
meaning: pallavi: Can there be another god like the SabApati of Cidambaram?
anupallavi: Can we get another merciful one like him on this earth?

caraNam: just once, calling on Siva of Cidambaram, is enough. do you have to do any other penance for ages? All the sages attained his feet, say the scriptures. Let us understand and listen to what Gopalakrishan sings.
notation: at Shivkumar Kalyanaraman's Krithi Archive. Also, listen to the music class
other_info: There is a story associated with this song. Gopaalakrishna
Bhaarati was visiting Tyaagaraaja, when Tyaagaraaja asked
him if he had ever composed in aabhogi. In response to that query, Gopalakrishna Bharathi is said to have sung this krithi.

name: sadA smarAmisadA smarAmi
lyrics: vidhi hara pUjita padAmbujam vimalam jAnakI vallabham svanibham
sarasijAkSi mOhita mukha kamalam nArada janakasthita nAbhIkamalam
kara dUSaNa bhanjana kara kamalam marutAnjana suta vandita pada kamalam

name: sammatamA solvAisammatamA solvAi
lyrics: sammatamA solvAi unakkE nIyE inmaiyum arumaiyum unnaiyE vENDum enakku
inniyum nimmadi illA nilai enadE ninniDum manamoDu kAttirukkum enakku
vambum vazhakkum tunbamum tollaiyum EnpAl kaDandiDum vazhigaLumE koNDavar
rambaiyArAyinum avar vENDEn nimmadi tarum nal manamuDaiyavaLE nI

name: shree lakshmee varaaham
lyrics: shree lakshmi sahitham sruta jana subhapradam
punkava budha jana natam veda nutam
notation: at Shivkumar Kalyanaraman's Krithi Archive. Also, listen to the music class

name: shree mahaagaNapatE
lyrics: Hema maani Vibhushana | Komala Nalini charana ||

name: shree raajagOpaala (padavarNam)srI raajagOpala (pada varNam)
lyrics: sArasa sadrsha pada munijana hrdayArNava himakarAgadhara
sAra viSadhara phaNa krta naTana catura rajarAkSa rAghahara
dhAtru janaka budhArtti hara vibutArcita vasudhA varanuta
dasharatha suta dashamukha jita shatamaganuta sucarita bahupati hita
sudhAkara vadana sudhAmaya vacana sudhAma muni vinuta
padAshrta sujana mudAspada vanadhi mudApahara naravarEsha
vyAsAdi sakala muni brndArAdhita vAraNa bhaya nAshanakara dhrta shara raghuvara ghana mahimA vAsavAdi
sura pakSa bhuvana rakSaka ghrNAkara vibhAkara vamsha vara tilaka su-rAmapura jananuta dhrtAsuga kumAra
other_info: Lyrics from Walajapet Venkatramana Bhagavatar's compositions (1991) and contributed by OS Subramanian and Lakshman Ragde.

name: shree shiva jayashri siva jaya
lyrics: AshApAsha rahitE ambA aruNAmbuja pAdE ambA
dvijEndranutE divya caritE bhavabhaya bhanjani bhakta pAlini
bhuvanEshvari bhuvanArcitE bhava shrI harikEsha bhAgadEyE

name: shrI lakSmI varAhamshrI lakSmI varAham
lyrics: shrI lakSmI varAham bhajEham shrI lakSmI sahitam shritajana shubhapradam
nIlamEgha jaya shyAmaLa gAtram nIlA bhUdEvI stutipAtram nIlakaNTha shiva
guruguha mitram nikhila bhaktajana bhayArtti dAtram
maNgaLAlayAbhOgi nutapadam puNgava budhajana natam vEdanutam
shankara priyakaram kubEra pratiSThitam shankha cakra dharam krpAkaram
pankajAsana pramukha sEvitam pankajamukha bhArgavI bhAvitam bhangahara

name: taamasamika taaLanuthamasamika thaLanu
lyrics: nA manasu telusu gadA nanepuDu viDa nAku

name: tanjam enrAlE (varNam)tanjam enrAlE (varNam)
lyrics: tanjam enrAlE nenjam aruL shurattE valiya taNmukhil pOlE vandu anjElenru uvandaruLum jaya
vanjam koNDOr pOla vanmam koNDE migha manam
varundumen aruL shiriduminri maranda vindai ennenbEn ayyA
mAdavar paNI kapAli Ala manamuNDO ilaiyO shol uyar

name: tirunAmam unadaitirunAmam unadai
lyrics: tirunAmam unadai nAn karudi varuvEn murugA
tiruvEragam uraiyum kumara guruparak-kumaranE paramEshap-perumAnin pAvana kumAranE
kAma krOdha lObhAdi tAmasa guNamellAm pAmaran ennai viTTup-parandODip-pOghavum
kSEmamAga janma sAphlayam uravum nI manam uvandiDa un nAmamE udavum ena

name: tiruvuLLa karuttennatiruvuLLa karuttenna
lyrics: tiruvuLLa karuttena sholvIr inda ariyadOr yAkkai Akkiya tangaL
peralarum piraiviyai-peravaruL shurandIr marumurai piravA neri shela vaittIrO
UnuDal vaLarkkavum ulaginbam tuykkavum vINil alaiginrEn vEredum purigilEn
arivarum aDiyiNai aDaivadE kuriyenrAl shirumati tandadEn shiva paramporuLE

name: tozhudu varatozhudu vara
lyrics: tozhudu vara maravOm dinamtOrum nAm pazham udir shOlaiyil tigazhum vElanai
azhagOr uruvAgi aDiyAr manamagizh arum kATSi tarum varadap-perumAnai
ulaga vAzhvu idanil ovvaoru nALum nam kulai naDukkameDukka pala vaghaiyil menmEl
talai tUkkit-tAngum tIngellAm nInga talai vaNangi avan tuNaitanaik-kOrip-pera

name: tuyarEdumtuyarEdum
lyrics: tuyarEdum toDarAda tuNai peTruyya nI vayalUr vaDivElanai vaNangiDuvAi manamE
viyappuravE undan vinai yAvum panipOl vilagi ODiDumE malai pOlavE vandiDinum
mEdini mIdinil unnai shUdu shUzhum pOdum shOdanaiyil vIzhum pOdum vEdanaiyil nI Azhum pOdum
vEda mantra svarUpananta nAthan pAda kamalam paTri Adarikkak-kOrinAl allalallAm tIrumE

name: unmai pEshuvOmunmay pEshuvOm
lyrics: uNmai pEshuvOm uyarveiduvOm uLLamtanil uvagai aDaivOm
tiNmaiyODu enrum tiramAga vAzhttu tiruvALanAga tigazhndE
eNNiya sheyalai eDuttE muDippOm Eru pOl avaiyil ezhilAi amarvOm
naNNiya nalanai nangu pOTruvOm nAnilam pugazha naDuvAyiruppOm

name: varumai agaTrivarumay agaRRi
lyrics: varumai agaTri sukha vAzhvenak-kaLittiDa varuvAi mArutiyE endan
karma vinai ozhittu kAppaunadu bhAram dharmamallavO
unai anri enakkoru tuNaiyumilaiyE undaDi aruLum tUya nannilaiyE
ennilai arindum nI irakka-muTrillaiyE endaiyE mIshu krSnanETrum

name: vEgamE gAvavEgamE gAva
lyrics: vEgamE gAva rAvayya bhOgi shayanavai rAvayya bhOga rangayya
jAgu shEyuTa bAguga tOcenA E gati gAnanE nA gati nIvE
caraNA shrtajana pari pakva bhaktini parIkSa jEsE saraLi mAnumA
muraLIrava sudhA pAnamu jEsE pAvana mUrtivi paNDari nAthA

name: veLi mayakkEdukkaDAveLi mayakkEdukkaDA
lyrics: veLi mayakkEdukkaDA manidA punitA viDudalai peTruLLE keDudalai nIttOrkku
oLi mayamAi vAnaveLiyil ulAviDum udaya sUriyan pOlE idaya parishuddharkku
kAshi yAttirai sheidAl karma vinai pOghumO karaDi vaLarttAlE kaDum sinam sAgumO
dEshattilE haridAsanAit-toNDu sheyyum dhIrarukku tammai nivEditta nEsarkku

name: veTri tarum vaDivElveTri tarum vaDivEl
lyrics: veTri tarum vaDivEl irukkaiyil shaTrum kavalaippaDAdE manamE
uTra tuNai umai bAlan uNarttirukka maTravai yAvumE manam uvandaruL kai
danti mukham tiru taNigai param tiru svAmi malaiyuDan pazhamudir shOlaiyum
azhagAna pazhaniyil anupattam nIkkinai amarndaruL puriyum Ananda kandanin kai

name: veTri tarum vaDivEl (another version)veTri tarum vaDivEl (another version)
lyrics: veTri tarum vaDivEl irukkaiyil ingu shaTrum kavalaippaDAdE manamE
uTra tuNai umai bAlan unakkirukka maTravai yAvumE magizhvuDan varum enrum
OrAru mukhamuDan IrAru karamuDan pArengum paraviDum paramporuLE avan
vErArum illaiyE vEdattin ellaiyE vArAdu tollaiyE vandanai seivAyE

name: vidhi viTTavidhi viTTa
lyrics: vidhi viTTa vazhiyin satiyena manamE mati keTTu murugan tudi viTTu viDAdE
midi paTTa puzhu pOl sidai paTTa pOdilum gati kiTTum avanadu padamE satamenrAl
mAya prapancattil pEyenavE tIvinai minjavE konjamum nenjam anjAdE
tAyanaiya unnaittan sEyena aNaittiDa nEya sahAya gAngEyan tuNai tEDu

name: aa daya shreeaa daya shree
lyrics: A daya shrI raghuvara! nEDEla rAdaya? O dayAmbudhi nI
mOdamutO sadbhakti marmamunu bOdhana jEsi sadA brOcina nI
ninnu tiTTikoTTi himsa beTTina danniyu nannana lEdA? ennarAni
tALumani mannincaga lEdA? annamu tAmbUla mosagi dEhamu
jEya lEdA? kannatalli taNDri mEmanucu tyAgarAjuniki
meaning: Where has all that concern for me disappeared now?   O Supreme among
Raghus!    Ocean of mercy!
You yourself had initiated me into the subtleties of true devotion and
protected me.  Where has... Then when you went to the extent of assuring me that you would regard
all those harming me as harming yourself.  You had counseled me patience
and forbearance.  Have you not ignored and even pardoned those who have
heaped countless insults on you? You had fed me and nourished me in such
a way that my body glows with a healthy sheen.  You had assured me that
you would be ever my father and mother.  Why don't you show me that
compassionate concern now?

name: arindEnE inrE unnaiyEarindEnE inrE unnaiyE
lyrics: chEDkE calE kanhaiyA gOkula chOdkE kanhaiyA
cOr kahE kOyI mAkhan cOr kahE kOyI cit cOr hamE chODkE
ghar ghar panghaT sUnE sUnE bhargayE dhyAn unhIkE manmE
palbhar giridhar AnEkE sOcmE calan bidAmE khaDi dvAr pE

name: callarE raamacandruchallarE raamachandhru
lyrics: sompaina manasutO impaina bangAru gampalatO manci
pAmaramulu mAni nEmamutnu ramA manOharuni paini tAmara pUla
dhAta vinutuDaina sItApati paini cEtulatO pArijAta sumamula
I jagatini dEva pUjArhamau pUla-rAjilO mEtaina jAji sumamula
ennarAni janana maraNamu lEkuNDa manasAra tyAgarAjanutuni
meaning: Devotees! Pour gently on Sri Ramachandra - a basketful of choice fragrant Camaka, lotus flowers, eschewing improper actions with traditional discipline.
Choose flowers of the highest class available in this world for His worship, of limitless prowess, this Hari rose like the spotless Moon from the ocean of the solar dynasty.
Your heart showers the Kumuda flower of devotional emotion on Him, on One who is extolled by Brahma. Shower handfuls of Parijata flowers like rain. To disengage yourself from the endless cycle of
birth and death, scatter flowers on Hari, whom Tyagaraja worships wholeheartedly.
other_info: Lyrics contributed by Lakshman Ragde. Meaning from Compositions of Tyagaraja

name: EnguvadariyAnOEnguvadariyAnO
lyrics: EnguvariyAnO sakhiyE en nilai kaNDirangAnO manam
pongum karuNaik-kaDalAi bhuvi tanil engum nirai yadukula tilakanai ninaind-
ninaivennum kanaka izhai tanilE kaNNan nirmala nAma nam maNigaLai iNaittE
anavaratam mArbagham tanil pUNDu annavarukkAna Ashai koNDE manam

name: eTula gaapaaDuduvOeTula gaapaaDudhuvO

name: aarabhimaanamaarabhimaanam
lyrics: :  rI  ga ga  pa pa  ni ni sA  ni sa ni ga rI |
sa rI  sa ri sa ni pa |  ga pA  ga pa ga ri sa ||
:  rI  sa ni dhA  ni sa ri gA  ma pa ma dhA |
ni sa ri sA  ni dha ni |  sa nI dha  pa ma ga ri ||
:  sa ni sa  gA ri gA  ma pA  ga ma pa dha pa |
ri sA  ni dha pa  dha pa | , ma ga ri  pa ma ga ri ||
:  ni sa rI ,  ma ga ri  pA ,  ma ga ri  mA |
ga ri  dha dha pa ma  pa dha |  sA ni dhA  pA ma ga ri
:  mA , dha  ga ma dha  sa ga ma dha  ni sa ga ma  ni |
dhA ,  sa ni dhA  ri |  sa ni dha  ga ri sa ni dha ||
:  pA dha  ga pa dha sa  ri ga  sa ri  dha sa  pa dha  ga |
rI , sa ri ga ri  dha |  sa ri sa  pa dha sa dha  ga ||
:  pa dha sa dha pa mA  pa dha ma ga ri  sa ri ga  sa |
rI ,  dha dha sa sa  ri |  ri  ma ma  pa dha  dha pa ma ||
:  pa dha ni sa  rI sa  dhA pa ma  ri ga ma2 ri sa |
rI sa  pA ma  ni dha |  ,  pa ma  ri ga ma2  ri sa
kAppATra vENumennai karuNApuri tanaya nI kaDaikkaNNAl pArammA
:  ga ma pa ni  sa ga sA ,  ni dha pa  ma ga pa ma |
gA,  sa ga ma pa ni |  sA ni dha  pa ma ga sa ||
:  ni dhA  sa ri ga ri gA  ma pa dha pa sa  ni |
dhA ,  ga ri ni dha ma |  ga  ni dha ma  ga ri ga  ri ||
:  ni sA  ga ri ga  ma pA dha  ma pa dha ni sa ri |
sA ,  pA ga ri |  sa ni dha  pa ma ga ri sa ||
:  ri ma pa dhA pa  ma pa dha ni sa  pa dha ni sa ri |
gA gA ri sa  nI |  nI dha pa  gA gA  ri sa

meyyellAm aNi paNiyAnadu minna vEda ghOSangaL muraiyODu pinna sheyyum antarangak-kurumbugaL enna terindirundum AghAdenru jADaigaL paNNa teru vIdiyO idu cinnadu enna drSTi dOSangaL varAdu OyAdu naNNa
rambhai tilOttamai mEnakai Urvasi aDavu piDikka enru iDamonru nADa attai minjuginra engaL annai alankAramAm
attaik-kaNDa iDattil ellOrum kUDa varam tarum suraroDu mAmunivar palarum vAzhi vAzhi kaNNA enru maNNadhira pADa vazhi vazhi enru sholli yAnaip-paDai kUDa mAmunivar nAradarum vINai uraipODa

name: ayyArA ennaiayyArA ennai
lyrics: ayyamenrOr tamakkaiyam vilakkiya vaiyam pugazh dharma samvardhanikkughanda
vanjamaTra nejnjaghattil vanduraiyum panca nadi appanE inda pAr
tanjamenrOr kalidunca viraTTiya taNDai shen shilambugaL konjum pAdanE
pancarattu koDu nanjamudAyuNDa ranjitanE en sholvEn un caritaiyai
candiranum shiranda gangai tanai shiram tanil pantiyAic-cindiDAd-aNindu
candanam nIrum pItAmbaram tOl paNI vindaiyO-Denbu shErndu
kandan gaNapatit-tandaiyE undankaram tanirk-kanalODu uDukkum shUlamumEndum
sondamAna deivam endanukku nI enranda rangamAna undanaip-paNindEn
cittashanai neTri vizhiyAl eritta siddhanE bhaktark-karuL tarum karttanE
citta magizhndu tudittavarkku nitya siddhi tarum nityanE
kuTramaTra veTri peTra tattuva mahattuvattil shuddhamAi vaLartta
uttamiyAn umAdAsanaik-kAttiDum uttamanE bhakti bhaktiyAi vandittEn
cittajanai netTi vizhiyAl eritta siddhanE bhaktarkaruL tarum kartanE
kuTramaTra veTri peTra tattuvamAi kuTram vaittumetta shuddhamud?an vaLar
uttamiyAl umAdAsanai kAttiDum uttamanE un cittam endan bhAggiyam ||

name: bAi baDikarindabAi baDikarinda
lyrics: bAi baDikarnida nAnu badukidenu avaru mADidupakArava mareya shrI hariye
hangisi hangisi manava hariyali nilisidaru bhangisi bhangisi bayalAse keDisidaru
gangeDisi gangeDisi kAma krOdha biDisidaru hangisidavarenna parama bandhugaLu
jADisi jADisi enna janmagaLa kaLedaru huDisi huDisi huTTu hondukoLisidaru
pIDisi pIDisi enna prayatnava kaLedaru kADi kADi kaivalya padavi tOridaru
kAsu muTTidAga kAya prAyashcittakikkidaru dUSisi dUSisi nirdOSa mADidaru
lEsanu koDu namma purandara viTTlane dAsanendenisuvaranu dinadali enna

name: bAla gOpAlanEbAla gOpAlanE
lyrics: bAla gOpAlanE pakSam vaittaruLvAi paramAnanda lIlanE
jnAlattilE Atma jnAna bhakti karmattAl kOlat-tiru vAzhveida kuzhalisai paraviya
vanjanai arakkiyin mAya uyir kuDittAi vAri senra dAnavan pAril vIzha maDittAi
nenjil vandiDar sheyyum venjinaip-pEigaLai nIru sheidun anbil mArillAdirukka shei

name: bAlikE mOhambAlikE mOham
lyrics: bAlikE mOham vaLarannu dinamanumE param dEhavum taLarannu
mulla bANan sharam tUgunnu kuLirmatiyum mOhanAngi tApa mEkunnu
mallAkSi kOkilam kUkunnu AtinAleNTe mAnasam vivashamA kunnu
pallava shayanamayi bhAmini shikhi pOlavE yallalinnu nalkiDunnu hAhanta jnyAnendu ceyvu
munna monniccu vasiccatum tArttEn mOLi mOdam kalarunnu ramiccatum
sannayAyi jnyAn shayiccatum mrdu vacasA khinnata dUrIkariccatum
innitellAm kaNavan marannu pOvAnendumUla cennu nI colli mE tApam shrI patiyE nayikkEnam

name: bande rangayyabande rangayya
lyrics: ellighOdaru sukhavilla avarellara sEveya mDa bEkalla
bEre inthA hasakeTTa samsAra nA mADalAre
soNTibErige kAsilla enage soNTAda nOvu ghanavAyitalla
kaNDhakke bandideyalla toDaru ondu duDDu kELidaryAru sAlava koDaru
sOmavArada vratavenage ondu dIvige haccalu teravillavalla
bhAvisi nODuvarilla namma purandara viTTalane balla

name: bandham viTTAlEbandham viTTAlE
lyrics: bandham viTTAlE sukhamE adilE sikki pAzhAgAdE ahamE
endenda uravinar sondam koNDADinAlum tantramAi avar tannalam sAdhippAr
jAti muraigaLait-tangattAl aLappArgaL saliyAdu koDuttAlum ozhiyAdu kETpArgaL
vEda shAstram ellAm vIdikku sholluvAr vITTilE sanmArga vidhigaLai kolluvAr
veLLi naTamADinAl veNNaghai kATTuvAr verum kaiyaik-kaNDadum viraindu kambi nITTuvAr
kaLLak-kumbiDu pOTTuk-kAryam sAdhippAr kaNDAl kAmAKSi nAyakkan kathaiyai AmOdippAr

name: bangAru kAmAkSibangAru kAmAkSi
lyrics: bangAru kAmAkSi bhaktan mantra siddhan paradEvi mahimaiyaip-pADum varaprasAdi shyAmA shAstri
sangIta vANi aruL pongum vidyAdharan dAna dahana jatisvara shruti laya naipuNyan
selvarai nADAda selvak-kalai mannan serukkarin garuvattai segukkum vitpannan
nallisai vANarellAm shollum pulavanAm nAda shikhara jyOti bharata shAstra nidhi

name: bEga baarO
lyrics: bEga bArO bEga bArO nIlamEgha varNA bEga bArO bEga bArO vElApurada cenna
indirA ramaNa gOvinda bEga bArO nandana kandA mukunda bEga bArO
dhIrI udArA gambhIrA bAga bArO hArA alankAra raghuvIrA bEga bArO
ranga uttunga nrasinga bEga bArO gangeya paDeda pANDuranga bEga bArO
siddhA samruddhA aniruddhA bEga bArO hattanEridda prasiddhA bEga bArO
hayyA vijaya sahAya bEga bArO uragAdrivAsa hayavadana bEga bArO

name: bhagavAn narasimhabhagavAn narasimha
lyrics: bhagavAn narasimha bhAratiyai jnAna vAridhiyaip-paNivOm jagatguru
aham parabrahma sAkSAtkAram aDainda vEdAnta siddhan arivuk-kaDal avan anbai en sholluvEn
nava navamAgiya kavi pozhiyum koNDal nAda vEdak-kalai nAlum arindavan
kaviyOgi bhArati enrennai vAzhttiya karuNaip-perumAn avan aruNa mukha vilAsan

name: dEvi vanam vandal sati dEvidEvi vanam vandal sati dEvi
lyrics: dEvi vanam vandAL sati dEvi vanam vandAL sati dEvi kadamba vanam ninrAL
tEnarum shOlai teLLamuda vAvi shEDiyarum kUDi ninru pon malarait-tUvi
tIdillAda vaNNamum shirittaLavaLAvi tiruvaruLAkki inbam tEkkiDa ulAvi sati
dEvi vanam vandAL shivanAr manam ninrAL shilambaNip-pAdamalar sheyyum vaNam ninrAL
Avi kalandaDiyAr anbu manam urugi ArAga Oda adil nIrADa enru sholli
AgamangaL kOTi tazhaittu tazhaittu nalla Adavan eTTum maram tAnE tAnAgha
attanai upaniSadam aNaindu koDiyAgi aram ennum maNam mighunda mAmalargaL tAnAgha
arivudaDamAgha aghamum nizhalAgha aravindap-pAda malar anna naDaiyAgha
kumuda malaranna vizhiyum aruLAgha kuLira varuLALa ulagam muzhudALa

name: eccaradali naDeeccaradali naDe
lyrics: anna dAnava mDuvidilla mrSTannava tandu mundiDuvaru alli
anyaru nuDivudu illi ninna benna carmava sILi tinisuvaralli
Alaya dharmavu illi vishAla vaikuNThadoLiDuvaru alli
Alaya muriyuvudilli ninna shUlada maravanErisi kolluvaralli
cADiya nudiyuvudilli nI nuDida nAlige sILuvaralli
bEDa bandare baiyuvudilli ninnanODa kAla kattarisuvaralli
yAcakaranu baiyuvudilli ninna nAcige tegedu nAlige sILuvaralli
yAcakara pUje illi ninage sOcita mArgavanIyuvaralli
tande tAyigaLa bayyuvudilli hallu jhaNDeya kaTTi sUDisuvaralli
tande tAigaLa pUje illi dEvEndrana sabheya tOruvaru mundalli
atte mAvana bayyuvudalli ninna kattu karagasadalli koyyuvaralli
atte mAvana pUje illi avaLa uttama pativrateyembuvaralli
dharmava mADuvudilli ninage sudharma sabheya tOruvaru mundalli
karma mOcanegaLu illi ninage nirmisihanu krimi tinnuvudalli
vancane mADuvudilli kAda hancina puDiyanu tinisuvaralli
gaNDana bhaktiyu illi namma puNDarIkAkSanu oliyuvanalli
gaNDana nindipudilli ninna khaNDa khaNDva kattarisuvaralli
kSEtra buddiya mADuvudilli doDDa guddali kAsi bennoLu eLevaralli
heNNu honnanu bayasuvudilli ninna kaNNige suNNava tumbuvaralli
kanyA dAnava mADuvudilli namma purandara viTTala oliyuvanalli

name: EnaNNa ninagEnaNNaEnaNNa ninagEnaNNa
lyrics: EnaNNa ninagEnaNNa.  rAgA:  Anandabhairavi.  Adi tALA.
kUnaNNa balu kUnaNNa giriya hyAnge nI hOtyaNNa
hIna asurara hyAngaNNa mOsava nI mADidyaNNa
hallaNNa kOre hallaNNa bhUviya hyAnge nI hodyaNNa
oLLe oLLe bhakutarana mecce nInu bandyaNNa
ghOravAda nODava nODi avanappana nI baDidyaNNa
koTTa maNNIna onde pAri aLedyaNNa nI aLedyaNNa
namma rAmaNNa huTTa bEkaNNa rAvaNana baDibEkaNNa
elyaNNa nI huTTidyaNNa elyaNNa nI beLedyaNNa
kolla bandu heNNina EnaNNa nI mADidyaNNa
maredu hOgade kELaNNa ninna dhyAnavenage nIDaNNa
modalu konegaLu illaNNa tande purandara viTTalaNNa

name: enna janmaenna janma
lyrics: enna janma saphalavAyitanyaranu bayasalEke tanna tAnolida vyAsamuni rAyana kaiya sErirO
siriyarasana karuNadALu sarasija sambhavana pitana suraroDeyana sakala vEda varasuvantha hariya
para dEvteyide idEyendu karakamaladoLiTTu tOruva paramahamsa vyAsarAyara caraNava nere nambirellaru
jnAna bhakuti vairAgyava nidhAnadi namagittu poreva dAnavAriya guNagaNava balla maunigaLa vara
shirOnannanatAne dEvaremba asurara kAnanava taritoTTuva Ananda tIrttara paTTadAne vyAsarAyariralu
hinde sAvira jihveyali mukundanahirAja pogaLu vandinda hariya guNagaLindu tutisi sujanara krpeyinda
porevuttabhinava purandara viTTalanna jagake tandu tOruva vaiSNava kumudEndu vyAsarAyariralu

name: enna kavi pADinEn yAnenna kavi pADinEn yAn
lyrics: enna kavi pADinEn yAn undan manam kuLirndadayyA innum undan shOdanai illai ayyA murugA
un annai arindu koNDAL tandaiyum ninaivu koNDAn un mAmiyum parindu pArttAL mAmanum magizhndu koNDAn
akSara lakSaNam terinda jagatguru aruL uNDu pakSamuDanE azhaittu parishum virudum tandaduNDu
IkSaNattil nI ninaittAi enakku Edu kuraiyuND lakSiyamum unakku uNDu yAn pADip-paNivadu
kamban kaLitta shaDai vaLLalaip-pOla ArUr sundarar kaLitta mannan sEranaip-pOla tamizh sangap-
pulavar kaLitta mannan pANDiyanaip-pOla endan piNi tIrkkum vaLLal prabhukkaL uNDu pArinilE
anbargaL kUTTam kaNDAl adil enakku nATTam uNDu inbamuDan avar pADa isaikka un tamizh uNDu
karma vinaigaL nInga undan kazhal uNDu ulagil enrum endan piNi nIngiyadAl enna kurai sholvEn appA

name: enthA pApienthA pApi
lyrics: enthA pApi drSTi tAgitu gOpAlakrSNage keTTa pApi drSTi tAgitu
shishu hasidanendu gOpi mosaru kuDisuttiralu nODi hasida bAlara drSTi tAgi mosaru kuDiyalollane
krSNa hasidanendu gOpi baTTaloLage kSIra koDalu keTTa bAlara drSTi tAgi koTTa hAlu muTTane
ciNNa hasidanendu gOpi beNNe kaiyali koDalu nODi saNNa bAlara drSTi tAgi beNNe viSamavAyite
angi hAki unguraviTTu kangaLige kappaniTTu angaLadoLu Ado krSNage hengaLA drSTi idEnO
shalle uDisi malle muDisi celva phaNage tilakaniTTu vallabha purandara viTTalana pullanEtraru nODidarEnO

name: Enu pELaleEnu pELale
lyrics: Enu pELale gOpi ninna magana jAla mAna tappi banda maneyoLage
koDa hAlu kuDidane gaDigeyanoDedane aDagiddane doDDa koDedoLage
huDuga sikkidanendu hoDeyalu hOdare baDavara maganEne hoDeyalikke
aLiyana vESadi magaLa kareya banda kalaha mADi tA kaLisinda
olumeyindali tingaLeraDiTTu koNdare kiLiyantha heNNina keDisidane gOpi
iSTondu siTTEke ciNNa krSNana mEle puTTisa bEDire anyAyava
shrSTi koDeya namma purandara viTTalana drSTisi nODire toTTilinoLage

name: ettanai azhagE unakkEettanai azhagE unakkE
lyrics: ettanai azhagE unakkE shendil kumarA ettanai kalaigaL unakkE Ishan paNitta
cittajanum nigarO shrIdharan nigar tAnO attan aLittAn shivashakti umai kaLittAL
kaDalADum karai mIdilE gaurI pudalvA kazhal kANak-kaNgaL tEDudE kandA undan
maDavargaL irupErum magizhndE irupuram kUDa aDiyArgaL malar shUDi anbAlE isai pADa
kaN kavar selva un karuNai pozhiyavE SaNmukha rangattil pannIr vazhiyavE
tanga vimAnam asaindADa shankara guruvenap-palar pADa
pAl vaDiyum mukhamAradilE mAl koND-aDiyavar manam negizhndiDavE
vEl vEl vEl vElvEl vElenavE vEdangaLiDaiya nAdam muzhangi vara

name: ettanai nALettanai nAL
lyrics: ettanai nAL murugA endanukkirangAmal irundu vandennai varundiDa viDuvAyO
ittanai nALumE nAn bhaktiyODunai nittam cittam urugavE tudi sheidiTTa pinnumE
tannai arinduyarum tava yOga murai ariyEn unnai iranduyyum upAyam tAn arivEn
cenni malai tannil urai panniru karattayyE ennaik-karai EtravE un karam onrE pOdum

name: ettanai tAnettanai tAn
lyrics: ettanai tAn viddai kaTrAlum enna bhraman ezhuttai vellappOmO
edishaiyum pugazh tiruvaiyATril vaLar Ishan pAdam tannai vaNangA mUDhargaL
kATTil mrgattuDan kalandirundAl enna kATraip-pushittu veghu kAlam irundAlenna
vaDalAgni mattinil irundAlenna vAta muraigaL kaTru vAzhdirundAlenna
naDavA maravA vAzhndadanAlenna nAgattin viSamuNDu nayandirundAlenna
nIr mIdinil neTTi pOl midandAlenna nilaiyillAk-kaDalin nilai arindAlenna
pAr mEviya kongaiyAL umAdAsanukku vAkkudavum aiyArenai vaNangA mUDhargaLai

name: evaru dooshincinanEmievaru dUSinchinanEmi
lyrics: evaru dUSincinanEmi mecci evaru bhUSincinanEmi ava guNambulu
mAnpi ArcErA dIrcErA navanIta cOruDu nArAyaNaNuDuNTa
rammani kOrika losagEDi sammati nApAli sarvEshuDuNTa
vAsi pantamu mAkEla vaTTi vAdula tODa pOrEla dUSincE
vAritO palumAru pondela gAci rakSincEDi ghanuDu rAmuDuNTa
caritalu vinucu nellappuDu kapaTa nATakadhAri kanupeTTiyuNDaga
vAsavannElu salpanEla mUDu vAsanalanu bhramayanEla vAsiga

name: gambhIra naDaiyODu vandAngambhIra naDaiyODu vandAn
lyrics: gambhIra naDaiyODu vandAn tiru kalyANa maNTapattE ninrAn
kara malar valattinai uttavan tAnga kArikaiyar manamellAm kAdalil Enga
tirai kaDal shUzh bhuvi shei tavam Ongat-tEDi vanda kUTTamellAm vazhiviTTu nInga
vamba vIzh malar shUDum mangaiyargaL onrAi vAi tirandu gauri kalyANamE pADa
ambalavANar pangil uraibavaL azhuttam tiruttamAgha vaibhOgamE pADa
AnandamAgha tumburuvum nAradarum angaiyil cAmaram tannAlE pODa
angirunda vINaiyai akrUran eDuttu Anandabhairavi rAgattaip-pADa
gAnamum gAndhAram izhumenru kalam koNDa balarAman kaikATTip-pADa
kai niraiya pUveDuttu karuttavar pODa kArikaiyar ovvonrAi kaland-ishaiyuDan pADa

name: giLiyu panjaragiLiyu panjara
lyrics: akka ninna mAta kELi cikkadondu GiLiya sAkide akka nAnillada lELe bekku koDuhOyitayyo
artigondu giLiya sAkide muttina hArava hAkide muttukoNDu giLiyu tAnu ettalODi hOyitayyO
hasuru baNNada giLiyu kushala buddhiya giLiyu asuva kundi giLiyu tAnu hasana geDisi hOyitayyO
muppAga beNNeyannu tappade nA hAki sAkide oppadinda giLiyu Iga teppane hArihOyitayyO
rAma rAma embO giLi kOmala kAyada giLi sAmaja pOSaka tAnu prEmadi sAkida giLi
ombhattu bAgila mane tumbida sandaniyiralu kamba muridu Dimba biDidu mbarake hAri hOyitu
angayyalADuva giLi mungayya mElaNa giLi ranga purandara viTTalananta rangadi bhajisuva giLi

name: gOkuladoLagiralArevammagOkuladoLagiralArevamma
lyrics: sAku sAku namagEkI prajavu A krSNana kATadi
hAlu mosaru kaddare kadili gOpyamma kELe mEliTTa beNNe meddare mElali
gOpyamma kELIrELu bhuvanadoLOlADuttirali Alayavanu pokku bALa sambhramadi
bAleyarellara battale mADisi shAlegaLellava mElake hArasi Alingisi koNDu barutAnamma
manege tAnAgi bandare barali bAho vELeyali keLeyara kUDikoNDu irali
karedandare tarali anubandhanAgi iddare irali anuvu nODikoNDA vELeyali uNabiTTuNisi
AkaLa karugaLa maneyavarellara tAnE ebbisi maneyalla sUrADidanamma
bAri bArige olidakaLLa yashOde kELE Ura hengaLara kUDina golla gOpyamma
kELE yAra mundhELuvudu I solla vArigeya samsAra mADuvanu nAriyarellara nambisi
keDipa vikAra mADada hAge nI karesi purandara viTTalage buddhiya hELamma

name: gOvindA namOgOvindA namO
lyrics: gOvindA namO gOvindA namO gOvindA nArAyaNa
manja bhAradu maDadi bAraLu kanju kannaDi bhAradu
sancitArttada dravya bhAradu munce mADida dharmave
kartu yamanavareLedu oivAga artta putraru kAivare
tandu bandare tanna puruSana hasidu baLalidirembaLu
ondu divasavu tAradiddare handi nAyente kelevaLu
prANa vallabhe tanna puruSana kANade nillalAraLu
prANa hOgalu muTTalanjvaLu jANe karedaru bAraLu
oDeveyarasige oDalu agnige maDadi mattobba celuvage
baDedeLedu yamanavaru oivAga eDavi biddidu nAlige
muTTi bhajisiro siri purandara viTTalEshana pAdava

name: guruvara mahimalaguru vara mahimala
lyrics: tiruvaiyAranu puramuna velasina hari bhakta-grEsarulaku tyAgarAja
ninnarEyi nA svapnamu nanduna pannuka vEncEsi
mannana tODa mAdhavu paramugA konni krtulu jatagUrccumanina shrI
nArada muni karuNaku pAtruDaTa vArata brahmamaTa
sAramaina gAnAmrta rasamucE sarvEshvaruni santOSa paracunaTa
other_info: Lyrics from Walajapet Venkatramana Bhagavatar's compositions (1991) and contributed by OS Subramanian and Lakshman Ragde.

name: hEge uddhArahEge uddhAra
lyrics: hEge uddhAra mADyAnu shrI hari hEgE dinagaLendaLevananu
aruNa udayadaleddu hariya neneyade goDDu haraTege hottu Eridavana
siri tuLasige nIreredu nirantara mrttige phaNeyali dharisadavana
maredu prAtah snAna mADade mane mane teranAgi besa goNDu dimbavana
guru hariyara sEve jaredu nirantara para nindeya mADi nagutippana
para heNNu para honnu karagadavAitendu paralOka bhaya biTTu tiruguvana
taruNi makkaLendu vara bhAsadali bandu paradaivadinda vancane kSUdra mALpana
uDalilla uNalilla mADilla hari sEve kUDilla sAdhu sajjanaroDane
koDalilla dAna baDalilla puNya kaDu mUrkha viSayalIlitanAgi oDeya
shrI purandara viTTalanna caraNage aDagaDigeragade kaDegedegeTTantella

name: himAcala tanayahimAcala tanaya
lyrics: himAcala tanaya brOcuTakidi  manci samayamu rAvE amba
kumAra janani samAnamevarilanu mAnavati shrI bhrannAyakI
sarOjamukhi birAna nIvu varAlosagumani nEnu vEDiti
purAri hari surEndranuta purANi parAmukhamElanE talli
umA hamsagamanA tAmasamA brOva dikkevaru nikkamuganu
sadA natavaradAyakI nija dAsuDanu shyAmakrSNa sOdari
gadA moravinavA durita vidAriNi shrI brhannAyakI

name: hingeyirabEkuhingeyirabEku
lyrics: hakki banditu angaLadalli hAri hOyitu A kSaNadalli
ADO makkaLu mane kaTTidaru ATa sAkendu mattODidaru
samsArada hambalava nI biDisO purandara viTTala dayadinda nODO

name: horaghOgi ADadirhoraghOgi ADadir
lyrics: horaghOgi Adadir hariye enna doreya nere horeyavaru kaNDare dUruvudariye
maneyoLagADOde canda nere manegaLigella pOguvare mukunda
mAniniyaru mOhadinda ninna manavanapaharisi kombuvaro gOvinda
EnEnu bEkAddu koDuve kene beNNe sakkare tandu kaiyalli koDuve
anudina guNagaLa pADuve ninaganuvAgi alankAra mADi nA nODuva
bhikSe bEDidavanembuvaro bhuvi rakSipa rAyara kaDidanembuvaro
mAna biTTavanembuvaro mahA hInara hindaTTa hOdanembuvaro
dAnava vairiyembuvaro siri vanajAkSa purandara viTTalanembuvaro

name: idi manci samayamuraaidhi manchi samayamuraa
lyrics: gati nI SaNmukhA nannu kAvumayyA karuNA sAgarA
tappu mAnavulanucEri tArumAru cEsitinA abbA nAcEi viDavakurA harikEshapura nivAsA.

name: idiryArO guruvEidiryArO guruvE
lyrics: sannuta mahima prasanna vadana nina kanyanallavO nI enna rakSisa bEkO
ninna nODidavaru dhanyarAguvaru enna dayAmUrti mannisi nODO
I jagadali madhyagEhara patniya pUjya jaTharadalli janisida dhIra
vEda shAstragaLinda mAigaLa khaNDisi sAdhisi hariyE sarvOttamanendu
mOda bharita vAda divya shAstrava mADada mOda tIrtta purandaraviTTaladAsa

name: inda vazhi pOgha vENDAminda vazhi pOgha vENDAm
lyrics: inda vazhi pOgha vENDAm engaL maharAjan kuzhalUdum
kaNNan edirAga vandu ninru vazhi maraippAne
sundara mukham kaNDu tuLLu punnakai kaNDu shondamenra
manam antarangamiDa vanda vazhi eduvumenru marandiDavO
shenrAlum naditturai vanam pashu niraiyiDai tirumbi tirumbi
ninru pArAdE appaDiyE ninrAlum nIlat-tirumEni azhagu kaNDAl
nenjam pOnAl tirumbi vArAdE kunram shumanda engaL koTravan
mEniyil oru koDiyyena paDarndAlum tIrAdE venra aravu paDam
mIdADum padam kaNDu menru menru vizhungi ninrAlum aghAdE
antaramiDa gOvardhana giri tanai aLLiya karamidaik-kANuvAi
adanuDan IrEzhu bhuvanamum tAzhvum marvadu pOlavum kAnuvAi
mandara malaiyaDi mundiyoru taramum tangiya puramidaik-kANuvAi
makaram nuzhiyAda kaDalaDiyiDai nI nagarvadu pOlavum kAnuvAi
kantukamatak kaLiru ena naDaiyuDan kAlakAla menalAyilum manadu
ughandu karuNaiyai ninaindu enaiyuDan marandu tirindiDuvAi enavE

name: inyAke yamanainyAke yamana
lyrics: inyAke yamana bAdhegaLu enna jihveli harinAma smaraNe ondiralu
patita pAvananemba nAma ati hitadinda minigaLu stutisuva nAma
kratu kOTi balavIva nAma sadgatige sAdhanavAguva hari nAma
munnobba prahlAda skSi akanyA shirOmaNi draupadi sAkSi
ciNNanendajamiLa sAkSi nija puNya lOkavanALva dharuvarAya sAkSi
hadinAlgu lOkavanALva divya madanajanakanAgi mudadinda bALva
padumanAbhanAgi iruva guru madhvEsha purandara viTTala kAiva

name: isaiyil sangatigaL migavumisaiyil sangatigaL migavum
lyrics: isaiyil sangatigal migavum uNDadil isaindu kalandAl sadgatiyuNDu
asaiyAdanavilum innisaiyuNDu saivadanai koNDu miLirum isaiyE
pasi tanai marakka sheivadisaiyE piNi tanai tIrppadum nallisaiyE
pasEl ena payir vaLarum isaiyE accam nIkkiDum muraLiyin isaiyE

name: jagadantaryAmijagadantaryAmi
lyrics: agaNita guNa nInu ninna guNavallavendu bagevava jagadoLage brahmahatyagAra
jagatu karta nIniralu anyaranne daivavendu bagevava jagadoLage svarNa stEyi
jagadoDeya nIniralu anya daivaroDeyarendu bagevava jagadoLage madhyapAyi
jagada tAyi tande nInu ninna tAnE endu koNDu bagevava jagadoLage gurutalpaga
avara tatsamyOgigaLu pancamahA pAtakaru dAsara sangadoniDu purandara viTTala

name: jIvap-paDagai OTTumjIvap-paDagai OTTum
lyrics: jIvap-paDagai OTTum dEvadEvanai nambi cittam kalangAdiruppOm manamE
nAvAyiram ezhundu kUvip-puraNDalaindu tAvum vinaik-kaDalil mEvum karuNai koNDE
duhkka kaDum puyalgaL ekkip-porudiDinum dikku dishai arindu sukkAnait-tiruppiyE
pakkuvamAgat-taLLip-parindaruL turai sErkkum paramporuL irukkaiyil bhayamillai tuyarillai

name: jO jO yashOdeyajO jO yashOdeya
lyrics: jO jO yashOdeya nanda mukundane jO jO kams kuThAri
jO jO munigaLa hrdayAnandane jO jO lakumiya ramaNa
hokkuLa hUvina tAvaregaNNIna ikkida makara kuNDalada
okkuLisuva kathapina suLiguruLina cikka bAya muddu mogada
rakkasarededallaNa muravairiye makkaLa mANikya jO jO
kaNNa beLagu pasarisutire gOpi are kaNNa mucci nODi naguta
saNNa beraLugaLa bAyoLagaLavaDisi pannaga shayana toTTilali
ninna magana mudda nODu endenutali tanna patige tOridaLu
honna baNNada sobagina khaNiye hosarannada bombeya jO jO
nIDu tOLgaLa pasarisutire gOpiya toDeya mEl malagi bAidereya
oDaloLagIrELu bhuvanaviralu kaNDu naDugi kangaLanu muccidaLu
kaDala shayana shrI purandara viTTalanu biDade nammellara rakSisuva

name: kaalamaam vanattilkAlamAm vanathil
lyrics: kAlamAm anDak-kOla mAmarattin mIdu kALi shaktiyenra peyar koNDu rIn-
karamiTTulavuvumoru vaNDu tazhal kAlum vizhi nIlavanna mUla attu vAkkaLenum
kAlgaLAruDaiya-denaikkaNDu marai kANu munivOr uraittAr paNDu
mElumAghik-kIzhumAgi vEruLa dishaiyumAghi viNNU maNNUmAna shakti veLLam inda
vindaiyellAm-Angadushei  kaLLam pazha vEdamA adanmunuLLa nAdamAi viLamguminda
vIra shakti veLLam vizhum paLLam AghavENDu nittam enran Ezhai ullam
anbu vaDivAghi nirppaL tunbelAmavaL izhaippaL Akka nIkkam yAvumavan sheigai idai
InbavaDivAghi nirppaL tunbelAm izhaippaL ihdelAmavan puriyumAyai avaL
EdumaTra meipporuLin shAyai enil eNNiyEnum shaktiyEnum puNNiya munivar nitta
meiduvAr mei jnAnamenum tIyai eritteTruvArin-nAnenum poip-pEyai
AdiyAmshivanum avan jyOtiyAna shaktiyum tAn angum ingum uLavAgum onrE-
yAinAlulaganaittum shAgum avaienriyOr poruLumillai anriyonrumillai idai
aindiDil tuyaramellAm pOghum inda arivu nAn parama jnAnamAgum
nItiyAm arashu sheivAr nItigaL pala koDiduppar nINDakAlam vAzhvar taraimIdu enda
neriyum eiduvar ninaittapOdu anda nittamutta shuddha buddha satta perum kALIpada
nizhal aDaindArkillaiyOr tIdu enru nErmai vEdam shollum vazhividu

name: kalakalavena silambasaiyumkalakalavena silambasaiyum
lyrics: silu siluvena kATril engO mAyavan varuvadu pOl
maduvuNDa vanDin oliyum mAdhavan varum nEram idena uraittiDa
avan kOlamE kaNNan vandiDuvAn ena nambiDum ivvELai tanilE

name: kamala sulOcana (geetam)kamala sulOchana (geetham)
lyrics: jAji sayya kaca kuca ghana jaga-

name: kamalAmbA samrakSatu mAmkamalAmbA samrakSatu mAm
lyrics: sumana sArAdhitAbja mukhI sundara manah-priyakara sakhI
kamalajAnanda bOdha sukhI kAntAtAra panjara shukI
tripurAdi cakrEshvarI aNimAdi siddhIshvarI nitya kAmEshvarI
kSitipura trailOkya mOhana cakra vartinI prakaTa yOginI
suraripu mahiSAsurAdi marddinI nigama purANAdi samvEdinI
tripurEshI guruguha jananI tripura bhanjana ranjani
madhuripu sahOdarI talOdarI tripura sundarI mahEshvarI

name: kAmigaL AvOm vArIrEkAmigaL AvOm vArIrE
lyrics: kAmigaL AvOm vArIrE parama shivakAmigaL AvOm vArIrE
ADalAi ulagamellAm aruLinAl AkkinAn anbarai mEnmElum inbattil UkkinAn
vEDanAi viLaiyADi villaDiyum poruttAn vEda gAnattaik-kETTu vENDum varam aLittAn
mAdhava gauri tan pAdiyAgak-kUDinAn mArkaNDEyanaik-kAkka maraliyai sADinAn
pAdam vaittennuLLam paravashak-kUttADinAn pArthanukkup-pashupadam aLikka ODinAn

name: kanikaramu lEkakanikaramu lEka
lyrics: vanajAkSA ninnu nammina vADani isumanta nIku
panikirAni vArivalla bAta paTuTa telisi nIvu kanusaikanu bilaci nannu kAcEda nani balka nIku
sarivAralu navvErani cAla nItO morapeTTaka verevakumani vEgamE kramupaTTi tiTavu ceppaka
nI pAdamulE gatiyani-yEproddunu bhajincina gOpAladAsuni madi kodava dIrcci brOva nIku

name: karuNai kATTi ennaikaruNai kATTi ennai
lyrics: karuNai kATTi ennai kaDaittETra murugA irakkam unakku enru pirakkumO siridu
porumai izhakkAdu eduvarai poruppEn en varuttam anaittum uraippEnadu kETTu
tunbak-kaDaliDaiyE tuDikkavennait-taLLum tollaigaLukkum Or ellaiyum illaiyE
anbuk-kaDal pOl aLavillA aruLODu ten pazhani tigazhum deiva shikhAmaNiyE

name: karuNai koLLa vENDumkaruNai koLLa vENDum
lyrics: dharaNi tanil en vAzhvu tAzhvurap-pAzhvurAdu aravaNaittu uru tuNai aLittu varum perum
innaluTrum en mEl ennuLLam inimEl tunbamuTriDAdennai taDutt-AtkoLLavum
inba sukhamuTru nAn enrumirundu varum anbu koNDu aruLai nI aLLi aLLit-taravum

name: karuNisi kELokaruNisi kELo
lyrics: garuDa vAhanane gangeya petta shrI hariye
itta bArembarilla yAru kELuvarilla hattira kuLLirisi Adariparilla
tattara koLutEne tAvarele nIrante citta bhramasi kaNNu kattalAyitu hariye
indumbashanavilla irava kELuvarilla ondu suttige tuNDu ariveyilla
pondoDalige obbayyo embuvarilla bindu mAtradi sukhava nA kANe hariye
elliddarenagondu neleyilla shrI hari allava tindiliyante baLaluvene
pullalOcana pUrNa dayadi salaho enna sallada nANyava mADi biDuvare hariye
nakha kEsha pariyanta nAnA bhavadi nonde sukhava kANenu bindu mAtradali
mukhavariyada rAjyadoalage ennanu biTTu bakanante mALpudu citave shrI hariye
iSTu divasa ninna neneyada kAraNa kaSTa paTTenu svAmi kAyo enna
muTTi bhajisilla muravairi nI dayaviTTu salaho purandara viTTala

name: kazhugu malaikazhugu malai
lyrics: kazhugu malait-tala vAsan azhagu mighu murugEsan kazhalaDi nizhali nADi tozhudiDuvAi manamE
pozhudunandu pAzhpaTTu pOghaviTTa piragadau pazhudupaTTup-pOghum phalanEdum kiTTAdu
kuvalayam idilunnai avala nilakk-uLLAkki kavalai pala koDuttu kalakkum UzhvinaiyAl
avadhippaDAmal uyyum Aval perugumpOdu gavanam selutti nI kAlam vIN pOkkAdu

name: kripa jooDavammakrupa jooDavamma
lyrics: japa tapamulu sEyaka nE tirigiti jagadIshvrai kanci kAmAkSo
anudinamunu nI kadalanu vininE hAyiyancu nI sharanaNTini
ninuvinA nAku dikkevaramma nirmalA kanci tripurasundari

name: krSNa karuNAkadAnukrSNa karuNAkadAnu
lyrics: krSNa karuNAkadAnu tE krpAnidhE krSNa jaladhAba jAyatE
trSNaya viSaya mrga trSNAyE mOhitE mayi
kAmadiri pUjanatayA ghOra samskAra karAgriha vitatayA
kAmini kaTAkSa rUpayA shringhala rANi kAma samyatEna hAmaya
mAmakam prEshitam tvayi mAnasam mAmava vibhO
tatvamava gandhamIsha tE bhahmAdayOpi talparam kimapinEsatE
tatvahO mahAnubhAva tE namOstu shESatalpa padmanAbha shrIpatE

name: ksheerasaagara vihaarakshIrasAgara vihAra
lyrics: kSIrasAgara vihAra aparimita ghOra pAdaka vidAra krUra
jana gaNa vidAra nigama sancAra sundara sharIra
shata maghAhita vibhanga shrI rAma shamana ripu sannutAnga
shrta mAnavAntaranga janakajA shrngAra jalaja bhrnga
rAjAdhi rAja vESa shrI rAma ramanIya kara subhUSa
rAjanuta lalita bhASa shrI tyAgarAjadi bhakta pOSa

name: maanasa guruguha
lyrics: maanasa guru | guha roopam.. | m, bajare re.. |
maanasa guru | guha roopam.. | m, bajare re.. |
maanava jan | manee sampraap | tE satee |
maanava jan | manee sampraap | tE satee, para |
notation: at Shivkumar Kalyanaraman's Krithi Archive. Also, listen to the music class
other_info: Lyrics from Compositions of Muttuswami Dikshitar by TK Govinda Rao.

name: mahilO ambAmahilO ambA
lyrics: ahi bhUSaNuni rANI shankari ambikA brhannAyaki gaurI
sArasadaLa nayanA vadana sarOja vijitA ghana purArivai
rANi varA mosagipmavE birAna brOcina parAshakti gadA
sumEru madhyalatA lalitA ramicuvinu nE kumAruDananucu
mA talli nIvu mAnavatI nI samAnamevaru ilalO jeppavammA
shyAmakrSNa sOdarI shankarI shyAmaLAmbA nIvE mAyammA

name: maNamAlaiyaimaNamAlaiyai
lyrics: maNamAlaiyai shUDinEn en manam koNDa kAdalanai dinam kaNDu kaN kuLira
guNa malai mIdE nirguNa ghana shAntamAik-kUDi nAn pADavE Adiya aruLukkE
kAdalaik-kaDandOr kavarcciyuDan avanaik-kalandu kalandu kavi malarndu malarndu para nAdak-
kanavinilE Adip-paramporuLai nAnI enrariyAda mOna shuddhAnandat-tEnaip-parugi aduvAna sukhattinilE

name: manamE unakkhitamaaimanamE unakkhitamaai
lyrics: manamE unakk-hitamAi oru vArtai sholgirEn kETTukkoL
kanaka sabhaiyil natanam puriyum kamala phalattai kattukkoL
shurudi maraiyilirukku mudal sakala viSayam paDittukkoL
kAma krOdha lObha mOha kaLvaralla aDittukkoL
paruva vayadirkkuLLE unadu bhAvam tolaya AtrikkoL
iravu paghalum iDai viDAmal irukkum matiya shurukkiDu
engum nirainda pUraNamenru hrdaya grantiyai nerukkiDu
bAlakrSNa dAsan tanakku bhavattai ozhittu mINDavan
nATTamuDanE parama shivattai nambikkai enru nADikkoL
nanmai tImai ozhindu varum jnAnakkalaiyai tEDikkoL
kanaka sabhaiyil natanam puriyum kamala phalattai kattukkoL
shurudi maraiyilirukku mudal sakala viSayam paDittukkoL
kAma krOdha lObha mOha kaLvaralla aDittukkoL
paruva vayadirkkuLLE unadu bhAvam tolaya AtrikkoL
iravu paghalum iDai viDAmal irukkum matiya shurukkiDu
engum nirainda pUraNamenru hrdaya grantiyai nerukkiDu
bAlakrSNa dAsan tanakku bhavattai ozhittu mINDavan
nATTamuDanE parama shivattai nambikkai enru nADikkoL
nanmai tImai ozhindu varum jnAnakkalaiyai tEDikkoL

name: mAnasa guruguha rUpammAnasa guruguha rUpam
lyrics: mAnasa guruguharUpam bhajarE rE mAyAmaya hrt-tApam tyajarE
mAnava janmani samprAptE satipara mAtmani niratishaya sukham vrajarE
satva guNOpAdhi sahita sadAshivam svAvidyA samEta jIvOdbhavam tatvam tAmasayuta
vishva vaibhavam tArakEshvaramAnandabhairavam natvA shrI gurucaraNam krtvA

name: manci rOjidimanci rOjidi
lyrics: manci rOjidi svAmini sEvincu rOjidi vaccElE pulakincalE hAyincalE
sarigA jAgAna nI sarigAna sarigAnanugAvaga vErevaru
muraLIgAna mOhana rAghava varamulu vEDakanE prasAdincu

name: mAnini vAmatamAnini vAmata
lyrics: mati vadanE tava kOpamitu mAmanu paramendinu
satatam tvayidhrita mati jnyAn sarasa shIlE kAntE
ati madhura vacanattinAl AdhibhAram mama tIrttu
madana kELi mayi kalaya maratakAbha kAntE kOmaLa radana
kAnti parihasita ramya kanda sumE mAmanu

name: mathuraa nagarilO
lyrics: pallavi: In the town of Mathura, a gopi is walking. Leave way, Krishna.
anupallavi: When the sun has set, then surely I will come to see you. Stop tugging at my silk sari so tightly, Krishna.
caraNam 2: He is dancing around me like a lotus. This is the grand trunk road. Go herd your cows. Leave me alone,
meaning: pallavi: In the town of Mathura, a gopi is walking. Leave way, Krishna.

other_info: Lyrics provided by Daivati Bharadvaj and Shishya.

name: mayangAdE manamEmayangAdE manamE
lyrics: tayangit-tayangip-pala sAhasam kATTiyE tAvi unnaip-piDikkum cancala mAyattil
pADiyum Adiyum Udiyum kUDiyum bandhanai sheidu sugandhanaip-paritta pin
mODi sheidODiDum mUrkha vilangai nambi mutti koDukkum shiva bhaktiyai marandu nI

name: mosara suridumosara suridu
lyrics: mosara suridu Oduva I mAyada shishuva tOrisa enage husiyanADuvudEke
mandiravannu dATi namma ranga banduduNTEne endu
hindu mundariyade dUra bAradu namma gOvaLa rAyana
kenehAlu koLLendare namma ranga munidu hAruvanu kANe
mane manegaLa pokku kaddanendare namma manege sOjigavallave
ArigU makkaLalle namma ranga Orvane sariyendare
Ara makkaLu hOdaranyAyadali dUra bhAradu ballire
kantupitana nAmava kELele gOpi antarangadi nenedu
padhyavAgide namma manasige balarAma krSNara nODuvOdu
kANade iralArire namma mukhya prANa vallabha rangana
jANatanava biTTU kANisu bEgadi prANa gOvaLa rAyana
mandiradallidda purandara viTTalanna tandomme tOremage gOpyamma

name: mUgu saNNadumUgu saNNadu
lyrics: mUgu saNNadu.  rAgA:  Anandabhairavi.  aTa tALA.
1:  mUgu saNNadu mUkuti doDDadu bhAra yAr hora bEku
inthA Adida mAtugaLADidavaLa mOre hEge nODa bEku
mIri hOda mAtige ella nIrE biDa bEku kUDitta
kaiLeyaru AdikoNDa mEle kEriye biDa bEku
vArige ogatana mIrihOdavaLa kai yAru piDiyabEku
svAmi shrI purandara viTTalarAya nInE piDiya bEku

name: munjAneyeddumunjAneyeddu
lyrics: asura samhAriyenni dasha shira vairiyenni shishuvu moreyiDalu rakSisidanenni
baliya bEDidanenni celuva vAmananenni lalaneya abhimAna kAidanenni
kaliyugadali banda krSNAvatAranenni sale pANDu sutarannu pAlisidanenni
karuNAkaranenni kapaTa nATakanenni karirAjananu kAida krSNanenni
paripariyindali bhaktara salahuva varada purandara viTTalanenni

name: muttina gaNDanamuttina gaNDana
lyrics: udayadallELa bEku udaka kAsalu bEku badiyalli nAniddu baje areya bEku
hadanAgi ele suNNa aDige kuTTalu bEku bidirukOlanu tandu munde iDa bEkakka
mettane roTTi muddeya mADalu bEku otti odari kUgi kareyalu bEku
vAkarikeyumUgina simbaLa matte vELege eddu toLeya bEkakka
gONi hAsalu bEku benna guddalu bEku gONu hiDidu mElakketta bEku
shrInidhi purandara viTTalanna neneyutta nAnondu mUlEli oraga bEkakka

name: naaraayaNaaya namOnaraayaNaya namO
lyrics: Bhagavatha bhaktha hridaya padma bhanu roopaaya
Niravathi kara sobhi nija kausthuba bhooshaaya
pari hritha para bhaksha pakshiraja vaahaaya
Soma soory nayana saama gaana kheyaaya
other_info: Naaraayanaaya Namo has been tuned by Sangeetha Kalanidhi T.M. Thyagarajan in a raaga called
(Karaharapriya sans Madhyamam - Aa: S R2 G2 P D2 N2 S, Av: S N2 D2 P G2 R2 S).  E.Gayathri plays it often.

name: naivEdyava koLLonaivEdyava koLLo
lyrics: ghama ghamisuva shAlyanna panca bhakSya amrta kUDida divya paramAnnavO
ramA dEviyaru svahastadi mADida pAka bhUmi modlAda dEviyaru sahiteLataNa
aravattu shAka lavaNa shAka modalAda sarasa mosaru butti citrAnnavO
parama mangaLa appavu atirasa haruSadindaliyiTTa hosa tuppavO
oDeyamboDe tithivaDeyu tinthiNi oDeya eDage oDene baDiside
drDhavAda padArttangaLanella iDiside oDeya shrI purandara viTTalane uNNO

name: nAma ghOSamnAma ghOSam

rAmacandrapura ramaNIya nilaya shrI rAmadAsa mAnasa rAjIva hamsa

Aru garvagaLu kUDi baride indriya tAnella nODi

name: ponnulavu cennikulaponnulavu cennikula
lyrics: ponnulavu cennikula nannagar aNNAmalai tan pundiyil magizhndu nittam ninravan mundi
vendiral arakkargaLai venravan mayil pOla Enalin mIdulAvugirAda mAdu mun EghiyE “aDi
pUvaiyE unadu tanjam” enravan avaL Iyum mAvinaiyum menru tinravan
minnulavu shonnamuDi cenniyani viNNavar dEvEndranum siddhargaLum tunniyE gati
vENDiyE aghattil anbu manniyE paNi vElavan krpAkaran guhan mEviDum kazhukAcalam tanil
minjiya vaLangaLai nAn unniyE sholla ranjitamAgak-kELaDi virpanniyE
mUsu vaNDu vAsamaNDu kAvil moNDu tEnaiyuNDu mOhana mukhAri rAgam pADumE maiyal
AghavE pEDaiyuDanE kUDumE alai mOdu vAridhi nIrai vAri viN mIdulAviya shItaLakara
mukhil perum shikharamuTrum mUDumE kaNDu mayilinam shiragai virittADumE
dEsu koNDa bhAratanda vIratumbi rAsi aNDar dEvatAruvaik-karattAl piDikkumE shuTrum
mEviya kiLaiyai vaLaittoDikkumE oLir sEya candranODurinju palAmarangaLilE nerungiya
tInkani madhu rasattai vaDikkumE mandi pAngil ninradanai aLLik-kuDikkumE
antaram uruvi vaLard-indiran ulagu kaDandappuram pOi ninrasaiyum candana maram
tappidam illAdu kaiyAl vandanam engaL ArumAmukha nAthanukkiDumAru pOla visAlamuTra
kombattanaiyum ninru talai sAikkumE aNDap-pittikai tanilum senru tEikkumE
kandaram torum kiDandu kandaram bhayam todunga garjanai puriyum tiral singamE nenjil
accamura viNNurai mAtangamE taDangAvilE siladAvilE vaLar mAvirAl naDuvE kirAdigargaL
kArmukham eyum kaNaigaL ErumE adil vAr madhuvAl vAri uvar mArumE
kAlavaDi vEl neDiya vAL koDiya nAgam umizh kAri piNai vAri kaNaibAnalE anna
kUr nayana vEDaminnAr EnalE kAkkum kAlai mEleri poduvAr kavaNODu mAmaNi dEsuvisavE
kadiravan tanadu mukham shuzhikkumE avan kudiraiyum kaNNai shurukki vizhikkumE
Olamali kOla nIla vElai shUzhum jnAlam adil uTravar inbattuDanE vAnamE sella
vaitta pala cittira sOpAnamE enna OngugOngagil nAngilAngali pAngu nIngaruvEngai pUngazhai
onrODonru vambu koNDu nILumE kOLgaL senru senru ninru ninru mILumE

name: prEma svarUpa sarasa lOcanaprEma svarUpa sarasa lOcana
lyrics: prEma svarUpa sarasa lOcana priyakara mrdu vacana rAsa rasa rasana
sajala jalada sama sadaya hrdaya vraja taruNijana mana mOhanakara (ati)
ga ri ga ma pA ma ga ma pA ma ga ri ga mA pa mA pa mA pa ma ga ri ga (x3)
lalita cikura mAyUra makuTadhara nava nava vanavidha mAlAdharayita
khalita smita shObha kamala nayana taruNAdhara muraLIdhara karuNAkara
notation: in PDF form. Notation contributed by Sowmya Acharya, from IFCM.

name: pullik-kalApapullik-kalApa
lyrics: puLLik-kalApa mayil bhAgan shatti pudalvanAna ghana yOgan malai
pOlat-tAn tiraNDa kOlap-pannirandu vAhan nalvi vEgan
vaLLikishainda murugEshan aNNAmalaikkavi rAjan magizh nEshan enrum
vAzhum kazhugu malai vAvivaLam sholvEn mAdE kEL ippOdE
veLLai nArai kottum vELai tappi mErkkoNDu ezhundu shina vALai gati
teLLum piLLaiyanbaip-pEDum iLam shEvalAnaduvum Udum pinbu
minnikkulavi matimAnum vari veLLaip-paNilarashi tAnum maDa
minnAr vizhigaLenna mannu koNDai muttam Inum maDa mAnum
mati mayangip-pETTinuDan muyangiyE kiDakkum vaNDu kaLLaiyuNDu
andarattu min pOl kUDik-kongaiyAlE nIndi viLaiyADi shellum
an-nallAr naDakkum nannaDaik-kurugi annam shellum pinnam
vanda mEdi uLLE eTTum shinai varAlum mEleahuttu muTTum pOdu
maDi shurandu kanru tanai ninaindu kaNDa maTTum pAlaik-koTTum

name: pUlu callarEpUlu callarE
lyrics: pUlu callarE puNDarIkAkSunipai puvva bONulAra mIru dEva pArijAta
vAlugaNTi sItA sahituDaina rAmuDu jAli jendina bhaktavarulanu cAla prItitO brOcunamma
bAla prAyamu nATi mOdalagu jAlakayyamulu jEsi tanujAla
kAluni gruhamunaku bampina nIlamEgha shyAmupai jAji
kammaviltu taNDri rAmuDu komma sItanu peNDliyADa
ammarO rAvaNAsuruniki kommu pagilenu gadavE tAmara
sadA dInula brOvumani mIru cAla vEDarE manci sampangi

name: pUntEn nErmozhipUntEn nErmozhi
lyrics: pUntEn nErmozhi sakhi jnyAn viraham pUNDu valanjIDunnEn kAmini
kAnta guNanAkumen kAntan shrI padmanAbhan svAntE mOdam kalarnnu sapadi varunnatenne
bAlE cArushIlE mama cAlE vannEnniha rAtri kAlE
mOdattAl ennUDE bhAlE nal kastuRi kAlEpanam ceyyum
vannU divininnU brisha minnU puNarinduvu manguyarunnu
vEgam cennu shOkam connu sAkam tEna pONnnu mamOdaya

name: puruSAyapuruSAya
lyrics: nara vAhanAdi nata sadguNAya nAri dhrtAnga ramya rUpAya
vardAya namO vAmadEvAya harikEshAya anaghAya puruSAya

name: purushaayapurushhaaya
lyrics: nara vAhanAdi nata sadguNAya nAri dhrtAnga ramya rUpAya
vardAya namO vAmadEvAya harikEshAya anaghAya puruSAya

name: raama raama neevaaramuraamaa raamaa nivaaramu
lyrics: rAma rAma nIvAramu gAma rAma rAma sItA rAma rAma sAdhu jana prEma rArA
merugu cElamu gaTTukO mella rArA rAma karaku bangAru sommulu kadala rArA
varamainaTTi bhaktAbhISTa varada rArA marugu jEsikonEdaTTi mahima rArA
meNDaina kOdaNDa kAnti meraya rArA kanula paNDuvaga uNDu uddaNDa rArA
ciru navvugala mOmu jUpa rArA karuNatO nannElapuDu gAva rArA
kandarpa sundara nanda kanda rArA nIku vandanamu jEsEda gOvinda rArA
adyanta rahita vEdavEdya rArA bhava vaidya nE nI vADanaiti vEga rArA
suprasanna satya rUpa suguNa rArA rAma apramEya tyAgarAju nEla rArA

name: raama raama seetaaraamaraamaraama seethaaraama
lyrics: rAma rAma ninu cAla rAju landaru piluva vacciri
kSEma mosaga bhadra shaila dhAmuDavai velasina taNDri
mauni yAgamu gAci shilanu maguva jEsi janaku niNTa
shivuni villu viraci minci sItanu cEkonna svAmi
tapasi vESamunu dharinci taNDri koraku vanamuna kEgi
tapana sutuni gAci yudadhi dATi rAvaNuni druccina
lanka vibhISaNuna kosagi lalana gUDi ayOdhyanu
shankha lEka nElucunna dayatO bhadrAcala nivAsa

name: raamaa naa manaviraama naa manavi
lyrics: rAmA nA manavi cEkonumA dEvarAya parAku sEyakurA
svAmi bhadrAcala dhAma pAvana divyanAma girijanuta bhIma parAkrama
darilEni dInajanulanu gAcE birudu bUnitivi khyAtiganu
gurutara shamana kinkara bAdhalaku nI marugu jEriti nannaramara sEyaka
kapaTa mAnasuDani madinI enna kipuDu rakSincu sammatini
aparAdhamulakella nAyelamaitini krpa jUDumi nAdu nepamulennaga svAmi
patita pAvana mUrtivaina nIvE gatiyani yuNTi madilOna
satatamu rAmadAsa bhadrAdri atulita vaibhava gatulacE nelakonna

name: raamacandra nannuramachandra nanu
lyrics: sOma shEkharAdi vandya sAmagAna lOla sItA
patita pAvana nIyE kAtiyani matitALacina draupadi
mAnamu gAcina shrI padavi nIvE gAdA sItA
cinta telisiyentO bAla vantamuganu brOcina shrI
sura ripu sutu verapu dIrci karuNincina doravanucunu
karagucu nE moraliDa madi karaga lEdugadA sItA
pAmaruDanu tAmasuDanu nI mahimala nEmegu gAnu
other_info: Lyrics from Walajapet Venkatramana Bhagavatar's compositions (1991) and contributed by OS Subramanian and Lakshman Ragde.

name: raaraa saami (varNam)raara saami (varaNam)
lyrics: rArA sAmi krpajUDa manci samayamurA vEgamE

name: raavEmE maguva (svarajati)ravE mE maguva (svarajati)
lyrics: rAvEmE maguva vinuva tagavA vEDukanu karuNa nEDuvaga kuluka tODukoni
vEvEgamuga jani nA vibhu kanukoni vAdu valatanI nA mATA vinumani
A mAnini vagalE mA celuvunakEmO ghanamuga tOci nanu maracE
naTa nE manukonuyetanika manambunandu nEmi tOcadanu nuNTi gada
shrIkaruDaku sObanAdri vibhuDu nEDA celimkalase naTa nanu
kaluvala rAjugaLana dElcunaTA upAyamuna telpi tODukoni
meaning: Contributed by S Govindaswamy
Won't you come (rAvEmO) Maiden (maguva) and listen (vinava tagavA) to the funny thing (vEDukanu) ?... with sympathy (karuNa nEDuvaga)....bringing along(tODukoni)
1 After hurrying (vEVegamE chani) and finding my Lord (nAvibu kanukoni) even if he says that it is not possible (vADuvaladhaninA) tell him to listen to my message (words) (nAmAta vinumani)

2 Did I not think (umti gadA) that even if the other woman's (A mAnini) actions (vagalE) appeared to be great to my beloved (mA cheluvunakEmo ghanamuga tOchi) and he forgot me (nanu marachenaTa nEmanukoni ),   and for him (yataniki) in that state of shame (y+A mAnambunamthu) nothing will make sense (n+Emi tOchadanu  numti).
3 Today (nEdu) the Lord of SObanAdri (sObanAdri vibhuDu) with those damsels (A chelingalase) will dance?? (natananu)....
Tell Him the action plan (upAyamu telpi) and bring Him with you (tOdukoni)
other_info: Lyrics contributed by Lakshman Ragde and S Govindaswamy.
Sobanadri is one of the hills of Tirumala.
These lyrics are unverified. Here is an alternate version of the lyrics that may or may not be more accurate (
vave dukanu karuna neduva kakulutho dukoni
A mani nivaka lemo chaluvuni ke moganamu kathochinanu marache
nata nemanu konu yathani kama mambunan dune mitho chagnu nundigada
Shree garuda shobana thrivi puduneda chelingalache nata
nanungalu valu rajugalanu dhelsu nata upayamu nuthel pithodukoni

lyrics: rAja rAjEshvari shrI rAja rAjEshvari sarva mangaLa shrI

name: sAku samsAra namaginnEtarasAku samsAra namaginnEtara
lyrics: lOkadoLage enna bEkembuvarilla vivEki puruSa paravashanAdare Edara samsAra
kAmavembo negeheNNu enna kaTTi AlutAne krOdavembo savati kollutAne Etara ogatana

ajnAnavembo atte enna aTTi baDidALe sujnAni mAva kuruDanAdare Edara ogatana
tApatrayadalli nAnu tEli muLugudEne Apattu pariharisuve purandara viTTala Edara ogatana

lyrics: sAmAnyavalla shrI hari sEve pAmara janarige sAmAnyavalla shrI hari sEve
sAmaja varadana prEmadi nenevudu tAmasa buddhiya tA taggisade
antara malinavaLiya bEku santata shravaNadi shrIkAntana carita kELalu bEku

jnAna karmEndriya nigrahisi jnAnava sangrahisi hIna vrddhigaLeraDake tA sahisi
dInadeyanu vahisi mAnapa mAna samAnavendaridu nidhAnadi hari guNa dhynava mALpudu
sarvAnuganendu sarva mUruti purandara viTTalana sarvadA dhyAnisi garvavaLiya bEku

name: santAnam tandE aruLvAisantAnam tandE aruLvAi
lyrics: santAnam tandE aruLvAi shaSTi dEvi bandhAnam perugiDavum pArttu nAn magizndiDavum
skandan maNam purinda kAvya kalAdEvi endan manam kuLira undan aruL purivAi

lyrics: P:  shatakOTI manmathjAkAra sarasAngA uttungA rAdhA manOramNa
nandagOpa vadUjana hrdayAnandA sadAnanda Ananda nandagOpa kanda
1.	ambujadaLa vilOcana vikasita samyata sahita shikhipinca jAlapam

name: shen-tamizh pADudarkkEshen-tamizh pADudarkkE
lyrics: shen-tamizh pADudarkkE sendil vaDivElanaip-pOl jagattinil aruLuvAr uNDO manamE
ten malaiyil vAzhum agattiyanaip-pADa vaittAn cindu kavi pADudarkkE aNNAmalaikkaruL koDuttAn
nIraNinda kIranukkE param kunril padam kATTi ArupaDai padikATTi ATrup-paDai pADa vaittAn
aruNagirinAthanaiyE candap-pugazh pADa vaittAn karuNaiyuLLa vElan avan ennaiyum pADa vaittAn

paiyan enru pArAmal kumara guruparanai ayyan ArumukhattAn kali veNpA pADa vaittAn

name: shreenivaasa neenEsrInivAsa neenE
lyrics: shrInivAsa nInE pAlisO shrtajana pAla gAnalOla shrI mukundanE
dhyAna mALpa sajjanara mAnadim paripAlipa vENugOpAla mukunda vEdavEdya
endige ninna pAdAbjava ponduva sukha endige labhayavO mAdhava
eSTU dina kaSTa paDuvudo yashode kanda drSTiyinda nODalAgade
muTTi ninna bhajisalAre keTTa narajanmadava duSTa kArya mADidAgyu iSTanAgi
anudina anEka rOgangaLa anubhavisuvenu ghana mahimane kELayya
tanuvinalli balavilla neneda mAtra salahuva hanumadIsha purandara

name: singaaravElavan vandaansingaara vElavan vandhan
lyrics: yEzhai kuDi muzhudum vaazha aruL puriya

munden vinai payanda bandham tolaiya padam indA indA enru Ezhai manan kuviya

name: singAra vElavansingAra vElavan
lyrics: singAra vElavan vandAn endanai ALa singAra vElavan vandAn
Perumg kAdaloDum ayyan tangum mayiliniaDai tunga vaDivinoDu
skandan paNiyum anbar sondhn karuNai koL mukundhan marugan murugan munden vinai payanda bandhattolait-taruLai indA indA enru Ezhai kudimuzhudum vAzha

name: sukhamAna nilaisukhamAna nilai
lyrics: sukhamAna nilai vENDin ahambhAvattai viTTu shuddha Om ivAi manamE
sakala guNa kalyANan sarvAntaryAmi avan sharaNinrip-parama upashAnta nilai kUDumO
karaiyaTra dAhamuDan kaNNIrum kambalaiyum uraiyaTru vIN vAda
paraiyaTru jagamAyap-puraiyaTru para bhakti niraivuTra varaiyaTra

name: summane baruvadesummane baruvade
lyrics: manadalli drDhavirabEku pApi janara samsargava nIgalu bEku
anumAnavanu biDa bEku tanna tanu manadhanavanoppisi koDa bEku
kAma krOdhava biDa bEku para kAminiyara hambala biDa bEku
hEmadAseya suDa bEku hari nAma sankIrtaneyanu mADa bEku
sandaNigaLa biDabEku dEha bandhu bAndhavara snEhava biDa bEku
nindisidare higga bEku kOpa bandAga smaraNe biDadira bEku
hariyE guruvenna bEku shrI hariyE para daivataventenna bEku
paravastu ollene bEku dEha sthiravallaventendu tiLiyalu bEku
vyApAravanu biDa bEku namma shrIpati purandara viTTalenna bEku
pApa rahitanAga bEku jnAna dIpada beLagili ODADa bEku

name: summane dorakuvadesummane dorakuvade
lyrics: summanae dorakuvade shrI rAmana divya nAmavu
bhakti rasadali tanna citta paravashavAgi acyutana nAmava bacciTTu koNDavagallade
kantu pitana divya nAma antaranagadoLiTTu cinteyella biTTu niscintanAdavagallade
kaNNoLagidda mUruti tannoLage tandu ghanna pUrNa purandara viTTalana bhajisade

name: svAmi mukhya prANa nIsvAmi mukhya prANa nI
lyrics: svAmi mukhya prANa nI malevara gaNDala gANa sakala vidyA pravINa nI hiDidyO rAma a caraNa
sanjIvini parvatavannu anjade tandeyO nInu anjane tanu sambhavanu ninna bEDi kombEnO nAnu
vaikuNTha sthaLadinda bandu pampA kSEtradi nindu yantrOddhArakanendu purandara viTTalane sahanendu

name: svAmi sharaNamsvAmi sharaNam
lyrics: iravu paghalaim unai ninaindu ninaindu manam
abalaiyaik-kaN pArAi abhaya karam tArAi aramillaiyA
tiruvaruL illaiyA manam illaiyA innum dayavillaiyA en

name: swaami sharaNam
lyrics: iravu pagalum unnai (raama) ninaindu ninaindu (raama) - manam
abalaiyai kaN paaraay undan abayakam taaraay (raama)
aramillaiyaa tiruvaruLillaiyaa manamillaiyaa innum dayavillaiyaa en

name: tannam taniyAitannam taniyAi
lyrics: unnaiyE gatiyena nambiyE Urum pErum uravum turandE
iruLum puyalum iDimaiyum inavashaigaLum poruttEn iru vikAra bandha donda
iDargaLai maruttEn aruLE tuNai enruNarndE anbup-paDagil AshaiyuDanE

name: taraLerannataraLeranna
lyrics: taraLeranna kappu maiyava Edara celuvane kariya jaDeya jOgiginda uttamanEne
jaladhiyoLu vAsavEnu manegaLillave lalane kELu kADiginta lEsu allave
mandara giriya pottudu Enu candave kandanoidu aDaviyoLiDuvutAva nyAyave
maNNa nagedu bEra meluvudEnu svAduve tanna karadi kapAla piDivudyAva nyAyave
muttina hAraviralu karuLa mAle candave nitya ruNDa mAle dharisOdadu nyAyave
giTTanAgi beLedu aLevudEnu nyAyave guDDada magaLa tandege munivOdu nyAyave
pitana mAta kELi mAteya shiravanaLivare shitikaNThanAgi iruvudadAva nyAyave
kODaga karaDi kapigaLa hiNDu bandhu balaGave kUDi banda bhUta baLaga jnAdi sambandhave
hAvina heDeya tuLivarEne anjikillave hAvu maike muttiralu hEge jIvipane
pattaliruvarEnu avage nAcikillave satta gajada carma hodeyalu hEsigillave
uttama tEjiyiralu dhareyoLu haddanErvare ettina bennanEridavaru buddhivantare
hari hararige sAmyavEne bELe rukmiNi purandara viTTala sarvOttama kELe bhavAni

name: tillaanaa (taa dhirana)thillana (tha dirana)
lyrics: tA dhirana tana dhirana dhIm tiranA tillAnA tA dhirana tana dhirana tirana titana dhIm
nAdhru tani nAdhru tani nAdhru tanidhA jhomtari tajhaNutA jhomtari tajhaNutA jhomtarita jhaNu
Ananda naTamADum naTarAjan sabhEshan ponnambalat-tarashanai pugazhndu pADuvOm
SA tadingiNatOm pA tadingiNatOm tAkata jhamtari dhA sA tadingiNatOm tadingiNatOm

name: tutturu tUrendututturu tUrendu
lyrics: tutturu tUrendu battIsa rAgagaLanu citta vallabha tanna koLalanUditanu
geLLa nATi AhEri gurjari mALavi sAranga rAga kELi ramaNiyaradi dUradinda
phalamanjari gauLi dEshAkSi rAgangaLanu naLina nAbhanu tanna koLalanUditanu
angAlige vankikki mungAlige kaDagavaniTTu unguSThadali ungurava hAki
angaNakke bandu nintu hingaNakke kaTTuvaLu gangA janakana baLige shrngarisi bandu nintaLu
kaNNIge gADigeyendu cenne shrIgandhavaniTTu beNNenellavu tamma karagaLigikki
aNNennAruNanendu gaNDage muravanikki cinna kaiyindali hastakke pannIru tantirisidaLu
hasuvina molege tamma shishuvanu uNacAci pashugaLa karugaLa piDidetti koNDu
bisi bisi Ogaravella padiyendu pashugaLigikki kusuma nAbhana baLige hastavalidu nintaLu
turu hiNDugaLa kAyidu surarige sukhavanitte taruNi nimma gaNDaru baivaramma
maruLAgade nIvu nimma manegaLane biTTu koNDu iruvudu ucitavalla bharadinda hOgire
maneyembodilla mane namage bErondilla mane uNTe shrI krSNa ninna biTTu manavillade
maneyu kANe mane namage mattondu illa ghana mahima shrI krSNa nimma maneyembodu ghanamahiyu
nindu taleya bAgi bandu kaNNIrane oresi candadunguSThadali barevudali
andendu namma kUDi hambala yAkO ninna andEve purandara viTTalarAyane

name: tyaagaraaja yOga vaibhavam
lyrics: shiva shaktyAdi sakala tatvA swarUpa prakAsham

This song has a beautiful characteristic in that the pallavi consists of a phrase that is reduced from (tyagaraja yoga vaibhavam ... to vam!) called gOpucca (cow's tail) yati, tapering at the end. The madhyama kaalam consists of a phrase that is repeatedly extended, from "swa prakaasham" to "swaroopa prakaasham" and so on, called shrOtovaaha (estuary, river), going from narrow to wide.
Lyrics from Compositions of Muttuswamy Dikshitar by TK Govinda Rao.
other_info: This song has a beautiful characteristic in that the pallavi consists of a phrase that is reduced from (tyagaraja yoga vaibhavam ... to vam!) called gOpucca (cow's tail) yati, tapering at the end. The madhyama kaalam consists of a phrase that is repeatedly extended, from "swa prakaasham" to "swaroopa prakaasham" and so on, called shrOtovaaha (estuary, river), going from narrow to wide.
Lyrics from Compositions of Muttuswamy Dikshitar by TK Govinda Rao.

name: vArija vadanavArija vadana
lyrics: vArija vadana danuja jAlakAla mAmava varaguNa vAsa
nArada mukha munijana nAmyapAda phaNivarashaya nirupama
pATala bimba vilasita dharAvika mEcaka jaladhara bhAsura nijatanuvara sushama
hATaka su-vasanadhara hAra kaustubha virAjita kandhara
hara mama shucamayi vihaga vara turaga surAdhIsha madahara nAtha vara
vAraNa bhItiharaNa caturAdrta sajjana khalatara vairi nikara jaladhara pavana bhUri karuNa parijana puNya sancaya murAntaka mAdhava radaruci vihasita mukura shakala parilasAbhEya hrdi surAdhIsha mama
bhAnu shashAnka kalita nayanAmita mangaLa vitaraNa pAvana su-vimala tama carita sUna surabhi kaca bharAmburuhanAbha dayApara bhavabhaya hrticaNa caraNa jalajayuga sadA dEhi mama mudAnandamiha

name: veLLait-taamaraiveLLait-thAmarai
lyrics: veLLait-tAmarai pUvil iruppAL vINai sheyyum oliyil iruppAL
koLLai inbam kulavu kavitai kUru pAvanar uLLattiliruppAL
uLLadAm poruL tEDi uNarndE Odum vEdattiNuNNin-roLirvAL
kaLLam aTra munivargaL kUrum karuNai vAcakatut-poruLAvAL
gItam pADUm kuyilin kuralaik-kiLiyinAvai iruppiDam koNDAL
vanjamaTra tozhil purinduNDu vAzhu mAndar kula deivamAvAL
minja narpporuL vANikam sheivOr vIra mannarpin vEdiyar yArum
tanjam enru vaNangiDum deivam daraNi mIdarivAgiya deivam
deivam yAvum uNarndiDum deivam tImai kATTi vilangiDum deivam
sheyyamenroru sheigai eDuppOr shemmai nADi p-paNindiDum deivam
kai varutti uzhaippavar deivam kavinjyar deivam kaDavuLar deivam
shen tamizh maNi nATTiDaiyuLLIr shErndittEvai vaNanguam vArIr
vIDu tOrum kalaiyin viLakkam vIDu tOrum iraNDoru paLLi
nADu muTrilum uLLanayUrgaL nagargaLengum pala pala paLLI
kEDu tIrkkum amudamen annai kENmai koLLa vazhivai kaNDIr
Unar dEsham yavanartam dEsham udaya nyAyiTroLi peru nADu
shENaghanradOr shiTraDi shInam selvap-pArasIka pazham dEsham
kANum parp-pala nATTIDaiyellAm kalvi dEvinoLi mighundOnga
jnAnam enbadOr shollin poruLAm nalla bhArata nATTiDai vandIr
POnadarkku varundanal vENDa punmai tIrpa-muyalum yArIr
innarum kaLi shOlaigaL sheidal iniya nIrttaNgaLai kaLiyaTral
anna cattiram Ayiram vaittal Alayam padinAyiram nATTal
pinnaruLLa dharmangaL yAvum peyar viLangi oLira niruttal
nidhi mighuttavar pOrkkuvai tArIr niti kuraindavar kAshugaL tArIr
aduvumaTravar vAi shollaruLIr AnmaiyAna kuzhaippinai nalgIr
eduvum nalgi ingevvaghaiyAnum ipperum tozhil nAttuvam vArIr
