name: vEnkaTEsha dayamADOvEnkaTEsha dayamADO
lyrics: citta cancalava biDisO matte krOdhava OdisO bhrAnti viSayangaLu bEDa kantupita nArAyaNa
shrSTi mUraroLage nInE kaSTa baDisuvarEnO naSTa tanna nODa bEDo drSTisi nODo dayALO
bALa aparAdhi nAnu ninna baLige bande nAnu olidu ennarakSisayya mElugiri purandara viTTala

name: vIra hanumavIra hanuma
lyrics: rma dUtanenisi koNDe nI rAkSasara vanavanella kittu bande nI
jAnakige mudreyittu jagatigella hrSavittu cUDAmaNiya rAmagittu lOkake muddenisi mereva
gOpi sutana pAda pUjisi gateya dharisi bakAsurana samhariside draupadiya moreya
kELi matte kIcakanna kondu bhImanemba nAma dharisi sangrAma dhInarAgi jagadi
madhyagEhanalli janisi nI bAladalli maskarIya rUpa koNDe nIs satyavatiya sutana
bhajisi sammukati bhASya mADi sajjanara poreva muddu purandara viTTalana dAsa

name: yAmunIya tIra brndA kAnana tala ramaNayAmunIya tIra brndA kAnana tala ramaNa
lyrics: yAmunIya tIra brndA kAnana tala ramaNA matIya hrdayAnanada vardana kara dAmOdara
rAjagOpAlA sharada sArOruha daLa nayanA ruNAbha sadA manda hasanA rUpadhara
shyAma nIrada samAna paridAna mahAdAna kanaka vasana kSOma rallakA pAdalambAmbaradharaNa
gOvardana giri dharaNa sadA malaya samIraNa latA pavana viharaNa kAlingapaNOnnaTanatA
AmOdita sura bhUsura naravara kaNNutapada pankEruha navabhUSaNa
kanakatarOnnata mukuLIkrta nIlamayAnga ati dayAkara manOhara kalA nipuNa
gOpAnganA jana jIvana Ananda nanda nandana atimOha madhura madhura
lIla kamanIya makara kuNDalOjvalita bahu madanAkAra mukha

name: yOga tOgEshvari tripura ( fourth AvAvaraNam)yOga tOgEshvari tripura ( fourth AvAvaraNam)
lyrics: yOga yOgEshvarI tripura vAsini yOjaya mAmapi tava pAda  padma mUlE muni janAnukUlE shrI vidyA jnAna bhakti nAda gAna
tyAgEsha hrdayEshvari prasiddha caturdasha kONEshvari bhOga mOkSa varadAyaki sarva saubhAgya dAyaka cakrEshvari
AgamAdi sakala shAstrArtha rUpE akhila bhuvana pAlita vara pratApE
nAgaratna tALa patra kanakAbhE natajana mana para karuNAyuta shObhE
sampradAya yOgini parivArE sadAshiva hrdaya vihArE amba hamsatULikA talpa sArE mahAmAyA mantrArtha
sArE EkAmra tarumUlE shrI kAncipura kSEtrE pavitrE tAmra varNAnga matanga muni putrE sucaritrE
IkAra kAma kalA mantra vihArE Ishvara tattva vicArE AnandAdi
adhikaraNa bhAva bhuvanAtmakAnanda rUpE caturdaSa prAkArE

name: AnandarUpA anudinamAnandarUpA anudinam
lyrics: AnandarUpA anudinam pADa jnAnam tandE aruLE purivAi
dIna dayALA gItam pADa gAna dEvA varamadu taruvAi
tUyan un pAdam nADip-paNindEn tIyan en tIvinbai tIrkka vArum
sEyanAgap bAvittut-tirukkaN pArum nEyA unai marakatam pAmAlai shUDi

name: aravainda nayanamaravainda nayanam
lyrics: aravinda nayanam gOvindam Ananda sAgaram AshrayEham
parama dayAkaram padmanAbham paraviSNu dEvam parAtparam
shyAmala gAtram sundara rUpam sAmagAna lOlam sura bharaNinutam
pAmarajana rakSkam parandAmam tAmasa guNavantam bhaktavatsalam

lyrics: pUrNEndu nibha vadani bhuvana sakala pAlini bhratIjita mrdu vacani pAra mahima vilAsini

name: nee dayaraadaa (varNam)
lyrics: nI dayarAdA nIrajAkSi nA taramerigi nannElukO
kAdamba daNDa sumacara pAshAnkusha sItAmshu kalAdhAriNi

name: nI dayarAdA (varNa)nI dayarAdA (varNa)
lyrics: nI dayarAdA nIrajAkSi nA taramerigi nannElukO
kAdamba daNDa sumacara pAshAnkusha sItAmshu kalAdhAriNi

name: raaga sudhaarasa
lyrics: rAga sudhArasa pAnamu jEsi rAjillavE manasA
yAga yOga tyAga bhOga phala mosangE
sadAshiva mayamagu nAdOnkAra svara vidulu jIvan muktulani tyAgarAju teliyu
meaning: Drinking the ever tasteful essence of raaga, why don't you rejoice, O mind!
It gives the fruit of ritual, mediation (union), sacrifice, and enjoyment all together!
As known to Tyagaraja, the jeevan muktas are those who enjoy the melody
that is the glorious form of SadAshiva, that is the sound of tuneful Omkara.
other_info: Lyrics contributed by Lakshman Ragde. Meaning from Compositions of Tyagaraja by TK Govinda Rao.

name: vajrEshi maatEvajrEshi maathE
lyrics: vajra maNImayE valayE sadayE vArija nayanE vara hamsagamanE
nAnariyEnu nirmala hrdayE nInE poreyaLa dharma rUpa harikEsha mAnini

name: vElanai neevElanE nee
lyrics: vElanai nI ninai manamE veTriyellAm tandaruLvAn

name: aadi pureeshwaramadhi purIshvaram
lyrics: tripura sundaree samEta vara guruguha janakam
meaning: I sing the glory of aadipureeshwara always, who is in the company of
goddess Tripurasundari. He is the father of the supreme Guruguha and is
adored by a host of sages. He is the renowned Tyaagaraaja worshipped by
Brahma and Vishnu. His image shines wit the brilliance of crores of suns
and the self-originated one worshipped by Nandi. His form made of sand is
covered with an armour of serpents.

name: aasheervaadam taruvaayAsirvAdam tharuvai
lyrics: AshIrvAdam taruvAi jagadIshvari anbu punnagai purivAi
citta calangaLai ozippAi em uLLattil divya prakAshamAi shezippAi
shuddha sutantiram koDuppAi emmanattinait-tUNDu shei mAyattai taDuppAi
sattiya jyOti jIvan mukti sccidAnanda siddhi viLanga yOga shakti migha pozindun

name: AdidanO rangaAdidanO ranga
lyrics: amburuhOdbhava akhiLa suraru kUDi ambaradali nidu avarstutise rambe Urvashi ramaNiyarellaru
cendadim bharata nATyava naTise jhamtaTa takadhimi tadhigiNi tOm endu jhampe tALadi tumburunoppise
dhA ma pa dha sa rI endu dhvaniyinda nArada tumburar gAna mADalu nandiyu maddale cendadi hAkalu
phaNava meTTi pAlava kaiyali piDidu phaLa phaLisutta nATyavanADe candra maNDaladante poLeyuva
mukhadoLu calisuva nIla kEshagaLADe kAlalanduge gejje ghalu ghalu ghalurenuta uDi gejje kaNTegaLADe
duSTa kALingana meTTi bharadinda puTTa pAdava iTTu shrI krSNanu meTTidanu taka dhimi tadhikenuta
suraru puSpada vrSTiya kareyalu suddiyarellaru pADalu nAga kannikeyaru nAthana bEDalu
nAnA vidhadi stuti mADalu rakkasarellaru kakkasavane kaNDu dikku dikkugaLige Odalu
cikkavanivanalla purandara viTTala vEnkaTaramaNa bEka yashOde binkadoLetti muttADe shrI krSNana

name: AdipurIshvaram sadA bhajEhamAdipurIshvaram sadA bhajEham
lyrics: AdipurIshvaram sadA bhajEham tripura sundarI samEta
vara guruguha janakam vandita muni samUham
vidhi hari pUjita tyAga rAjAngam Aditya kOTi prakAsha lingam
nandi pUjita svayambU lingam nAga kavacadhara saikata lingam

name: aDugu varamulaaDugu varamula
lyrics: aDugaDuguku ninnE dalacu cunnAnu adbhutamaina bhaktiki
dhana kanakamulu ennaina nIku dAraputrulu sogasaina yindla
akrama danujula goTTi nI  yApadalanu dalameTTi
nosagaka rava tAlal nu  vara tyAgarAjAptuda nEnu
meaning: Ask for favours and I will grant; I am mindful of you at every step and I am overjoyed with your wonderful devotion.  With love I shall grant you gold and wealth, wife and children and beautiful houses.  Why do you entertain any doubt?  Why strain and emaciate yourself?  Killing all those atrocious Rakshasas and putting down all your difficulties, I will, with valour, and in a grand and praiseworthy manner, grant you the kingdom of Brahma and Indra.  I cannot bear for a moment without presenting you gem-bedecked ornaments and horse-drawn carriages and elephants, I am Tyagaraja's friend.

name: anda nALanda nAL
lyrics: anda nAL ini varumO shollaDi ambala paingiLiyE
endenda vELaiyum idayattil padam vaittE irukkirEn enravan kUttADum
tanjam pughundavarait-tAnguvaden bhAram taLarAmal un anbu vaLaruvadE dhIram
'anjal anjal' enrE abhayamaLittu shuddhAnandanai INDu tAnAkki yANDiDum

name: aiyappanai paNivOmaiyappanai paNivOm
lyrics: aiyappanai paNivOm ulagIl koDum asura samhAr-AvatAra mUrtiyAm
mei anbargaL manam virumbum varam tara mEdini engum niraindaruL sundara
akhilalOka paripAlakanai shrI hariharar InraruL bAlakanai
paghaivar azhiya shabari malai ezhundaruL parama dayALanai surar tozhum tALanai

name: amba ninnu nammitiamba ninnu nammiti
lyrics: amba ninnu nammiti nanTE nI kanumAna mEmamma?
shambaravairijanaka sOdari sharaNu jocci manasAra shrI
parvatarAja manojnya kumAri! nirvAhamu lEka madini
kOkila rava mAdhuryE paritApamu tALakanu sucaryE!
meaning: pallavi, anupallavi: O mother! Why do you still doubt my taking refuge in you with implicit faith?  O sister of shri Krishna!  O mother of the entire world!   O substratum of the devaganas!  O Parvati!
caraNam 1: O all pervasive!  O pet daughter of Himavan!  Unable to bear anymore, I seek refuge in you alone.

caraNam 2: O courageous battling with demons!  One with majesty resembling the ocean!  One with soft voice, rivalling the cuckoo.  Unable to bear the sorrow, when I take refuge in you, why do you doubt?
caraNam 3: O bestower of harmony!  Gauri!  O axe,  that fells the jungle of wrong actions!  One who rambles about in the flawless heart of Tyagaraja!  O dharmasamvardhini! Omkari!

lyrics: k lamu bOnu mATa nilucunu, kalyANarAma nAtO
tallitaNDri nE nuNDa takkina bhayamEla yani palum ru nI vennO
ilalO sarivAralalO ententO brOcucuNDi peddalat balki meppinci
meaning: Lord, I wonder what pleasure is it to you to speak lies to me? Remember, time rolls on, words alone remain. How many times have I had
assurance of your parental concern! You assured me, "There is no need for any apprehension on that count." Many a time you have assured me,
"When I am your mother and father, why have fear?" You have favored many of my peers and even assured and kept up your word to great men. By this battery of lies to me, what pleasure do you derive?
other_info: Lyrics contributed by Lakshman Ragde. Meaning from Compositions of Tyagaraja

name: cootaamu raarE
lyrics: sarigancu shAluvaTa caukaTla pOgulaTa paruvampu prAyamaTa
mukha nirjita candruDaTa muddumATa lADunaTa sukha mosangi
meaning: Oh Ladies ! Come along and join in to see Rangapathi !
Aadhi Kavi VaalmIki says that Sri RanganAthA was worshipped by
Sri RaamachandrA . He is indeed the treasure house of all charms.
He is wearing today a shawl that is priceless. He adorns beautiful
ear ornaments. He displays His saamudrikhA LakshaNams befitting
One of prime age ( paruava vAlibhan/ILankumaran ). Above all these
aspects of His matchless beauty , He is indeed the Parama-
Purushan celebrated and saluted by the VedAs and Upanishads as
the SarvAdhAran , JagadhAnandhakan and Jagath Rakshakan .
His most beautiful face defies the full moon in its beauty ;
His words are spoken with such maadhuryam , which makes His speech
liltingly sweet . He confers the bliss of happiness ( Aanandham )
on His devotees. He is the most lovable personality with whom
one readily falls in deep love. He permeates all aagamAs and
the VedAs .Oh Ladies ! Please come forward and enjoy the beauty
of this Lord of Srirangam .
other_info: Composed on Lord Ranganathan at Srirangam, and shows nayaka-nayaki bhava as described

mama hrdaya kamala nirantara jagannAtha - resides permanently in my heart

Adi madhyAnanta rahita - devoid of beginning, middle and end

mama rakSaka - protector of me
vanaja nayana - lotus eyed
rAdhAmukha madhukara rasika - enjoys the honey dripping in Radha's face

navarasa kaTitaTa - waist emanating nine bhaavas (??)
shObhita vallabha - adorns
nava vrajayuvatI manOllAsa - rejoices in the minds of nine vraja girls.
kanaka maNimaya nUpura dharaNA - wearing golden gem-studded anklets
kamala bhavanuta shAshvata caraNA - One whose feet are permanently worshipped by the one born out of lotus (Brahma)
kalpita kali kaluSajvara mardana - Killer of the punishing fever of kali
yuga
kALinga nartana katitha janArdana - one who danced on [the snake] Kalinga

name: naadasudhaa rasambilanu
lyrics: svara mUlArunnokaTi ghaNTalu vara rAgamu kOdaNDamu dura naya
dEshyamu triguNamu nirata gati sharamurA sarasa sangati sandarbhamu
gala giramUlurA dhara bhajana bhAgyamurA tyAgarAju sEvincu
meaning: O Mind, do drink the nectar of nAda! SrI rAma is the incarnation in human form of the eternal Omkara nAda, which is the nectar essence of the VEdas, epics, and sciptures. THe rAgas with their flowing grandeur and soaring majesty have become the towering and awe-inspiring kOdaNDa bow. The seven (6 + 1) musical notes constitute its sweet jingles. The three gaits ghana, naya and dESya of rAga singing constitute the strongs of the bow. The myriad rhythmic gaits have become the numeous arrows, the juicy interpretations of the rAga nuances. SaNgatis make up his sweet and soft speech appropriate to the occasion. How extraordinarily fortunate and blessed this TyAgarAja must be for this gift of the Lord!
From Compositions of Tyagaraja by T.K. GOvinda Rao.

name: pApigaLolagellapApigaLolagella
lyrics: pApigaLoLagella nAnu veggaLanendu tiLiyalilla dayArUpa krpAmbudhi nInalladillaventadariyalilla
kAlgaLindali tIrtta yAtreya nAnantU mADalilla hari pAlkaDalashAyi ninna divya katheyannu kELilla
kULgaLAsheyinda ninna naivEdyavanuNNalilla intha sAlgaLa pApadim enna pAlipa svAmi nIneyalla
kaNNugaLinda ninnaya divya mUrtiya nODalilla shrti sannuta mahimeya anudina nAnu koNDADavilla
heNNu honnu mecci ninna dAsara dAsya mADalilla muni sannuta varapAda padma yugangaLa smarisalilla
karadinda ninna sumUrti pUjeyannu mADalilla iha para eraDanu biTTu viSayadoLanudina bALvenalla

jagadoLagennanthA pApigaLinyAru illavalla hari suguNa pUrNa ninnantha krpAmbudhi jagadoLilla
nigama gOcara ninna mahA mahimeya nAnu tiLiyalilla I jagadguruvina guruve purandara viTTala nInalladinnilla

gangaoyinAlE hari hari jaya vijayIbhava enum oli aNDamugaDupaDa karuNaiyinAlE
vaTTa veNkuDaiyai candran piDikka vaNNa malargaL aLLi rambhaiyar teLikka
iSTamuDan nandi bhErikai aDikka ezhilAgha mayilinam azhagODu naDikka
ishai pADiDum gandharvar kinnarargaL izhaindu tandadai vINaiyil muDukka
ishaindu neLindu Adum vidyAdharar ezhiligaL koNDaiyil tIghaiyai muDikka
ashai maranda mALinam pEDugaL shila atishayam adil giri Adi kudikka
hari hari jaya vijayIbhava enum oli ANDamugaDupaDa AhAyam iDikka
tumbur nAradar gItangaL pADa kAdai tuLaikkudenrAyargaL karattinAl mUDa kaNNan
vambivai AghAdenru jADai sheidu pODa kaNNA un vaNNak-kuzhalishaikku nErAdenru pADa

lyrics: ranga koLalanUdalAgi mangaLamayavAitu dhare jagangaLu caitanya maredu anga paravashavAduvu
tIDida mAruta mandagati geida pADida alaru bala goncalu biDE pADalollavaLi kulagaLu pADida mAmara cigurOdeya
hEDi koNDavu jANvakki giLI mAtADade kaLe kundiduvu kOgile OdaTa vairATa biTTu khaga mrga kATha nidrA vashavAduvu

naLina campaka nAga punnAga pATala shAvantige kunda bakuLavu mAlati jAji parimaLa kUDitu nIlAngananghrikeragidavu
muddu mOhanana manjuLa sangIta saddanAlaisi gOpAnganeyarella buddhi sUrADi Ananda vAridhiyalli biddu paravasharAdaru

keccalu bigidu toreyalu moleyu vatsagaLoDalAseyu toredeLahulla kaccirallalli ninduvu gOvgaLu pucchava negahi nINtisi
acyutanAkrti nODalu surarige AscaryavAyitu nAvu kaNDevendu mecci mukundana lIlAvinOdake heccina kusumava suridaru
shrI manOhara gOpAla mUruti A madhukunja vanadi tribhangili hEmAmbaravuTTu gIrgandha kastUri nAma makuTada beLaginali

kiNi kiNi kuNi kuNi khala khala kastUri sindUra kAshmIra

name: saadhincenE
lyrics: bOdhincina sanmArga vacanamula bonku jEsi tA baTTina paTTu
gOpi jana manOratha mosanga lEkanE geliyu jEsE vADu
vanitala sadA sokka jEyucunu mrokka jEsE paramAtmu-Dadiyu gAka
yashOda tanayuDancu mudambunanu muddu beTTa navvucuNDu hari
parama bhakta vatsaluDu suguNa pArAvaruNDa janma mana ghUDi kali
bAdhalu dIrcu vADanucu nE hrdambujamuna jUcu cuNDaga
harE rAmachandra raghukulEsha mrdu subhASa shESa shayana
para nAri sOdara aja virAjaturaga rAjarAjanuta nirAmaya pAghana
sarasIruha daLAkSa anucu vEDukonna nannu tA brOvakanu
shrI venkaTEsha suprakAsha sarvAnnata sajjana mAnasa nikEtana
kanakAmbara dhara lasan-makuTa kuNDala virAjita harE anucu
nE pogaDaga tyAgarAja gEyuDu mAnavEndraDaina rAmacandruDu
sadbhaktula naData liTla nenE amarikagA nA pUja konenE
aluga vaddananE vimukhulatO jEra bOku mananE veta galigina
pallavi: Oh Mind!! He has achieved his objective
anupallavi: He has, by being steadfast, falsified his own preachings of the guiding light of  Geetha, given to the world by himself.
caraNam (0): Oh! He has spoken according to the time and place!
caraNam 1: Just like the tormenting (deceiving) of Devaki and Vasudeva
caraNam 2: One who is brave in this world stage; father of the sacred Ganges; Totally devoted to classical music from birth to youth
caraNam 3: One who, unable to fulfil the wishes of shepherdess teased them.

caraNam 4: You are the paramathma who charmed the shepherd women and made them worship you. Not only that, your are the Hari who mischievously smiled when innocent Yashoda kissed you thing that you were her child.

caraNam 5: Oh Hari! You show immense love to your great devotees, You are an ocean of good qualities without any sin, I am nurturing in my lotus heart the fond hope that you will remove the problems of Kaliyuga, throughout the
lifespan. Oh lord, I fondly seek you, while I am thus singing your praise.

caraNam 6: Oh Hari! Ramachandra!! The lord of Raghuvamsha!! Possessor of nectar like sweet tongue! The lord who is reposes on the seshanaga; one who is like a brother to otherÂ’s wives; one who is worshipped by emperors; one who has
clean and healthy body; one who has lotus petal like eyes.

caraNam 7: Oh Lord of Tirupati!! Self-Illuminating! The greatest of great! Dweller in the hearts of good people! Adorner of Pithambara; the lord who shines with shining mane and earrings. Thus this worshipper of yours sings the praise of
the king of human race Shri Ramachandra.

caraNa shEsham: Oh Rama! The lord who prescribed and identified the mark of a good man! You patiently waited and accepted my worship. You asked me not to be angry. You thought me that I should not mix with those who do not love god.

You thought me to be patient in the face of adversity, You gave the virtue of controlling the senses and meditating peacefully. Desprite all this your are yet to come to this worshipper of your  Shri Thyagaraja.
meaning: Oh

Lord you are an opportunist, You deceived your parents Devaki , Vasudeva as also the gopikas who surrendered to you, You mischievously smile when Yashoda innocently folded you with love at the thought that she too would be

disappointed on being separated from him, You falsified the aforesaid words of Sruti and Smruti. You have somehow not come to me despite the fact that I was overjoyed in keeping your memory always in my heart, You preached patience,

tolerance in the face of adversity freedom from anger,  satsang etc;  and coolly accepted my pujas, You give bhakti and peace, Despite all this you have steadfastly not come closer to me to the end, Thus this kirthana, a gem amongst the five
kirthanas which bring out the thought and reminiscences of  Shri Thayagaraja; is a great gift to the singer and bhaktas .

other_info: This pancharathna krithi (one of 5 gems of Tyagaraja) has been set on the easiest of ragas, Arabhi. This Krithi has been carved out in a language full  of liberty, teasing tone, metaphor and simile without having a surfeit of adjectives. Thyagaraja in this krithi describes the lord sweetly in this pancaratna compared to the others.

caraNAmbhOruhE samsAra bhItyApahE sakala mantrAkSara guhE
meaning: O Sri Saraswati, Supreme Goddess, I pray to you. Your are adored by Lord Vishnu (Sripati), Lord Siva (Gowripati)
and Lord Shanmukha and are the consort of Lord Brahma.
You are the remover of three longing desires (to acquire land, wealth and women), worshipped by demigods and sages.
You are the bestower of boons to all the gods and people including Lord Vishnu. You are of great fame and repute.
Your lotus-like face always wears a beautiful smile. Your feet are made from the beautiful lotus flower. You remove fear of the cycle of birth and death and hold the secret of all syllables in hymns.
other_info: Notice where the name of the raaga comes in the caraNam (samsAARA BHEEtyaapahE).
Lyrics corrections provided by Rajaram Menon.

name: shrI ramaNa vibhOshrI ramaNa vibhO

name: shvEtAraNyEshvaramshvEtAraNyEshvaram
lyrics: shvEtAraNyEshvaram bhajEham sadA brahma vidyA nAyakI samEtam
vEdAgama vinuta vaibhavam vidhi guruguha sannuta prabhAvam
shvEtAraNya kSEtra vilasitam shvEtAmbarAdi dharam suranatam
bhUtAdi sEvitam shankaram shashidharam bhikSATana vESadharam

name: sundari ninusundhari ninnu
lyrics: sundari ninu varNimpa brahmAdi surulakaina taramA
kundaradanE sanandanAdi vanditE nE nenta tripura
kala kalamanu mukha kaLalanu gani kaluvala rAju bhuviki rADAye celagu nI lAvaNyamunu
gani alanADE valarAju gAnaka pOye nilu varamagu nI ghambIramunu gani jalarAju jaDa
vESuDAye balamaina dhIratvamunu gani  kanakA-caluDu tA shila rUpuDayE tripura
kanulanu gani siggubaDi gaNDu mInulu vanadhi vAsamu sEyanAyE janani nI ciru navvu
kAnti soki shivuDa-nupamamau shubhruDAye minuku sommula cEla kAntula mErupula kani
nimiSamu niluvadAye kanakAngi nI svaramunu vini vANi magani jihvanu tA pUnikAyai tripura
pAvanamanu sEyu biriduni gani bhakta pApamu pAripOnAye EvELa nI dayacEta
sat-kavulella kAvyamulanu shEyanAyE mAvaruniki cellElanu santOSamuna dEvi peddalu
balkanAye bhAvinci nI pAdamuna tyAgarAju bhAvuka manu konanAye tripura
other_info: Describes Goddess Tripurasundari at TiruveTTiyur, as mentioned

name: svAmi unnai (varNam)svAmi unnai (varNam)

sancalam tIra aruL tara tAmadam tagAdaiyA dayAnidhiyE

lyrics: unnilum enakkoru uTrAr yAruNDO oLi mudalE shivamE
uLLum puramu niraivAnadun aruLE uttamamAna maraitaru poruLE
teLLam teLindiDu jnAnamun aruLE shen shaDaimati tannakkAnadu pughalE

vEdAkam murai viLanga varu tigazh v ighirtanE nenja nanniraivE
iDam tEDi unai nADi EttalAmenrAlO nI irukkumiDam mudukADAccE
vaDamAna ponnAram vAngalAmenrAlO vALaravum elumbum paNiyAccE
varamIyum tiramenru vandaNaindAlO piccai vAnguvadum ennalAccE
diDamum nADi unai uravenru tEDa teLindadoru viSayam idu kANum
sheyalum maridAna mAmanum tuNai toDar maghanum miDiyAnadu kANum
nADi vandaduvum inru tara vENum naNNiyam unadu pAdam puNNiyam pera vENumE

name: vADi tOzhi annamE innamEvADi tOzhi annamE innamE
lyrics: vADi tOzhi annamE innamE avar varAda kAraNam nErAghap-
pOi kaNDu varaTTum taruvEn kUli marakatamaNI mAlaiyADa tiru mukha
maNDalam irupuram kuNDalam Ada varaTTum taruvEn kUli
pADip-pala maraigaL tEDinAlum ennE aDi munnODi pAindu tayir
veNNaikku kAindu tiru naTanam shAindADum dAmOdaranaik-kaNDu
maDuvEri kudittAl lEsil ezhundirukka manam vArAdE mAdarasi
annaiyODu konja munaindAl enna nEram pOrAdE mADu padam
koNDADa pongara vErinAl enna ingitam konjum pOdAdE
parimaLa mukha mOhana mandahAsam gOkula paramparaiyil vandadO
dhanam taniyAi vandadO ghanam kuzhiya ninradO

name: vandAr guru puNya bhUmivandAr guru puNya bhUmi
lyrics: vandAr guru pUNya bhUmi mAdhavan shrI rAjagOpAla svAmi parama pAvanamAna mAdhavan
tarumAmukhil nIla nAyakan karuNai mAmazhai sheyyum bOdhakan gAna vENu shrI varadAyakan
candAr paravum tavam shrI kurukSEtram syamantaka pancakam enum tiru tIrtham mundAr pindAr
ilAr enap-pOTrum mUla vizhup-poruL kOla manattaghum mukundan aravindap-padamidO enrO
vidUran ambikEyan virATan sudhAman vIDuman mantra nan nATan yudAman
dhrupadan kripan kunti bhOjan varIman padinAlu kOTTu paNayamuLLa mAman
kunti subhadrai kAntini rOhiNi kOsali dEvaki rukmiNi bhAmini
nandini bhAnumati indirai mOdini lalita kalAvati rAdhikai ambikai
sundari mitra vindai kALindini dhrupada rAjakumAri tilOttamai
kantikai andari gAndhAri alakanandini enavaru sondamuLLavargaL
kapila shuka giri samaka kalashabhava kucika suta hayavadana narapulaka vidhitanayar
kAlava lOmaca gautama kartama kaNNuva rAma parAshara kashyapa
gaNDu mrgaNDu vibhANDaka kuNDalar kAkapucuNDar sanandanar

name: vandE mahEshvaramvandE mahEshvaram
lyrics: vandE mahEshvaram indu kalAdharam vAgIshAdi vinuta vaibhavam
danda shuka nikara dAma shObhitagaLam nandanIya sucIndra nagara nAyakam Isham
bhAsita dviguNitOrusita bhAsam vara paranjAtArtha Tanta krta vAsam purO-
lasita shamyakam pAlitadAsam budha laghu pApa haramati mrdu hAsam carma-
vAsanam bhUta samvrtam vAsava sucikarama sadrsha mahimAnam ambikApraNEsham
harihara suta guha parivrtam matangAnana pOSakama viratam vrSavara
nija vAhana sEvitam mrdu vacana nanditAshESa surajAtam lOka-
sharaNyam gangAdharam shAnta yOginishEvyam smaraNIya padayugam sAmbam shubhakaram
madana dAhaka bhAlatala nEtram tripura mArutOragam dEvanutipAtram vidhu-
vadanam vAsuki kaTi sUtram kunda radanamalankrta rAjata gOtram lOkam
udita rathOtsavam mOhanatama rUpam padanata sadyam shrI padmanAbha tOSiNam

name: vAzhvinil tunbamvAzhvinil tunbam
lyrics: vAzhvinil tunbam varuvadum AshaiyAl manamE idi nI ariyAyO
shUzh kaDalulagil shuzhanruzhalAdE Uzhvinai ozhiyavE oru tani vazhi kAN
tIyavai tavirttu shIriya purindu kAyudal kaDindu karuNaiyE ninaindu
shenneri ninriDal shIlamE yAgum en ayyan magizhvAn inbamum kUDum

name: vAzhvu nalamvAzhvu nalam
lyrics: vAzhvu nalam peruga vENDum jnAna vANI ninnaruLAlE
tAzhvu tavirnduyara vENDum engum shakti shuDar poliya vENDum
arivu niraivu pera vENDum uyir Atral UtreDukka vENDum
piravi perumai pere vENDum engaL pEccellAm sheyal pera vENDum
uDalil uzhaippu migha vENDum engaL uLLam oNmai pera vENDum
kaDalirk-kalakku nadi pOlE manam kaDavuLiDam kalakka vENDum
panjam piNi maDamaiyinri indap-pAril vaLam peruga vENDum
anjA urimaiyuDan mAndar uL anbAl orumaiyura vENDum
ucca malaiyaruvi pOlE nAm Urukk-udavi vara vENDum
paccaip-pashum payiraip-ppOlE nam pArvai manam kuLira vENDum
kalvi sirandoLira vENDum yOgak-kalaigaL siddhi pera vENDum
selvatt-tozhil sezhikka vENDum kula kSEmam sezhittu varavENDum
nalla pugazh maNakka vENDum nALum unai vaNangi varuvOm

name: vElava vaavaavElavaa vaa vaa
lyrics: vElavA vAvA aDiyEn miDi tIravE vaDi
vElavA ninmEl avAmighundu OlamiDum enpAl ughandu
en sheivEn eLiyEn enakkirangAyEl en ayyanE kavi kunjaradAsanukku gati
vEruNDO shol tUyanE vana shen shararavaNattuditta panniru kanjamen malark-
kaiyyanE tanjam enraDaindEn ayyA nI anjal anjal enameyya nI

name: vEnkaTaramaNa vEdAntavEnkaTaramaNa vEdAnta
lyrics: vEnkaTaramaNa vEdAnta ninnaya pAda pankaja kaNDa mEle
kSIra sAgarava pondidava madisida nIru majjige kANane cAru
sArva bhUpAlana sUnu enisidavage sure kULina tiruke nAri
sura nadiyali mindu shuciyAda mElinnu duritagaLaTTuLiye
parama puruSa ninna pondiirda dAsarge arigaLa bhItiyuNTe
garuDana mantrava kalidu japisuvage uragana hAvaLiye
hari pakkadoLu mane kaTTda naranige karigaLa bhItiyunTe
parama puruSa guNa pUrNa nInahudendu marehokke kAyo enna
uragAdrivAsa shrI purandara viTTala parabrahma nArAyaNa

name: vEnkaTEsha bEDikombevEnkaTEsha bEDikombe
lyrics: brahma shankarAdi vandya enage mukti tOriso
naSTa modalAdantha kaSTa biDiso ninna paTTada rANige hELi padavi koDiso
ISTa bhakta janaroLu enna sEriso I shrSTiyoLu ninna dAsa dAsaneniso
uTTu uNDu mikiddella enege hAgiso bombaTTaloLagina hAlu ucciSTa hAkiso
gaTyAgi sakkare tuppa roTTi uNNiso munde huTTi bahu janmangaLa enage biDiso
kiTTagaTTida kabbiNakke puTava hAkiso utkrSTa bangAradoLu enne sEriso
beTTige ungura mADi enna dhariso svAmi diTTa purandara viTTalane dayadi pAliso

name: yaadavaraayayaadava raaya
lyrics: rAdhA muntAda gOpiyarella madhusUdana ninnanu sEvisutire
suraru ambaradi snadaNisire apsara strIyaru mai maretire
karadali koLalanu Uduta pADuta sa ri ga ma pa da nI
hara brahmaru nalidADutire tumburu nAradaru pADutire
aravinda daLa nayana kr.shna karugaLa sahitale
siri kAgineleyAdi kEshava rAya tarugala sahitale
pallavi: While the yAdava prince (Krishna) is playing the flute in Brindaavana...
anupallavi: Radha and other Gopis serving you, all the gods in
the heaven crowding to look at you and the apsaras (nymphs) forgrtting themselves (at the sight).
caraNam 1: (While you are) playing the notes with your flute and
singing, trimoortis (Brahma, Vishnu, Shiva, the three main gods) are rejoicing and Sages Tumburu & NArada are singing along.
caraNam 2: Lotus eyed Krishna, kAginele AdikEshava (the composer) along with cows and calves of Gokulam (while playing flute in Gokula), are enjoying your music.
In the second caraNam, it may be "tiruguta mellane varagOpAla." Some corrections by Harish.

name: yAvAgalu hElabAradeyAvAgalu hElabArade
lyrics: yAvAgalu hELabArade vAsudEvane kai biDa bEDavendenutali
ikki erevarilla iSTa bandhugaLilla akka tangiyaraNNa tammarilla
okkaDiyAgi nA baLaLuttali sadA dukkha paDuvenendu rakkasAntakanoLu
maDadi makkaLu illa oDave vastugaLilla paDeda tAyi tandeyobbarilla
eDavi bILutalire etti kombuvarilla oDeyane kai biDa bEdavendenutali
mADiTTa maneyilla kUDiTTa dhanavilla Adisi koLLalu makkaLilla
pADi ninnanu stuti mADuvenendare mUDharoLage balu mUDhanAgihenendu
iSTara mEle kai biTTe yAdere innu shiSTaru nODi nagadihare
iSTArtta koDuvantha dEvanallavendu shrSTiyoLapa kIrti taTTade iradendu
mOkSa dAyaka vishvarUpa vishAtmaka sAkSi svarUpa sarvEshvarane
sAkSAtu shrI guru purandara viTTalane rakSisa bEkendu lakSmI vallabhanoLu

name: yOga samAjamyOga samAjam
lyrics: yOga samAjam ulaga samAjam Om shuddha shaktiyin oLi maNIk-kOyil
dEha vAzhvai nalla tiruvaruT-kalaiyena sheidiDum amudinai uidiDap-peidiDum
ulagamE kOyilAi uyirt-toghai sAmiyAi nalam adE orumaiyin nALellAm sEvaiyAi
pala matha orumaiyin paNbinai nATTIyE bhArata shaktiyin vIru peTrOngiDum
bhaktiyum dhyAnamum jnAnamum mOnamum paNNuDan paNigaLum eNNaru tozhilgaLum
nittiyam iyaTriyE nimmatiyAi vAzhum nEyar nalam perugum tUya tava nilaiyum
kaDavuLE talaivan kANikkai manamE kani mana sAkSiyE iniyavuLLAsAn
kaDamaiyE sAdhanam karuNai nivEdanam kANuyir kaLittilE kaivalya cEtanam
pala kalai pala mozhi pala matham pala tavam pala nilai nADuru paNbari naNban
ilagu shuddhAnandan idayattil ezhund-ulagengilum mangalam pongiDap-polivadu

name: karuNAnidhiyin appanEkaruNAnidhiyin appanE
lyrics: karuNAnidhiyE appanE endaiyE abhirAmam pADiyE porkkazhal paNindEn
karuNai vAriyE varuvAi taruNamE tiruvAi malarndE taruvAi AsiyE
arunAL kalakE vaTTamAi vaguttE AreTTE adilum reTTittE ninra
nuNmaiyin nAdatil layittiDum nAthanE uNmaiyE uraittiDum abirahAm dEvanE

name: navaraatrOtsavanavaraathrOthsava
lyrics: sarva shakti cAmuNDEshvari sarva bhAgyadAyini gauri parvatEndra
sukumAri  bhaktajanA akhahAri garva rahita jaya nAlvaDi krSNarAjEndra
hrdaya kamalavAsa harikEsha kAmini poreyaLa manOnmaNi

namata sajjana durita shamanE amita mahima guna pUraNE
mama santApa hara sAdhanE vimarshanAnda nAda hrtsadanE

here

name: aanandaamruta
meaning: Oh ShivE! Bhavaani! You charm the nectar like bliss. You cause the rain
and
you are worshipped by Shiva and others.
You protect Vishnu and others and you are the mother of prosperous
Guruguha. You are of the form of knowledge and dwell in the heart of those
steeped in bliss. You are the compassionate one. I meditate on you always
to shower heavy rain at once. Please send rain more and more abundantly.

andhattil oLirndiDum nArAyaNa nAmam amudAi init-tAdi mudalvan enrarivikkum

svara rAga laya shruti marmambulu nAradAdi munulu upadEshincE
vara dAyaki amrtavarSaNi maravaku lalitE tyAgarAjanutE

name: siddhi nAyakEnasiddhi nAyakEna
lyrics: sakala suguNAkarENa shankara priya sutEna a-sahanAdi durmArgacara mardanEna
a-sadrsha muraLIgAna ravaLI mOditAntarangENa karuNadAna guNa karENa karimukhEna

name: sudhaamayi sudhaanidhi
lyrics: sarasijAkSi jaganmOhini sarasarAga maNibhUSaNi harikEsha priya kAmini AnandAmrtakarSaNi
meaning: by Raghavan Jayakumar
One who is the source of the immortality nectar (drinking which one becomes immortal), one who is the wealth of nectar (Spring of wealth), One who walks slowly, One who holds a sugar cane as a staff.

Sudha- Nectar (Spring, Amritha), mayee �woman filled with (or source of), nidhi- wealth, suma- slow, chara- walk, Ikshu- Sugarcane, KOdandam- Staff held in hand  (or sumacharekshu; suma - moon, akSu - axle, the center of the moon's orbit)

One who is venerated by Brahma and Indra, One who is loved by those who are without blemish (Vimalacharithe- One with pure character or life), One who is the essence of the Vedas, Mother Goddess Vijaya (Victorious, auspicious).
Vidhi- Brahma, Indra- Lord of Devaas, (vi)nutha- venerated, vimala- without blemish or dirt, (vat)salaha- loved by, saara- essence, ambika- Goddess

One who has lotus eyes, On who is the most beautiful in the Universe (One who attracts the whole Universe), One who wears excllent and lovely gems, One who has attracted the love of Harikesa (Vishnu) One who showers the nectar of bliss.

Sarasija- lotus, aksha- eye, jagat- universe, mohini- woman who attracts, beautiful, sarasa- Excellent, raaga- musical raga, lovely, pleasing, maNi- Gem, bhushani- woman wearing, Harikesha- Vishnu (Hari and Keshavan), priya- loved, kamini- who is loved, aananda- bliss, joy, amritha- nectar of immortality, varshini- who showers, rains.
other_info: Lyrics contributed by Ravi Srinivasan, corrections from Cuddalore Kumar. Meaning by Raghavan Jayakumar.

name: vaanulagu neervAnulagu nIr

name: abhimaanamu lEdimiabhimanamu lEdhimi
lyrics: mAli mincukaina lEda tannu mAlina dharmamu galadA vana
mAli nApai daya rAdA pAlu mAlina guNa mikanaina
kaluvaramulu vina rArA pOkalu nIku galadani nE
rAju nIvani namminAnu gajarAjunna viDamu vinnAnu
rAja dAsula vEDalEnu tyAgarAju nIvADani pEru

pallavi: Have you no affection and regard for me? Do you also belong in the category of those who do not mean what they say? Have you no patience to discriminate and attend to things on the basis of priority?
caraNam 1: How can you,  with fairness, disregard me as I wait for you, and you attend to other matters?  Can you shed your unwonted lethargy just to attend to me?

caraNam 2: I do not need any of your wealth, keep them with yourself.  I need only your grace, your grateful glance.  Knowing that I am in distress, please come, I am not aware of your various activities.

caraNam 3: I have faith in you as the Redeemer.  I have heard that you rushed to the succor of Gajendra on hearing his distress cry.  So, you are known to give solace to the sufferings of devotees.  I am famous as Rama's devotee.  I shall not ask anything from those sold to carnal pleasures.
meaning: pallavi: Have you no affection and regard for me? Do you also belong in the category of those who do not mean what they say? Have you no patience to discriminate and attend to things on the basis of priority?

anbu malargaLellAm un pAdam vaittiTTEn haranE en guruparanE unadu sharaN

name: bhagavAn samayOyambhagavAn samayOyam
lyrics: bhagavAn samayOyam mayi bhadra kaTAkSam sakrt kartum
cAru kalAnidhi lalita kalApa cAmIkara bhU dhara varacApa
mAra vIra krta kOpATOpa mahitA vimala vijnAna svarUpa
dArita ghana dakSa kandhara brndAra kAli rakSa nipuNa
murAri krtakaTAkSa amrta rasa pUra bharita bhIkSa
nAradAdyudAra pakSa vara parivAra shArada nIrada nibha sharIra
vArita vinata janAkhila shOka pUrita vAncita sakala shrIka
bhUri tarApa jala nidhinauka dhrta kOmaLa padanALIka
bhIma gajAsura ghana mada haraNa bhIta vinata jana vipaduddvarana sAmaja vara
carmAmbara bharaNa sakala lOka sampUjita caraNadhAma nidhi nivAsa darakundAbha
mandahAsa jagadabhi rAma mukha vikAsa atyanta ramaNIya vilAsa bhIma bhava virAmakara
suparva su-lalAma padam lalAma vilasadaLika haimavati mOhana divyAnga amita dayA
rasavilAsada pAnga kOmaLakara parikalita kuranga kuru mudam mama vrSabha turanga
kailAsAcala viharaNa lOla kara kamala kalita Damaruka shUla bhAla vilasita
jvalana jvAla lIlA kabalita sumahAkSvEla kAla mada vidAra avita mrkaNDu muni kumAra
druhiNa kapAla kaNThahAra Ashrita hrta padma shubha vihAra hEli ghana rAgAli haraNa
caNa nija mauli simhakElI dhrta saridvara hEla nirmita vishva virOcana nALikAri jvalana
vilOcana vElA tIrtha bhavArthi vimOcana vinA tvAm mama na gatih-kAcana

name: candram bhaja
lyrics: candram bhaja maanasa saadhu hrudaya sdrush.am
sh.ankara mowLi vibhooshaNam sh.eeta kiraNam caturbhujam
viraaN manO jananam vidhum kumuda mitram
notation: at Shivkumar Kalyanaraman's Krithi Archive. Also, listen to the music class

name: candram bhaja mAnasacandram bhaja mAnasa
lyrics: indrAdi lokapAleDita taresham indum SoDasha kalAdharam
shankara mauli vibhUSaNam shIta kiraNam caturbhujam madanac-
chatram kSapAkaram venkaTesha nayanam virANmano jananam vidhum
kumuda mitram vidhi guruguha vaktram shashankam gISpati shApAnugraha
pAtram sharash-candrikA dhavaLa prakAsha gAtram kankaNa keyUra hAra
mukuTAdhi dharam pankaja ripum rohiNI priyakara caturam

name: dasharatha nandana
lyrics: dasharatha nandana dAnava mardana dayayA mAm pAhi
cAlunu mAyA jAlamu cEya jAlanu tOyajAlayA rAya
manasuna nArImaNulanu gOri janulatO jEri jeppa
dhanikuni nenci tanuvunu benci vanitala kAnci
nE paradEshi nErpuna gAsi bApavE dAsi pAvanu
sarvamu nIvu sArEku rAvu garvamulu lEvu
valaciti nIlavarNa sushIla calamika nEla svAmi
meaning: O son of Dasharatha! Destroyer of Rakshasas! Show
me mercy and protect me. Enough of your deceptive tricks. I can no longer stand
them. Lord of the lotus heart! I am a stranger to the path of righteousness. Realising the
hopelessness of my plight, do condescend to come near me and purify
me, ridding me of my moral depravity. With an attractive blue complexion, beautiful eyes
and virtuous attributes, how long do you propose to sleep on your serpent couch
disregarding the cries of distress of your
devotees? Shed your anger and pray protect me now.
notation: at Shivkumar Kalyanaraman's Krithi Archive. Also, listen to the music class
other_info: Lyrics contributed by Lakshman Ragde. Meaning from Compositions of Tyagaraja by TK Govinda Rao.

name: dEva pAlayadEva pAlaya
lyrics: dEva pAlaya murArE dEvakI nandana shaurE dEvarAja sahaja vAsudEva puNya nicaya mAm
tAra shObhi manju hAra tArADhipa sAmanana mAravairi cApahara mArakOTi samakAra
sArasadaLa nayana sArasAlaya nAyaka bhUri dukkha samsAra tO bhUri dayayA paripAhi
ambarana dIvAsa pItAmbara dhara gOvinda kambu kaNTha kara dhrta kambu vakrala kuTaka bimbAdhara rAdhA dhara bimba lOla gOpavEsha ambujanAbha shrI krSNa ambujAri kula dIpa

name: E panikOE panikO
lyrics: E panikO janmincitinani nannenca valadu shrI rAma nE
shrIpati shrI rAmacandra nI cittamunaku teliyadA nE
vAlmikAdi munulu narulu ninnu varNincina nAyasa dIrunA
meaning: Available
here

name: eppaDi yAn ariyEneppaDi yAn ariyEn
lyrics: eppaDi yAn arivEn un mAyattai enner-iyambiDuvEn
seppaDi viddai pOlE jagamellAm tOTri nI sheivadellAm sheidum sheyyAda rahasiyam
siridinum siridAgap-peridinum peridAgit-tirbillA viyalbAgit-turiya param poruLAi

name: Ezhai azhudaEzhai azhuda
lyrics: Ezhai azhuda kaNNIr iraivA unadu nenjam iLaga sheyyavillaiyA
tAzhai maDal viriyum taNpozhip-pazhaniyil vAzhumurugEshA vAsavan marugOnE
mAzhaimNi manril mAnilam tOnra shei mAperum kUttanin mAmaNiyE enran
pizhai aghaTriyE piraviyai aruttALvAi pEsharumei nilaiyE pErinbamE aruLE

name: janakajaa samEtajanakajaa samEtha
lyrics: sanakAdi sumuni gIta sajjana gaNa pArijAta
dEva dEva sakala jIva bhuvanEsha bhAvajaripu bhAva sadana bhavya guNa maNi
jalajAbdta kulambhO nidhi jalajahara parEsha jalajAruNa caraNAsura jaladAshuga
shyAma sundarAnga rangashayana vigada mAya tAmasa jana hrdayadUra

name: kaakutstha tilakuDukaakutsta thilakuDu
lyrics: hA kaTAkSa vihInuDi taDani erugaka pOtinakaTA
mIralE gatiyanucu dinamE mArakanu nuti jEyasAgina
dIna rakSakuDitaDani yala dEvatalu goluturani vininE
bUni kolcina phalamugaNTini pUjyamuga sarivAri lOpala
mETi doreyani bUni kolcina bUTavaDi rakSimpaDAyenu
dasharatAtmaju dharma guNamula dharma yuktamulai velingenu
dikkumAlina janulakellanu dikku nEnani sakala dikkula
nekkonaga danakIrti makkuva dakkinADagu dikku jUDaDu
bhadra shaila nivAsuDaDu tama bhaktavaryula bAdhalupaDu

name: kAriruL keLaviyEkAriruL keLaviyE
lyrics: kariruL keLaviyE kavalaippaDum pOdu kAlaiyin pon mukham kATTAi
Aringu tuNaiyena varundiDum pOdu nI anbuLLa naNbanAi varuvAi paramA
vanja nanja nari pulimayak-kATTilE vazhi naDattit-tuNai taruvAi
anjavarum paghaiyiDargaL aghalavE aruT-kanal vIsuvAi guruvE Om sharaN

name: kumArasvAminam guruguhamkumArasvAminam guruguham
lyrics: kumArasvAminam guruguham namAmi pada sarOruham aham shrI
himAdrijA sutam surapatinutam hiraNya maNi kuNDalAlankrtam bhramAtmaka
vishvakaram suravaram bhrAnti hara catura taram shubhakaram
kArtikEyam bAhulEyam kAncanamaya dEham shikhi vAham kArta svarahAram
shrutisAram garvita shUrAdisam hAram pUrti vidyApradam tatpadam mUrtikaram
mUla a-jnAna haram kIrti shAlinam vinata shUlinam Arti bhanjanam ashESa ranjanam

name: lEkanaa ninnulEkanaa ninnu
lyrics: lEkanA ninnu juTTukonnAru Eka hrdayulai nityAnandamu
shrIkara karuNAsAgara mirUpama cinmaya shrta cintAmaNi nIyeDA
saundaryamulalO sukhamu sItammuku saumitriki kanula jADala
sundara mukhamuna sukhamu bharatuniki sujnAna rUpamunasukhamu
meaning: Why do people flock to you?  They are all inclined with the same longing to experience lasting bliss.  Ocean of benevolence!
Bestower of property!  Abode of supreme wisdom! You are indeed the celestial gem which fulfills wishes and desires immediately.

Mother Sitadevi is fascinated by your peerless beauty and charm and is in a state of perpetual bliss.  Lakshmana delights in responding to the slightest gesture of your eyes and serving you accordingly.
Bharata loses himself at the sight of your countenance radiating grace. Shatrughna experiences unalloyed joy  in contemplating you as an embodiment of spiritual wisdom.
The mere thought of your feet lifts Anjaneya to the empyrian heights of devine trance.  O abode of all auspicious attributes!  Bestower of boons to Tyagaraja!

name: maapaala velasi ika
lyrics: mApAla velasi ika mamu brOvaga rAdA shrI rAmacandra
nI pAdamula bhakti niNDraga ninci kApADu shakti nI karamuna nuNDaga
pApa samhAra nA paritApamulanu dunuma nEpATirA karuNa payOnidhivaina shrIpati vidhrta
cApa bANa I pApamati narulApadalanu nE nEpeni jUtunu ApadbAndhava kApADa nIkI parAkEla
dIna rakSaka bhaktAdhIna sAkEta nagarIsha nAmadi padarina sujana mAnAbhImAna pAlana samAna
rahita rOsana nIdu dAsanu dAsuDanu dAnavAntaka mudAna nArada suguNa shIla darigAna santatamu
nAgAdhipa vinuta nAgAri ratha ninu vinA gati neruga nAgarAja hrt-sAgarAbja bhava sAgarAntaka
surAgha hara kanakagA dhIra sura nAga gamana sharaNAgatApta shrI tyAgarAjanuta
meaning: O Ramachandra! Should you not choose to be our family deity and take us under your care ? When you hold the power in your hands to bless us by making us devoted at your feet and protect us, should you not... Worshipped by AdisEsha! Garuda Vaahana! I have pinned my hopes on you as I have none else to turn to. Redeemer of Gajendra! Destroyer of the evils of Devas ! In your might and valor you resemble the meru mountain and protecting us will need very little effort from you.
other_info: Lyrics contributed by Lakshman Ragde. Meaning from Compositions of Tyagaraja by TK Govinda Rao.

name: nammaka nEnammakanE
lyrics: nammaka nE mOsa bOdunaTarA naTarAja vinuta
durviSayambulu manasuna dUraka cEsE ninu nEra
dhana tanaya kaLatrAdulu tamadani buddhiyani ninu
bommariNDlu gAni nera nammaka bhAvamunuyanu ninu
nemmadi lEni janaja maraNamula tolagincE ninu

name: nimmatiyAi irundEnimmatiyAi irundE

guNDuNI nAi pinnE kulaikkAmal pirar kOpap-porAmaip-puyal alaikkAmal
aNDap-puLugarum avatArap-puLugarum aDimai sheidinnuyir kuDikkAmal ayyA

name: nIvE gatiyaninIvE gatiyani
lyrics: nIvE gatiyani nammiti nIraja nayanI dAri jUpavE
dEvAdi dEvulu vandanamu jEyu sAyujya sAmrAjya lakSmI
caraNAravinda pada rENuka cAlu nannu brOva sarva dEva dEvi
maraNa bhayamunu mAnpi nitya divya mangaLamosagu mahA shuddha shakti

name: pada sarOjamulapadha sarOjamula
lyrics: pada sarOjamula nammina nApai parAkElanamma nI
nIdu mahima vini nE sharaNaNTini nitya kalyANi nIrada vENi
vinOdini shAmbhavi sAmaja gamani sArasa lOcani

name: pAhi pankajanAbhapAhi pankajanAbha
lyrics: pAhi pankajanAbha pAhi pankajanAbha bhAsura jaladhAma
mOhana mrdu bhASaNa nAga vairi vAhana vara bhUSaNa dAntatara dEhi nikhila samIhita
su-ghaTanAhita karuNa dEhi shubha mama rahita vidaLanAhivara shayana vAriruha nayana
karivara bhayahara kanaka rucirAmbara kara dhrta dhara cakra shaila
dhrti khaNDita madashaka cArutara karaNa parijana bharaNa sura muni
sharaNa ghana jani maraNa bhava bhaya haraNa kushala vitaraNa
tana ruci jitamara tara mauktikahAra janita satvata tOSa shrI kaustubha
kandanupama vEsha dEvadEva sanaka bhrugu mukha munivara nivAha vinuta
shubha guNa vanaja samapada dIna parivrDha tuhina karakSiyuga vadhrta vipulanaha
kamala jIva nAyaka kalita shArnga kArmukha samita kaiTabhavIrya lOka vishruta
jaladhi sama gambhIrya syAnandUra vimalapura pada kamala natajana samala hutavaha
kamala shashadhara samalapana tilasuma lasita nAsakunda mrdu hAsa

name: pAlaya mAdhavapAlaya mAdhava
lyrics: pAlaya mAdhava mAm anisham mudA sadA nidAnasam
phAlatala parilasita manjuLa hariNa mada tilaka
pannagAri vara vAhana mOhana padmanAbha bhuvanatrya nAyaka
shrIkara yuga sarasija sAmOdapari mrdita caraNatala
cEdimahipatan-udaLana pAka ripu vinuta guNa dIna sharaNa yaduvara
bhAnu bhAsura kirITa shObhita vibhAvarIsha vadanAmalAnupama
nIla jaladasama sama lOkAdi gaNaharaNa nipuNa
kamanIya carita mrdu vacana cailadhAraNa hrtamada dEva parivrDha surucira
sArasAyata vilOcana manjuLa sAmagAna rasikAti manOhara
bhOgi shayana natajana shOkaukha vishama guNa nivasana
bOdhamaya bhuvanamahita nAgavara sama gamana nArada mukha sEvita
sAgarAlaya gabhIra nanda suta sAmajEndra varadArtta suradruma

name: raamaa naa manaviraama naa manavi
lyrics: rAmA nA manavi cEkonumA dEvarAya parAku sEyakurA
svAmi bhadrAcala dhAma pAvana divyanAma girijanuta bhIma parAkrama
darilEni dInajanulanu gAcE birudu bUnitivi khyAtiganu
gurutara shamana kinkara bAdhalaku nI marugu jEriti nannaramara sEyaka
kapaTa mAnasuDani madinI enna kipuDu rakSincu sammatini
aparAdhamulakella nAyelamaitini krpa jUDumi nAdu nepamulennaga svAmi
patita pAvana mUrtivaina nIvE gatiyani yuNTi madilOna
satatamu rAmadAsa bhadrAdri atulita vaibhava gatulacE nelakonna

name: raaraa maayiNTi daakaraara maayiNTi dhaaka
lyrics: rArA mAyiNTi dAka raghuvIra sukumAra mrokkErA
rArA dasharatha kumArA nannElukOrA tALAlErA rAma
kOrina kOrkulu konasAgakanE nIraja nayana nI dArini gAni
vEsAriti gAni sAdhu janAvana svAri vEDali sAmi nEDaina
prodduna lEci puNyamu tOTi buddhulu jeppi brOtuvugAni muddu-
gAru nI mOmunu jUcucu vadda nilici vAramu pUjincE
dikku nIvanucu delisi nannu brOva grakkunarAvu karuNanu nIcE
jikkiyunnadella maraturA ika shrI tyAgarAjuni bhAgyamA

kaNDEn nin ezhil mEniyum gati tarum kazhal koNDEn kali tIrkkum nAmam aham kuLira viNDEn vaiyam tanil
maTrOr pughal vENDEn paNDu valvinai aghaTriDak-kazhal toNDu sheidunnaruL koNdu UyndiDa

name: saari veDalinasaari veDalina
lyrics: vAru vIracunu jUDaka tA navvArigAbhISTamula nosangucu
dUramuna noka tAvuna garjana bhIkaramoka tAvuna niNDu karuNatO
niratamuga noka tAvuna naDucucu vara kAvEri kanyakA mani
vEDukagA kOkilalu mrOyaganu vEDucu rangEshuni jUci mari
IrEDu jagamulaku jIvanamaina mUDu reNDu nadi nthuni jUDa
rAjarAjEshvari ani pogaDucu jAji sumamula dharAmara guNamulu
pUja lIrugaDala sEyaga tyAgarAja sannuturAlai mudduga
meaning: Partially described
here

name: samayamu delisisamayamu thelisi
lyrics: samayamu delisi puNyamu lArjincani kumati yuNDi Emi pOyi Emi
shamata tODi dharmamu jayamE gAni kramamutO manavini vinavE O manasA
sArasau kavitala vini verrivADu santOSa paDi Emi paDakEmi
cEredEsi guDDikannulu bAguga teraci Emi teravakunna nEmi
turaka vIthilO vipruniki pAnaka pUja neraya jEsi Emi sEya kuNDE nEmi
dharanIni dhanakOTlaku yajamAnuDu tA bratiki Emi dayyamaitE nEmi
padamu tyAgarAjanutu nIpai gAnidi pADi Emi pAdakuNDE nEmi
Edanu shrI rAma bhaktiyu lEni nara janmametti Emi ettakuNDE nEmi

name: sharaNam sharaNamsharaNam sharaNam
lyrics: sharaNam sharaNam un tALiNai sharaNam sakala uyirgaLukkum tanipperum tAyE
taruNam adil varum taNmazhai pOlavE aruLiDum annaiyAm Ananda mEghamE
pirai aNi puNNiyan ponnoLir mEniyil polittiDum kAr nilap-pudu malark-koDiyE
viraivinil unnaruL nOkkuDan pAr enrE tiruvaDi tanjamAi aDaindanan nAn inru

name: shrI kAncInAyikEshrI kAncInAyikE

nava pallava kOmaLE prasAdam kuru shyAmaLE naga sArvabhauma bAlE nayana vishAlE

name: shri mangaLavaaNishree mangaLavANi
lyrics: prEmadi vAgvibhavavIvudu sOma vadanE kSEmakara harikEsha rUpiNi tAmarasa pAdE janani

name: valaci vacci (varNa)valachi vachi (varNa)

celuvuDaina shrI venkaTEsha kalasi melasi kaugalinca
(the rest of the varNa consists of ciTTasvarAs in kEdAra, shankarAbharaNa, kalyANi, bEgaDA, kAmbhOji, yadukulakAmbhOji, bilahari mOhana and shrI)

name: uruga vENum murugAuruga vENum murugA
lyrics: uruga vENum murugA unnuLLam enpAl uruga vENum murugA
oru kaDugaLavEnum karuNaiyuDanE nI siriyEn paDum iDar shIghiram pOkkiDa
aDuttaDuttE varum aLavilAp-perum allal ellAm ini illAmal maraiyavE
toDuttiDumOr paNi toDarndiDavE aruLaik-koDuttu en tuyarai tuDaittu viDavE

name: aDaDA nara manidAun ANavaaDaDA nara manidAun ANava
lyrics: aDaDA nara manidA un ANava mAyattai viDaDA
shuDaDA poyyai shuDaDA shuTri shuTri vaLai paTraru mAyattai viDaDA
uLLak-kAmAdigaL uLLE varAmalE taDuDA koLLai pOna pinbu kollai shATri en mUDhA
ennai malaiyAkki Eikkum kalaiyirp-pughAdEDA inbamirukkinrad-anbu nilaiyilE pAraDA

name: adaTTi uruTTi vazhi koNarndALadaTTi uruTTi vazhi koNarndAL
lyrics: adaTTi uruTTi vazhi koNarndAL enreNNi Anandap-paTTAL yashOdai
AnAlum aval oru pEdai aNDa bagiraNDa magaDu muTTi appAlum aLanda
pirAnai oppAnavar engumilAnai parAparanai nirAmayanai dAmOdaranai
edukkEdO sholli mukhastuti pADum Ela malark-kuzhali mAnE ivanaiyum aDakka nAnoru
piLLai Engit-tavamirundu peTrEnE hitam paDuvadAghina mozhiyO inam kamazhvadAgina
uraiyO padam peruvadAgina muraiyO palikkumunam kalikka varum mukhativanai
enakkanrO teriyum teriyumEDi unakku teriyumODi ivan peru mAyan ena
Ezhai shol ellAm ambalam ErAdu enreneikku teriyum onru pOla pala jyOtiDarAnavar
peN pirakkum enru shonnadum attanai jyOtiDaraiyum poyyAkki vaittum ivan ANAghap-
pirandadum enakkanrO teriyum teriyumEDi tAnAgha shirandadum
(C1 contd.) enru anda peN uruvAghina pUtanai tanaiyoru vAtanaiyAghiDa
izhuttu urinji uyiruDan nanjinai azhittu azhittu ninrananO anrE
marattaDiyil mALavi kuLattaDiyil gUrjari nadikkaraiyil Ahiri
kiNattDiyil dhEnukai maDukkaraiyil mOhanam manakkediril Arabhi
naDutteruvil sAvEri ena sALiyODu muraLi gAnam urugumAru peruga pADi
taruNiyaradu manamayanga tANDavamiDum ivanai uLLapaDi yArenru
Ezhai shol ellAm ErAdenrO kaNakku ettaNai nALaDi irukkumO vazhakku-mOzhai
mUttadenra AnrOrgaL karuttu muTrilum sariyAccE mukunda murahari taghundadoru kirukku

name: Aikkiyam AvOmEAikkiyam AvOmE
lyrics: saukhyamAgavE avaravar pulamaikkut-takkapaDi uzhaittu sari samAnamAgavE
sUriya candirar tAraka tulangiDum tUya vAnkuDai nizhalil
nEriya sIriya samanala yOgattil nIr nilam payirena nIDu vaLam peruga

name: alankAra gOpikai tALam pODaalankAra gOpikai tALam pODa
lyrics: alankAra gOpikai tALam pODa AdudE paramAnandam
andamighundiDu nanda sukumAran azhagAna malar pOlum kaik-kuzhalishaikku
viLangAda tALattil vENumenrE kaNNan viSamap-pallavi isaittAlum
viDAdu gati layam keDadu oru murai koDAdu guru layam eDAdu azhagAi
aTa tripuTa rUpaka dhruva Eka ananga maTya jhampai
akSaram keDAdu lakSaNam tavarA azhagura vaLayaLi shen kai
kuTagu jhaNuta tiri kumu kumAti jati kutikaram murai shollum angai
kUDavum gOvindan pAda maNi daNDai kulungudu shruti laya vyavahAra shaNDai
viLangAda tALattil vENumenrE kaNNan viSamap-pallavi isaittAlum
viDAdu gati layam keDadu oru murai koDAdu guru layam eDAdu azhagAi
aTa tripuTa rUpaka dhruva Eka ananga maTya jhampai
akSaram keDAdu lakSaNam tavarA azhagura vaLayaLi shen kai
kuTagu jhaNuta tiri kumu kumAti jati kutikaram murai shollum angai
kUDavum gOvindan pAda maNi daNDai kulungudu shruti laya vyavahAra shaNDai

name: amma dharma samvardhaniamma dharma samvardhani
lyrics: Immahini nI sari yevaramma! shivuni komma mA
dhAtri dhara nAyaka priyaputri madanakOTi manjuLa gAtri aruNa
nirupama shubha gAtri pITha nilayE! varahasta dhrta valayE
ambA kambukaNThi cAru kabamba gahana sancAriNI bimbAdhari
dayAvardhini  shambarAri vairi hrccankari kaumAri svarajita
dhanyE trayambakE mUdhanyE parama yOgi hrdaya mAnyE tyAgarAjakula
sharaNyE patita pAvani kAruNya sAgari aparOkSamugArAdA sahya
kanyA tIravAsini parAtpari kAtyAyani rAmasOdari mA
meaning: Mother Dharmadamvardhani! Take me into your fold.  There is none to match you in this world, spouse of Shiva!

Cherished daughter of Himavn!  You possess the effulgence of a crore of Cupids and eyes resembling a red lotus, your auspicious form has no equal!  You are installed in the sacred 'Shri Pitha'; one wearing golden bracelets in Her arms.  Your concern and responsibility for your devotees have driven me to repose my entire faith in you.  Of unalloyed purity, you are the goddess of valour and prowess.

Mother! Your neck resembles the lovely marine shell Shenka.  You delight in roaming about the beautiful Kadamba forests.  With charming red lips, you have the splendour of a thousand lightnings.  Ocean of mercy! O Kaumari!  You cause joy and happiness to Lord Shiva, who burnt Cupid into ashes by an angry look.  Eternally young, you excelled Tumburu and Narada by your mellifluous voice,  Destroyer of sins!

Embodiment of fortune! O Parvati devi!  Worthy of being worshpped! Adored by the cream of yogis and capable of sanctifying the worst sinners, you are the family deity of Tyagaraja.  Ocean of mercy!  Dweller of the banks of the river Kaveri!  Condescend to appear before me and enable me to have eternal darshana of you O Paratpari!  Katyayani!  Sister of Rama!

name: anupama guNaambudhi
lyrics: anupama gun mbudhi yani ninnu nera nammi anusarincina
manupakayE yunnAvu; manupati! vrAsi mEmanupa mA kevaru
janaka jAmAtavai janaka jAmatavai janaka jAlamu cAlunu
kanakapaTadhara nannu kanakapaTa mEla tanu kanaka
kalalOnu nIve sakala lOka nAtha kOkalu lOkuvaga nicci
rAjakula kalashAbdhi rAja! surapAla! gajarAja rakSaka!
meaning: By beleieving that you are the repository of all auspicious attributes, I have now become your full-fledged follower, yet you hesitate to protect me!  O Lord of Manu race!  Unfortunately for me, I have none of standing, compassionate enough to convey to you my helplessness and the urgent need for your grace.  Should you not on your own initative?  O son-in-law of the great king Janaka!  Your forbearance is reputed to equal that of Mother earth, the mother of Sita devi.  O my father!  My plight cannot stand further delay.
One adorned with rich golden ornaments, why the duplicity in behaviour towards me?  Is it because I constantly think of this treasure of the physical body?

O prop of all the worlds!  Even in dreams I think of you as my only God.  I have heard that enslaved by their unalloyed devotion to you, you have protected Draupadi and the Gopis in their hour of shame by copious supply of saris and clothes.
You are the moon risen out of the royal lineage.  You are the Protector of Devas.  You had protected Gajendra.  You are worshipped by Tyagaraja.
notation: at Shivkumar Kalyanaraman's Krithi Archive. Also, listen to the music class

name: appanum ammaiyumappanum ammaiyum
lyrics: appanum ammaiyum nIyE anrO aDimaiyai ANDaruLvAi aiyA en
oppuyarvillAda prabhuvE nI engE onru mariyAp-pEdai nAnengE Ayinum en
aNuvirkkum aNuvAgi mahattirkum mahattAgi anbargaLin manadil magizhndu
viLaiyADum maNimArbA karuNAkara shambhO mAdoru bhAgA vEru tuNaiyillai en

name: aarO vandennaiyaarO vandhennai
lyrics: ArO vandennai Ashai kATTi maraindAn avanaiyE tEDit-tEDi alaiguden
pEru ariyEn avan Urum yAn ariyEn peTravar yArenak-kaTravarum ariyAr
kaNDa dishaigaLellAm kaNNAlE pEshik-kANAmal oLinda en kaLLan mukham
viNDavar kaNDilar kaNDavar viNDilar vindai muruval sheidOr mantirap-poDi

name: arputa mAyAviarputa mAyAvi
lyrics: arputa vAzhvai nin pork-karam IndEn pongisaik-kuzhalenap-pozhiga nin pugazhE
pazhagiya paNbuDan azhagiya iyarkkaiyil pashu mukham kATTugirAi
engum iruppAi ingum iruppAi ihapara sukhangaLai inidu surappAi

name: aTTa balukuduaTTa balukudu
lyrics: aTTa balukudu viTTa balukudu vandukEmi sEtu rAma? nI
TOTla narbhakula nUtuvu; mari mari tOcinaTTu gilluuvu; shrI
jIvula shikshincaga nErtuvu, ciran-jIvulugA jEya nErtuvurA;
meaning: Rama! How shocking to know that you are capricious and double-tongued!
What am I to do for that? You rock the baby in the cradle and pinch it, too! You punish
men or make them immortal only as they deserve, in accordance with your dispensation. Are you not the
greatest fortune of your devotees?
other_info: Lyrics contributed by Lakshman Ragde. Meaning from Compositions of Tyagaraja by

name: ayyA sharaNamayyA sharaNam
lyrics: oyyAdu ulagOngum un padinen padimEl vIN matipOl viLangum
meyyAi oru taram nin mahimai unai kETTu
manamurugi urugi unai marandiDAdu idu vidamum vandiDum aruL tara
tani marai tandOrkku kaLaivadal un dhIram

name: bhajana  sEya raadaabhajana sEya radha
lyrics: karuku bangAru valva katinentO merayaga ciru navvulu
aruNA bhAdharamuna surucira dantAvalini merayu kapOla
bAguga mAnasa bhava sAgaramunanu darimpa tyAgarAju
meaning: The holy name Rama is constantly on the lips of Shiva, Brahma and the celestials like Indra.  Should not His glory be sung?  Decked in unalloyed golden ornaments, contemplating on His charming face lit up with divine smile, should not his glory be sung?
His rosy lips, array of teeth like pearls and his blooming cheeks, contemplating on which, should not his glory be sung?
Please listen to the counsel of this Tyagaraja and sing in abandon the tarakanama.  It will enable you to cross over this vale of sorrow to spiritual bliss.

name: brhaspatE tArApatE brahmajAtEbrhaspatE tArApatE brahmajAtE
lyrics: A:  mahAbala vibho gISpate manju dhanur mInAdhipate mahendrAdy-upAsitakrte mAdhavAdi vinuta dhImatE
shurAcArya varya vajradhara shubha lakSaNa jagat-traya gurO jarAdi varjitAkrOdha kaca janakashrita janakalpataro
purAri guruguha sammOdita putra kAraka dInabandhO parAdicat-vArivAk-svarUpa prakAshaka dayAsindhO
nirAmayAya nItikartre nirankushAya vishvabhartrE niranjanAya bhuvanabhOktrE niramshAya makha pradAtrE

name: cEDE buddhi maanuraachEDE buddhi maanuraa
lyrics: bhUvAsiki dagu phalamu galgu nani budhulu balka vina lEdA
shrI vAsudEvas-sarva manucunu cintincarA tyAgarAja vinutuni
meaning: O Mind! Give up crooked ideas. By discrimintaion, discover the divine source which can lead you to beatitude. No mortal can escape the consequences of his past deeds,
so declare, men of wisdom. Know that all that exists, is Vasudeva and rest in that realization.
other_info: Lyrics contributed by Lakshman Ragde. Meaning from Compositions of Tyagaraja

name: cidagni kuNDachidagni kuNDa
lyrics: cidAnanda vigrahE ambA jayava nIDu jaganmAtE ambA
madhura vacana mandahAsa suvadana mahEshvari mAmava cAmuNDEshvari
vidhIndrAdi pUjita caraNE vimala harikEsha hitE ambA
madhura vacana mandahAsa vadanana mahipati nAlvaDi shrI krSNa
vidhIndrAdi pUjitE salahau vimala harikEsha hitE ambA

name: cidvilAsa shrngagiricidvilAsa shrngagiri
lyrics: cidvilAsa shrngagiri vAsa shrI shankarAcArya sadgurunAtha
sadvicAraka shAstrAdi kAraka mukti pradAyaka munijana nAyaka
shAradAmbikA candramaulIshvara caraNa kamala pUjita santOSita
bhArati nAma bhavRNava tAraNa bhAvita bhakta bhAvanA caraN

name: dayavODu endandayavODu endan
lyrics: dayavODu endan tuyarODak-kandanE tandiDu abhayam cintai kanindu nI
tuyarODu padaittut-tuDikkum hrdayam ayarAmal aDiyEnai aNaiyum tuNaiyAgi
enna kAraNam tAn enruNara oNNAdu innal memmEl tunbamurap-paNNudE
ten pazhankk-unnai tEDi vandiTTa nAn ninnaruL peravum nimmati uravum

name: dharma mArgadharma mArga
lyrics: dharma mArga pAlasa bhAma dharmO vishatihanta yAtra pApa rahitESu daNDO vidhiyatE
Eva lOka pAlanE niyuktA yAdapi tE bhajantIha viSamatAm kOnu sharaNyAyatE
Evam abjanAbha dUta nikarOyamudira yannApi punarEva mahA vacO yat sudhAyatE

name: E paapamuEpaapamu
lyrics: E pApamu jEsitirA rAma nIkE pATaina dayarAdu nE
nI pAdamulanu gana moraliDite nI pAduna vini vinanaTluNDuTaku
nAda rUpuDavani vini nE shrInAtha ninu nammitini nAda
gAravimpa dayarAdA pAlu gAru mOmu jUparAd  Ura
kuNDuTa mariyAdA nAdurA delpu vArevvaru lErAn-
endukanucu sairintunu rA rAma mundu vEnuka tOcadurA mundara
nilici palukurA nAyandu nIku Ivaraku marapurAnn-
kannavArini vEDinAnA nAyanna ninnADu konnAnA ninnu nammina
vADanu gAnA muni sannuta kapaTamulanni nAtOnAn-
vinavayya ina kula dhanamA rAma ninnu nammi inka duritamA
bhuvanamuna nIkidi ghanamA nI manasituvaNTi danucunu
sadayuDai inka parAkA nA hrdaya vAsuDu nIvE gAka idi buddhi
anucu delpa lEka, nADu modalu gAnu Ura kunnAvu gAkan-
rAjashEkhara sannutAnga tyAgarAja hrdAbja subhrnga rAjita
karuNApAnga rati rAja janaka pApadhvAnta patanga
meaning: O Lord! What nefarious sin of mine denies me even an iota of your grace? What is it that makes you turn a deaf ear to my appeals time and time again? Why do you discard me? O Spouse of Shri, embodiment of NAda! What all can I put up with? I am at my wit's end. Please appear before me and talk to me. This long you have forgotten me. To honor me, can't your compassion flow? Cant you show your child-like, charming face? Is it of any merit to you, your nonchalance? Is this my native place? Is there no one else to plead with you for me? Did I seek relief elesewhere? Have I at any time spoken ill of you? I have reposed faith in you only. O one worshipped by sages! Is all deception by you towards me alone? Full of compassion that you are, why this nonchalance? Aren't you the only dweller in my heart? Instead of guiding me at every turn along the right path, you are stoic since my birth. O One worshipped by the Lord with the crescent! O Bee that hovers around the lotus heart of TyAgarAja! One with a glance full of compassion. Father of Cupid. O Sun that dispels the darkens of sins!
other_info: Lyrics contributed by Lakshman Ragde. Meaning from Compositions of Tyagaraja by TK Govinda Rao.
This song plays on the word "naada" (sound) as mentioned

name: ekkaDUnnAvu nA (j)ekkaDUnnAvu nA (j)
lyrics: ekkaDunnAvu nA cakkani sAmi iccukapu nicEta cikkinE nuNDiti
UrakuNDa inka mEragAdurA mEru dhIra rArA kaugaLincarA
tApasAdhulaku mOhamu vacciti dhyAnamu sEyuTa sAdhyamA ika
pApi mAruDu nApai veDalE nEnu sairincuTa vashamA
enta vEDina pantamElarA kanturUpa shrI krSNarAjEndra
sadAshivuni mUDuva kannula lOkuDa intaTi tApamu vEDuka vEmirA
pUla pAnpupai poralucu ninnE taLapainalayuTaku valacitirA
tALa jAla nI adharAmrtamula celimitO nAkosavudurA
valaputO misalu tiruvutu tadhimi salili Akali vEsurA
jaTAdhIsha rA eravEshurA inTinonevvaru vErurA enna

name: Ela nee dayaraadu (baala kanakamaya)
lyrics: Ela nI dayarAdu parAku jEsE vELa samayamu gAdu
bAla kanakamaya cEla sujana paripAla shrI ramAlOla vidhrta
shubada karunAlavAla ghananIla navya vana mAlikA bharaNa
rArA dEvAdi dEva! rArA mahAnubhAva rArA rAjIvanEtra raghuvara
sAratara sudhA pUra hrdaya parivAra jaladhi gambhIra danuja
madana sukumAra budha janavihAra sakala shrutisAra nAdupai
rAjAdhirAja muni pUjitapAda ravirAjalOcana sharaNya ati
rAjadharanuta virAjaturaga sura rAja vandita pAda-aja janaka
rAjakOTi samatEja danuja gajarAja nicaya mrgarAja
rahita nAgashayana vara nAgavarada punnAga sumadhara
mOcana sadA gatija dhrta padAgamAnta cara rAgarahita shrI
meaning: O BAla! One adorned with rich garments! O Protector of the virtuous! O
joy of Lakshmi! Wielder of arrows! Bestower of auspiciousness! Treasure of
companion! O cloud like hued! O adorned with vanamAla! O DEva among the
celestials! Come. One with great reputation! O Lotus-eyed! Come. One
belonging to the solar race! One who is surrounded by those whose hearts
are filled with nectar! One who is as majestic as the ocean! O Destroyer
of Asuras! One as beautiful as Cupid!
One who converses with the wise! Essence of all the VEdas! You are the
King of Kings, your feet are praised by sages; sun and moon are your eyes,
you bestow refuge, most beautiful, praised by Siva who adorsn crescent ,
you have Garuda the king of birds as your vehicle, Your feet are praised
by DEvendra, father or Brahma, who shines like a crore of suns, you are
like lion to the elephant of demons, your face is like the lotus. O Lord,
why does your grace elude me? You are the Protector of YAgas, praised by
righteous men, meditated upon by ascetics. You are permanent without
beginning or end, recline upon AdiSesha, bestower of boons to GAjEndra,
decked wit the Punnaga flower, remover of sins forever, your feet held by
AnjanEya, the son of VAyu. You are the subject of scriptures and you are
desireless. O Lord, why does your grace elude me? Lord! Your grace still
eludes me. I dread the prospect of your abandoning me forever. Is not this
the right moment to protect me? O BAla, do come in all your majesty
adorned by royal ornaments and reesplendent weapons riding on GaruDa
surrounded by celestials and sages. Let me submerge in the divine
tranquility radiated by your charming countenance. Has not that
transquility been declared by the VEdas and Upanishads as the highest
acquisition and as the Supreme goal of all human spiritual endeavor?
notation: at Shivkumar Kalyanaraman's Krithi Archive. Also, listen to the music class
other_info: This is one of the few songs sung starting with the anupallavi (baala kanakamaya) and then going on to the pallavi (Ela nee). Another Tyaagaraaja kriti,
begins with the anupallavi, citra ratnamaya.
Lyrics contributed by Lakshman Ragde.  This song shows nama japa, and as described
, this song was composed when Tyagaraja finally saw Lord Rama.

name: ellaiyillAda viSamakkAranaDiellaiyillAda viSamakkAranaDi
lyrics: ellaiyillAda viSamakkAranaDi ettanaiyaDi ivanukkena bhakSaNangaL tinna ErALamum nAnavaghai
vaittirundum enna vittagamuLa otta vayadu tOzharoDum munna veNNaik-kaLavADurAnE ennaDi nAn paNNa
pollAt-tanamuLLa sheigaiyinaik-kaNDAl pongudaDi kOpam punnakai pUtta mukhattinaik-
kaNDAlO mangudaDi tApam ellAttukkum mElE onru sholvENaDi yArujjumillAda lAbham
engaL kulattukku vandadAlE inda IrEzhu bhuvanangaLukkum pratApam
puNNiyanukkup-pAlUTTa eNNinAlO pongudaDi Or accam anda pUtanaikku vanda gatiyAgumO
enra eNNam tAnAgudu miccam paNNina dAna darumangaL yAvumE palanarcEDi pODi uccam
bhAggiyam eNNinAl enakku inda IrEzhu padinAlu lOkamum duccam

name: ellAm shivamayamellAm shivamayam
lyrics: ellAm shivamayam ellAm shivamayam ellAm shivamayamE
ellAm shaktimayam ellAm shaktimayam ellAm shaktimayamE
kallellAm pullellAm kADu malaiyellAm uLLum puramum inguLLadum illadum

jnAap-pulavar arinda poruLum aruLumellAm vaNNa uruvum

name: Emani palukuduraaEmani palukudhura
lyrics: bhAmA maNiyau abala svayamprabha bhaktiki mecci mukti nosaginati
pAvanamagu konti paNDuTA kulacE bhAnu puraciyimpa
bhAvamunanatani bhaktiki mecci pavvaLinciti vaTa phaNIvara shayana
janakuni yAgayanu shiramunanunci janakaja tOnu vani mEgiyaccaTi
munijanulanu kani manamuna harSinci anudinamunu vAriyApada naNaceda nani
dalacci vinayamutO ika veravaladanucu canuvunavAri jAki dIrccitivaTa
rAma rAma nanu raccalabeTTi rAyiTi sEyakurA
I mahi nAvaNTi patitula brOcitE nEmi kodavayenurA
rAmacandrapura vara shrI vEnkataramaNa bhAgavata vinuta nI mahima
other_info: Lyrics from Walajapet Venkatramana Bhagavatar's compositions (1991) and contributed by OS Subramanian and Lakshman Ragde.

name: engum illAdoru piLLai peTrALengum illAdoru piLLai peTrAL
lyrics: engum illAdoru piLLai peTrAL yashOdai inimEl avaLukkenna kurai
eDuttu shonnAladu oru apacAram ENDi namakkuL inda vivakAram koDuttu vaittavan
nanda gOpa maharAjan kulamengaNum nirai mangaLa-mudavum paDi padamangaja
tangu taDaiyinri Ashai niraivEra dAna dhrumangaLettanai
gangaiyum kAshiyum rAmEshvaramumAi kaNDa kSEttirangaL ettanai
kaimEl phalanAga uri veNNait-tayir pAlum kaLavADum nIla shamattanai

name: enna vidhamenna vidham
lyrics: enna vidham shonnAlum avaravar ezhuttin paDi naDakkumEyallA(ma)l
cennelODu kannal vilvaiyaiyil shirandu vAzhum mangaLAmbikaiyE ulagil
nADi veghu kOTi dhanam tEDi nAyenavE Odi varum nararukkup-
pADip-pala kalai nUlaip-paDittenna bhAgavata bhaktiyinil manam varumA
vEsiyargaLum Ashaiyenum valaiyil vEghamuDanE kumazhum mUDharkku
dEshikar vand-upadEsittadu dinam pEshilenna pErinba nilai tarumO
AnudalamIdil arivAna Adi param jyOti umAdAsarkku

name: ettanai taram pArttAlumettanai taram pArttAlum
lyrics: ettanai taram pArttAlum nilaittAlum appanE cittam salikkavillaiyE murugA unnai
citta bhramai illai selvA unakkiNai illai attanai kalai nirainda ANDavanE murugA
nIrADi nIraNindu nin malai valam vandu sIrAga nI shonna tiruppugazhai ninaindu
vIrAdi vIran aNNan vinAyakanaip-paNindu nErAga nin kazhal kaNDAl nI tIvinai tIrum ayyA
appanE enrAlE pOdum pazham nI subrahmaNyA enrAl selvamellAm perugum
sirpparan shivan magizhndu sIrALA enraNaittAn appanE pazham nI enrEn arputa kATSi tandAi
EzhaiyAi irundAlum kOzhaiyAi irundAlum vAzha vaittaruL sheyyum vaLLal allavA
pAzhaDikkum AnavattAl pArinil uzhalAmal vAzha vaippAi murugA vAlaiyammai pudalvA

name: gOpa kumara nandagOpa kumArAgOpa kumara nandagOpa kumArA
lyrics: gOpa kumArA nandagOpa kumArA nanda kuvalayadaLa nIla nayana kusumita brndAvana dala
shObha sharIra nIla shObha sharIrA sundara vallava yuvati jana
kucha kunkuma mudrita gOdhuLi virAjita nIla kaLEbara
rAsa manOhara haricandana kairika dhruva mrgamada
tilakAlankrta dhrta avalambita lalita gIta sthanita madhura kOmaLa
muralIdhara karadala naishiki vAma nigA sukharAdaya dOha
samUha parIta ananta shalIla nirantara dayAlavAla

name: hErambAya namastEhErambAya namastE
lyrics: hErambAya namastE hari brahmEndrAdi sEvitAya shiva kumArAya
sUrijanOpAsitAya sura guruguha sEvitAya paramEshvara kumArAya
panca hastAya pAshAnkushadharAya prasiddha gaNanAthAya vinAyakAya

name: iDiyilum puyalilum iLattuiDiyilum puyalilum iLattu
lyrics: iDiyilum puyalilum iLaittu vandEn ayyA en mukham pArAyO ayyA iDargaLait-tIrAyO
aDi nizhal enrum kuDi pughundE ini alaiyAmal ulaiyAmal nilaiyAi irundiDavE
Anava selvarin aDimaiyAi vAzhAdun anbanAi vAzhndiDavaruLAi
kONu manam nimirak-kANumei vazhiyilE koNDenai naDattiDa vArAi
kOvE tannaruT-kAvE ennuyir dEvE ini engE pOvEn un sEvakan

name: idu taghumO duraiyEidu taghumO duraiyE
lyrics: idu taghumO duraiyE unnai eNNiDum puNNiyar kaNNIr viDuvadum
tudi sheyyum toNDargaL tUTriDum duSTarAl midipaTTut-tuyarppaTTu gatiyaTru nirpadum
hInamillAda kirAdakar kaiyinil mAnigaL tavippadum vidhiyO
iraNDaham sheidingE suraNDiDum tiruDarin iDukkiyil oDukkiDal muraiyO
iDargaLukk-illaiyOr karaiyE ayyA evariDam sholluvOm kuraiyai Omm hari

name: ilalO praNataartiilalO praNathaarthi
lyrics: ilalO pranatArti haruDanucu pErevaradirE shankaruDani nIk-
dalaci karagi cirakAlamu madamula daNDa miDina nAyeDa daya lEdAyE
karacaraNa yugamu nosalu bhujamulu dharani sOka mrokkaga lEdA
sharaNanucunu moraliDa lEdA pancanadIsha tyAgarAjanuta nIk-
meaning: Who gave you the name "praNathaartihara" (Remover of the sufferings
of worshippers) and "shankara" (meritorious)? Don't You have
compassion on this dog who cry and fall at your feet?
With the hands, feet, forehead, shoulders touching the ground,
don't I worship you? Don't I plead that I take refuge in you?
O Lord PanchanadIsha!
other_info: Lyrics contributed by Lakshman Ragde. Meaning from Compositions of Tyagaraja by TK Govinda Rao.

name: jagadgurOjagadhgurO
lyrics: nigamAgama sAra suguNa nitya shuddha muktulaina
ilalO manujuDai puTTi iha paramanE nenaru maraci kuladhana nI bhaktilEka unmattuDai
tirigitini calacittamugala nA hrttApamulanu dIrci brOvu calarahita shrI harikEsha saccidAnandulaina

name: jagadgurO daynidhEjagadgurO daynidhE
lyrics: nigamAgama sAra suguNa nitya shuddha muktulaina

nI bhaktilEka unmattuDai tirigitini calacittamugala nA hrttApamulanu

tagha taghavenna alankArangaL shUTTi tANDavak-kudiraigaL sArATTil pUTTi

puttoLitta narkkavari pUccaviri cinnam tannai ponnulagha mangaiyargaL vIsa
punnakai mukhattuDanE cinnam shiru tOzhargaL pOnavarkkum vandavarkkum candaNangaL pUsa

ambalattil Adum kUttan ravu punaiyum arumaip-pittan

mudamitO nA hrdaya guhalO muraLi nAdamunaku tagina

pOTriDa maNNOr viyandiDa viraindu uyarndu nirainda nI
alai kaDalADinEn un malai ErinEn valam vandu nin kOvil karam kUppinEn malar tUvi tiru
mantiram magizndOdinEn nalam tarum nin kazhal aham koNDu nAraNA AtkoL enriDum enranaik-

name: kaNavan enrennaikaNavan enrennai
lyrics: kaNavan enrennai nIr kai piDittAlE pOdum kAdalait-tarugirEn sAmi nAn kalakkamillAda shivakAmi
aNimaNi vENDlEn anbirundAlE pOdum aghattukkAri un sahattup-paNi purivEn
vELai tavarAmal upacAram sheidanbu mAlaigaLai nidam shUTTuvEn
kAlaiyum kadirum pOl vElaiyum tiraiyum pOl kalandu nI nirandenuL irundiDum sukham perak-

amalan vimalak-kaNNan tiu sEvaikku pinbu citta shramamE koNDengengO neDundUram shuTri shuTri
kamalat-tEnuNDa vaNDU pOlE shuzhanru mINDum vimala dvArakai tANDa vazhi teriyAmal

mari kAma madamulaku hitavanucu niSkAma tyAgarAjuku tOcu

shAnti vidEha sutA sahacAri daharAyOdhyA nagara vihAri

lyrics: kOil ulagellAm engal kOmaLavalli kuvalaya rANikkE

engum uDal konDulAvum uyirinil iyarkkai payirinilE
tangum malaiyinil tavam vaLar guhaiyinil tavazhum nadiyinilE
tingaLir-pongum tirai kaDal veLLattil shenkadir uLLatilE
mangaLamAga viLangiDum annai mahA shakti gauri manOnmaNi ammaiyin

tingaLirp-pongum tirai kaDal veLLattil shen kadir uLLattilE
mangalamAga viLangiDum annai mahAshakti gauri manOnmaNi ammaiyin

name: kunru kaNDAlkunru kaNDAl
lyrics: kunru kaNDAl Eri ninru koNDOnai senru kaNDoukku kSEmam uNDAgumE
inrum enrum avan iNaiyaDi onrinaiyE Etra tuNaiyAgumenru pOTrip-paNivOmE
aDiyArkkaruLum koDaik-karamuDaiyavan iDaravar paDuvadai tuDaittu viDubavan
paDiyidanil tanadu padam paNindiDuvOrai kaDait-tETri viDum karuNaikkaDal avan

name: madhura madhura vENugIta mOhamadhura madhura vENugIta mOha
lyrics: madhura madhura vENugIta mOhA madana kusuma sukumAra dEhA
mrdutara pallava padakarayuga varamudita manOhara mOhana giridhara
jaNuta shAstaNaku jEku tatarisA tattit taLAngu takajham takadhit-taLAngu
bahu vidha kaLabha kastUri tilaka gandham sugandham samamsamAgama
kuhukuhu itividha kOkila kalarava kUjita brndAvana sadanA
mAhEndra nIla dyuti kOmalAnga mrdu mandahAsa vadanA
kunda vrnda makaranda bindu samabrndahAra dharaNa
candra sUrya nayanA nAgEndra shayana ramaN rimArisa taNam takiTa
sarimapari tattit taLAngu taLAngu takajham takatika taLAngu takajham

name: mahAlingEshvarAyamahAlingEshvarAya
lyrics: brhatkucAmbA samEtAya krUra pancahatyAdi pApa shamanAya
brahmAdi guruguha pUjitAya mahAdEva jagadIshvara shivAya

name: mummUrtulu gumigooDimummoorthulu gumigooDi
lyrics: sammatiga rAju koDukanaga vinisamshayamu dIrakashrI rAmuni
rOsamutO raghurAmuni guNamula rUDhiga dama guNamula naTu vrAsi
trAsuna niDa sari nilvaga lEdani tyAgarAjanutu-DevvaDO anucunu

name: naarada gaanalOlanaaradha gaana lOla
lyrics: nIrada sama nIla nirupama guNa shIla
nIvu lEka E tanuvulu niratamugA naDucunu nIvu lEka E taruvulu nikkamugA molucunu
nIvu lEka E vAnalu nityamugA gurucunu nIvu lEka tyAgarAju nI guNamula nETu bADunu

name: nI irangAyenilnI irangAyenil
lyrics: nI irangAyenil pughalEdu amba nikhila jagannAthan mArbil uraidiru
tAyirangAviDil shEyuyir vAzhumO sakala ulagirkkum nI tAyallavO
pArkkaDalil uditta tirumaNiyE saubhAgya lakSmi ennaik-kaDaikkaNiyE
nArk-kaviyum pozhiyum pulavorkkum mei jnAniyarkkum uyar vAnavarkkum amba

name: nI panulunI panulu
lyrics: nI panulu jEya nilaciyunnAnu nIraja nayana nityamugA
E pani jEsinanu ilalO nAku I sukhamu galgunA balkurA
kAnanamuna nIdu manasu telisi nI anujUDu jEsina upacAramu vale
janaka sutanu kani samayamunamandu teccina hanumantuni vale
padunAlu gENDlu ninu apEkSinci gAci nI pAdukala bhaktitO pUja jEyu bharatunivale

name: pagavaanivalepagavAnivaley
lyrics: khaga vAhana kaDuvEgamutO vaga dIrcci brOvumani vEDukoNTE
nigamAdi vandya ninnu nammiyuNTa nagumOmutO nannuTa rAdA
tagavEla nAtO daya jEsi brOvu jagamElu gOpAla dAsunipuDu

name: parama dayAnidhEparama dayAnidhE
lyrics: ari dasha kaNTha sOdaruniki lnkApuramuna sthiragApuramu jEsina shrI
jayamu kOrinavi jayuni kirNamuna bhayamu lEkana bhayamosagina shrI
urubalu bANuni kramuladrunci puraripu kailAsa puramu jErccina shrI
nIladhu nAbha sadA ninu golicina gOpAladAsuni paripAlana jEsina shrI

name: parama paavani
lyrics: parama pAvani mAmava parvatarAja putrikE ambE
suravara kinnara sannutE shObhana guNajAtE lalitE kara dhrta
pAshAnkusha suma vishikEkSu cApE kAncipura vAsini shrI kAmAkSi

bhaNDana khaNDana bhaNDa mahiSa mukha caNDa daitya maNDalE ripudaNDE

here
at Shivkumar Kalyanaraman's site.

name: parama pAvani mAmavaparama pAvani mAmava
lyrics: parama pAvani mAmava parvatarAja putrikE ambE
suravara kinnara sannutE shObhana guNajAtE lalitE kara dhrta
pAshAnkusha suma vishikEkSu cApE kAncipura vAsini shrI kAmAkSi

bhaNDana khaNDana bhaNDa mahiSa mukha caNDa daitya maNDalE ripudaNDE

name: pittup-piDittadaDIpittup-piDittadaDI
lyrics: pittup-piDittadaDi ammA un pErinba vAriyil yAn inba nIrADap-
puttalar ponroLir muttu naghaiyilE cittam izhandennai muTrum maranbup-
vIra viDudalai tandAi un vEl vizhiyAl aham konrAi sUriyan pOl oLir kAnti
ennuL tUNDinai Atma shAnti pArellAm kOyilAik-kATTi un bhaktip-paNiyinai nATTi
dhIranAi vAzhena sonnAi inbat-tIyaiyum tandanai annAi ennuLLE nI enrum
unnuLLE nAnenrum en paNi un paNI enradilE mighap-

name: pudu yugam varavENDumpudhu yugam vara vENDum
lyrics: pudu yugam vara vENDum nAngaL pUraNarAi nara nAraNarAi vAzha
idu poruLenrem idayam uNarap-podu naTam puri puNNiyanE nalla
mana vikAramAn-jAti mata bhEdam mArum sama nilai vENDum
enadenadelum shaNDaigaL inriyE ellArum onrAga vENDum
jana samudAyam engumE divya sangam viLangiDa vENdum
unadu saccidAnanda sukhattil uLLam ulAviDa vENDum
shOTrut-tuyar tIra vENDum ular-shOmbal ozhindiDa vENDum
Atral perugiDa vENDum nenjil accam ozhindiDa vENDum
kUTraik-kumaittiDa vENDum unnaik-kUDi sukham pera vENDum shakti
UTRaippErukki ulaginai venringE yOgamum bhOgamum Eka rasamAgum

name: puLLin vAipuLLin vAi
lyrics: puLLin vaAi kINDAnaip-pollA arakkanaik-kiLLik-kaLaindAnaik-kIrtti mai pADip-pOip-
piLLaigaL ellArum pAvaik-kaLambukkAr veLLi ezhundu vyAmam urangiTru
paLLik-kiDattiyO pAvAi nI nan nALAl kaLLam tavirndu kalandElOr embAvAi

name: raama naamamuraamanaamamu
lyrics: rAma nAmamu janma rakSaka mantramu tAmasamu sEyaka bhajimpavE manasA
sOmAruna nEtruDaina shrI rAmacandruniki sari evarUrA
kAmakOTi rUpa rAmacandra kAmita phalada rAmacandra

name: raaraa raghuveeraraara raguveera
lyrics: anudinamunu ninu manasuna kanugoni AnandamAyE dayALO
sakala sujanulu golucu sannidhi gani callanAye dayALO
toDari aDugaDugu kidi budhhiyani santOSamAye dayALO
sumukhamunanu tilakamu celagga gani sokkanAye dayALO
kavagOni bhAvamuna poralaka nIdE kAryamAye dayALO
dasharatha tanaya shubha carita pAlita tyAgarAja dayALO

name: rArArAyanirArArAyani
lyrics: rArArAyani ninu pilicitE rAvadEmO sItA manOha-
rAjIvAkSa nA jIvAdhAramani nammi vacciti nayamuga brOva
pApamulanniyu pOgoTTu vADani pAvana nAmamu encitirA nA cEpaTTi centa cEkonumani
cittamulO ninnE vEDitirA kApADu daivamani kanukoni ninnE karagina manasuna pilicitirA
E pApamO nannu maracitivA nIvu eTulaina nA moravinarA raghuva-

name: sakala graha bala
lyrics: sakala graha bala nInE sarasijAkSa nikhila rakSaka nInE vishva
ravicandra budha nInE rAhu  kEtuvu nInE kavi guru shaniyu mangaLamu nInE
diva rAtriyu nInE nava dhAnyavu nInE bhavarOga hara nInE bhESajanu nInE

rtu vatsaravu brduvyugAdiyu nInE kratu hOma sadbhaktiyu nInEMbr<
nutanAgi ennoDeya purandara viThalanE shrutigE silukada apratima mahima nInE

name: sAmi ninnE kOriyunnadirA (varNa)sAmi ninnE kOriyunnadirA (varNa)
lyrics: sAmi ninnE kOriyunnadirA mA sArasAkSi nIkaina cinnadirA
shrIman mahA mEru samAna dhIruDaina shrI ugra pANDya bhUpAla gAnalOla
nI neratanamunakA nE pogaDa jAlanu sadAmadini ninnu dalaci cAlatami mIri tODitemma
nEnurA - parAkujEya tagadurA nijamu palgitinirA ika birAna rArA dhIrA sukumArA naravara
1:  nIve ghana yOgashAlivi nIvE rasika shikhAmaNiyani cAlavini
Ata pATapallu nIdu kuluku mari jUDu palukulaku mEdi mikala ala bOdika
nimiSavatuDu lella sari sATiyu kArani nAdi palguTunu
karakamadiya kumAruni saramula kedari bedari badari virahamunu tapana kiraNamu kalasi taruni ninu dalaci
