yanaru nI guNamunu cEkonanu sukhakaramulaina mrgamadAdi suma sugandhamul hitavu
lEdanu cunu saiyapai poralusu sArekanu ninnu madilO tALacu cunna celi

name: sArasAyata lOcanasArasAyata lOcana
lyrics: sArasAyata lOcana pAlayamAm amara viTapivara cAru kisalaya su-lalita padayugaLa
mArakOTi manOhara giridhara mA ramaNa sura nAyaka sOdara
pAda nakha himakara ruci vidaLita bhava nirupamatama ghanagada timira
vEdAntAgama vEdya murAntaka vENurava rasikAdi manOhara
pIta rucu vimala vasana yaduvara bimba phala madahatipari lasata dhara
pAdA shESaja nAmalatara guNa bhAnusha shadarhalOcana mOhana
nanda krta sucarita kula jalaruha nAbha kurumama gada hatimayi bhagavan
kunda kuDmaLa bhAsura vararada gOpa dhanudhara kALiya mardana

name: sarasija nAbha kim (pv)sarasija nAbha kim (pv)
lyrics: sarasija nAbha kim mayA krtamapriya aravainda nayanAdhunA
smara nishita sAyaka sannAm mAm prati bhUri karuNa kAmapi vAcam kalayasi nO yadadya
tApamapa gamayitum api mama kim apAra sucarita harasi samayamurudhAm aniketa sarOja bhavAdrta
kAmuka rushamapanIya rasA dharaNAgArinuta dayAmacirENa sAdhu vitanu mAmanu kAmasama sulalAma
pAda pAtukAmasIma vaibhava niradAbha pAlayasi nO kimayi
dhArita nIti parasukha sudhA madhuratara vacana
sAdhaya ramaNa kAmamayi mAmakamiha jagadabhirAma rUpa tAvaka
madhura madhu dEhi para kOmaLamAshu mOdaya ratishu mAmahO
rAsadaLamashEsha jagadhIsha bhASura sAra suguNAlaya cAru ruci mrduhAsa
dAnEbhayA nalOdhArakam aYhANavE mAnasAyAdi bhAmAmAdi shamAmakAyA

name: saukasIkAra krSNan sundara nandakumArasaukasIkAra krSNan sundara nandakumAra
lyrics: saukasIkAra krSNan sundara nandakumAra manOhara su-hrda janahrdaya dhrta dhimi naTana
nakha nakha marakata maNi alankAran nangaiyar uLaN kavarndiDum azhagan inkita nirai mangaLa sangIta
kottuk-kuravagan mallikai davana kurinji mandAra vAram guNam kamazh ponnira vaNDugaL anantam

name: shAradE namastubhyamshAradE namastubhyam
lyrics: shaTrE tirumbum shellap-piLLAi kaTrE kuzhal ishaiya kadir mukham kATTa
paTraTrun kazhal paTrum enakkirangi enraikkum unnaDimai Ezh piravik-kaDal tANDa
munnamarnda dEvi mukham kaNDu mayangi nirkkum unnazhagaik-kaNDu pErAnadam kONDiDa
pinnazhagaik-kaNDu perum tavam sheidu ninru un nAmam uraittazhaikkum en Aval tIrttiDa

name: shree mahaagaNapatim bhajEhamsrI mahaagaNapathim bajEham
lyrics: shrta gaNasEvitam vighna nAshakam vara prasAda dAyakam
sadayam kapilamuni varadAyakam guru sEva shaktam hErambam
gajAraNya vAsinam jyOtirmayam upaniSad sAram panca
kAmEsha nayana hlAdakam nAgalinga vara putram
shrI vidyA cit-prabhAnanda rAja yOgIndra vanditam

name: shreepapriyasrIpapriya
lyrics: tApa sajana mAnasa dhanamA tritApa rahita sapta svaracAri
ranjimpa jEsEDu rAgambulu manujLamagu avatAramu letti
manjIramu ghallani naTincu mahima teliyu tyAgarAja nutuDaku

name: shrI dakSiNAmUrtimshrI dakSiNAmUrtim
lyrics: shrI dakSiNAmUrtim sadA cintayEham sadAnanda vidyAprada guruguha kIrtim
vEdAnta bOdhakam vijaya cinmudrAnkam nAdAnta vEditam nija sanakAdi nutam
vadanAravinda vahni ravi shashi lOcanam vAsudEva kumAra mArahara nandanam

name: shrI kAncIpura nAyikEshrI kAncIpura nAyikE
lyrics: shrI kAncIpura nAyikE shrI kAmAkSi shrI cakra rjEshvari cidrUpi
EkAmrtamUlE EkAnta nanda lIlE haicala rAjapAlE iSTAnukUlE
candra sUryAgni nEtrE shyAmaLa varNa gAtrE gandharva sEvita gAna vidyA shAstrE
mantra yOga pITha shrIkAnci kSEtrE mAtas-suvAsini mahEshvari amba
vINAnAda madhura sammOhini vItarAga bhaya krOdha vinAshini
prANaprayANa bhavabhaya mOcini praNatArthihAriNi pAhi kalyANi
yakSa kinnara nAga dEva ganNArcitE takSa prajApati tanayE dAkSAyaNi
kara dhrta vINE pustakadhAriNi hara hrdayAmbuja hamsa vihAriNi
sarasijAsanE shAradArcitAngri yugaLE parama pAvani saubhAgya padAyini

name: shrI kumAra nagarAlayEshrI kumAra nagarAlayE
lyrics: shrtajana kalpaka pAdapE shrI padmanAbha vadanAmbuja madhupE
manju ramaNita nUpurE karashincita kankaNa bhAsurE
manjuLAnana sudhAkarE nava kanjadaLa kalita vilasita cikurE
niranjanAshaya nikunja kELi rasikE ava mrgamada tilakE
kambu vara sadrsha kandarE jagadamba pAlita vasundharE
bimba phala rucirAdharE lOlambajAla ruci vilasita cikurE
amba kaccavi viTambita daLada sitAmbuja dyuti kadamba kaDambarE
shambarAri hari shambarArcitapadE pada natajana shubhadE
manda gamana jita vAraNE susura vrndavairi vinivAraNE
indirE bhuvana kAraNE kuruvinda danti kisalaya mrdu caraNE
manda hAsa ruci ninditEndu kara kunda vrnda makaranda bindu

name: shrI madhurAmbikayAshrI madhurAmbikayA
lyrics: sOmasundarEshvara manOllAsa karyA kAma sanjIvanauSadha karyA sAmagAnasukha karyA
nAmarUpa vivarjitayA nAma pArAyaNa priyayA samayAcAra pravrttayA shankara guruguha mOditayA

name: shrI rAma nAmashrI rAma nAma
lyrics: shrI rAma nAma bhajanai shei manamE shIr vaLarum ihapara sukham tarum
nIrAr shaDaik-kayilai Ishan (gangai) mukti neri iduvenrannai kAdil Odiya
kAmamAdi aru paghaiyum azhiyum kavalai nOigaL tAnE maraindozhiyum
rAmadAsan nAvilE koluvirukkum raghupatiyin vEdasAra tAraka

name: shrI vaidyanAthamshrI vaidyanAtham
lyrics: shrI vaidyanAtham bhajAmi shritajana vandita bAlAmbikEsham
dhavaLita vaidyanAtha kSEtram dayAsudhA sAgaram trinEtram
avinAsha kaivalyAdi pradam Anandakara mUlAdi pradam
dEvarAjAdi pUjita padam divyAmbara dhara guruguha mudam

name: shuddha paramAtmanshuddha paramAtman
lyrics: shuddha paramAtman jyOti svarUpan abEdhan guNAtItan
shakti sadAshivan sadguru nAraNan attan ammaiyappan allAya kOvA Om
nenjak-kOyililE vaLar nityAnandan avan anju maDangi
arivAna yOgigaL Aviyin AviyAi mEvi uNarvAgum

name: sogasu kAra krSNan sundara nandakumArasogasu kAra krSNan sundara nandakumAra
lyrics: manOhasa su-hrdda jana hrdaya takrta dhimi naTana
nakha nakha marakata maNI alankAran nangaiyar uLam
kavarndiDum azhagan inkita nirai mangaLa sangIta
kottuk-kuravaka mallikai davana kurinji mandAra vAram
guNam kamazh ponnira vaNDugaL anantam kUDudu vAra vAram
mattup-puri aNaindu giru gir gir ena vAngik-kaDaivadu bhAram anda
mangaiyar nenjattil iruppaduvO orumalai shumandiDum navanIta cOran
sA sA ri sa dhi mi taNamgu ni sa rI sa ni kaLangamilA-dazhagu
mukha mati pOluLa mukha maNDalam tatakiTa jhantaNa kuku jhantaNam
gandha kastUri tilaka maNDlam makara maNi kuNDalam takiTata
kiTa tadingiNatom tom tAm takiTata kiTata tadingiNa tom
taddingiNNa tom tAm bhuvana muzhudu aLavu paDu pork-koNDaik-kaTTum

name: sOhamenna bEDelOsOhamenna bEDelO
lyrics: sOhamembO jnAnadinda sAyalille hiraNyaka dAsOhamemba prahlAda dEha nitya muktanAda
nAnE daivavemba mAli sumAli rAvaNa duSTaru tAnavAri hariya jaredu hEge prANa biTTaru
jAnakIpati dAsanemba vibhISaNana sthiti nODikoNDu bhAnu vamshaja dInapOSaNa rAma smaraNe mADu nI
shivane nAnu endu jalandhara bhuvana mAteya munde ninda avana heNDadi mAna keDisi kondemana lOkava hondida
dhruvana pita kai biDalu shrI rAghavana caraNagaLannu bhajisi mAdhavana kaiyalliruva lOkava paDedu sukhiyAgirudariyA
vAsudEva nAnemba pauNDraka nAshavAdanu mundininda rOSadindali dAsarAgada asurarige antaka
bhUsura priya vAsudEvanu dAsa dAsara pOSakAgire seyindali bhajisu shrInivAsa purandara viTTalana

name: taa taa nin paadamtaa taa nin paadam
lyrics: tA tA nin pAdam sadA nAn ninaiya vElAyuda nI
nAthA nAlvEdam tudi sheyyum nI tA tA nija bOdham tA tA Ni
tA tA sangItA mudam kandA tA ningatAmudam sadAshiva sudhA kavi kunjaradAsa

name: tannai bhajikkalAgAdAtannai bhajikkalAgAdA
lyrics: avanaruL inri Or aNuvum ashaiyAdenum AnrOr mozhi uNarndum arivizhandAi andO
shivanaip-pADattanda nAvinAl kallai muLLai shiru matiyAl kAkkai kuruviyaip- pADuginrAi deivam uNDenum vivEkam idanru nanri konra shiva dUSaNai anrO
uyvazhi inRi bhava shuzhalil shikki uzhalAdE rAmadAsan tozhum deivam

name: teLLat-teLindiDumteLLat-teLindiDum
lyrics: teLLat-teLindiDum aruLE un cittattil kuDikoNDa poruLE
kaLLak-kAma mayakkam koLLai koLLAdunnai kaN vizhittiDin oru puNNiya jyOtiyAi
nena UTTiDin uNmai arivAgi uLLattirp-pErinba veLLam adAgiyE

name: tirunAmam karudatirunAmam karuda
lyrics: tirunAmam karuda ini orupOdum maravEn tirupparankunram sirakkum murugA un
peru vAzhvinai inda pirappinil peravum piravAmal irukkum peru pEru peravum
ariyAmaik-kuraiyAlum siriyOrin uravAlum sariyAna neriyai nAn kuriyAgak-koLLAmal
peridAga pizhai pala purinda bhEdamaikkenna parivODu mannikkum paDikkunnaip-pOTri

name: tiruvaruL taratiruvaruL tara
lyrics: tiruvaruL tara ghana vicAramA dInanAna nAn oru bhAramA ambA
tiruvaDiyal adoru tuNaiyariyAp-pEdai dinam oru kaNam unnai marandaduNDO
cintai noNDuzhala viDuvadum dharmamA ammA varmamAsundarEshan
magizh madurai mInAkSi tollai tIra irangik-kaTAkSittut-
kavalaigaL alaiyAi aDimaiyait-tAkka kalanginEnE vErevar kai tUkka
tivalai aruL tara tIrumen Ekkam dayai nidhiyE irangi vandennaik-kAkka

name: tiruvoTriyoor tyaagaraajan (padam)tiruvoTriyoor tyaagaraajan (padam)
lyrics: uruvattilE avarai kaNDa pin OhO nAn enna sheivEn
pArtta kaNgaL pArttadu pOl pArttaviDamellAm enakku
tOnrudaDi sakhiyE tOghaiyE oru vazhi shollaDi
AttirattAl manam padari AshaiyAgi mei melindEn
tOttiram sheidu avarkkum enakkum tondam viDAmal shei sukIrtamuNDu

name: tyAgarAja svAmityAgarAja svAmi
lyrics: tyAgarAja svAmi padAmbujam dinamum paNI manamE (sadguru) gAnalOla
yAga yOga sAdhanai inriyE sAkEtAdhipan darishanam kaNDa
kAvEri tIrattil kanindu manamurugi dEvAdi dEvan pAvana nAmattai
dhyAnam sheidiniya gAnam sheidu pAril kaDaittEra namakkuyar gAnAmudam tanda

name: tyAgarAjO virAjitEtyAgarAjO virAjitE
lyrics: tyAgarAjO virAjatE mahArAja shrI tyAgarAjO virAjatE shrImat
vAgartthamaya bhuvana rAjOhari vAnchitArtthaprada rAjO shrI guruguha
gaNEsha rAjO samsEvita rAjAdhirAjO ajO nAgara khaNDAkhya purANa
pradipAdita rAjO yOginI gaNarAjO yOgirAja rAja shrI
kalirAhitya nagara vAsO nIlOtpala nAyikA sahavAsO ati lalita hamsa lAsyOllasO
akhilAgama shirOnuta vilAsO ati vilasita hATakAvabhAsO anEka lIlA vicitra vikAsO
raktOtpala kusumAdi vishvAsO paripAlita harihayAdi dAsO nirmala hrdaya rAja hamsO
mahA parama hamsO nishcala tatva prashamsa shashikalAvatamsash-shrI

name: ulaga vAzhilumulaga vAzhilum
lyrics: ulaga vAzvilum ninnaruL inri OraDi vaippadum eLidO Ezai
kaliyil unnai marandhAl kittumO kaivalyam marumaiyil maTTumO
dhyAna yOga japa tapangaL ariyEn satjana sangam iNangiyum aRiyEn
gAna shAstramum kaTrariyEn manam kanivilEn muruganE kuruDanEn

name: vAcAm agOcaruDanivAcAm agOcaruDani
lyrics: vAcAm agOcaruDani nI pAdamulaku vandanam onarinciti jagadIsha pArthasArathi karuNApayOnidhi
nI caritamulanu pogaDa brahmAdulakunaina taramA kAcukonnAnu nIdu krpakai nA morAlakinci brOvavayya

shrI nidAna budhArtihara dAnava vidAraNa suguNa harikathAdhara
shubhakara munihita suranuta vara mrdupAda dAna dhIra gambhIra
kAluDu konipOyina guru putruni teccunnAvu kamsuni madamaNaci vasudEva dEvakI ceranu
viDipincinAvu vAlugaNTiyaina draupadi hA krSNAyani moraliDa brOcinAvu mAlu mElani pANDavula kAcinAvu kucElunArti dIrcinAvu
kurUpiyaina kubjA vakramulanu pOgottinAvu khyAtimIra virUpuDaina narakAsuruni satyabhAmA
sahituDai duniminavu surUpulagu padiyAruvElA ramAmaNulanElinAvu nIvu karIndra vairini druncinAvu dEvadEva shrI rukmiNI ramaNa
pancAyudhadhara parabrahma hari ninu namminAnu nAdu kOrkelanu brahmAdi vandya kSipramugan
IDErcumayya krSNayyA pancashara janaka sadAshiva kavi vinutA vinutA surahita kAncana vasana kanja nayana niranjana niSkaLanka nir-dvandva

name: valaputALa vashamA (p)valaputALa vashamA (p)
lyrics: valaputALa vashamA nA sAmiki calamusEya nyAyamA
alakula vilatuni samAnuDaina shrI padmanAbhuDu nelata ipuDu nannu nirAkarincanE
shrta prAyamu nADE ciguru bONirO vAni karuNA sAgaruDani kaliki cAla nammiti
maruni bANamucA tamakuva nAmanasendO paravasha mAyanE bhAgya miTulAyanE
ilanu nA prANEshuDE mAninitO gUDi jalajAkSimiti mIri sarasa lADucunnADO
palumAru nanu jUci palukulATinadella teliyaveccinEvO celiyarO IvELa
sOma kiraNamu cAta sogasaina nintaTirEyi rAma rAma nAku ramaNi yugamAyanE
kAmakELilO nannu kaliciyuNDina vibhuDu nAmIda nunna nenarunAdi maricanEmO

name: vAmAnka sthitAyavAmAnka sthitAya
lyrics: vAmAnka sthitayA vallabhayAshliStam vAraNa vadanam dEvam vandEham
vAmana svarUpam varadam sacApam cAmara karnam shashi
shEkhara tanayam nAma rUpadharam abhinava guruguha hrdayam
aStAnga yOga vara haThANa vAdi jaya vasiSThAdi tapOdhana sEvita
gaNanAtham srSTyAdi kAraNam shrita pAvanam hEtuduStAnta varjitam
dEvatA pUjitam duSta vighna haraNam shiSTa bhakta bharaNam
iSTa phalada caraNam siSta hrd viharaNam

name: vaNangiDuvOm vArumvaNangiDuvOm vArum
lyrics: vaNangAda sUranai vIra vEl kUriTTadum vaNangina avanait-tan vAhanam AkkiTTOnai
sharaNam enru evar uraittAlum avarai aravaNaitt-AtkoLLum aruT-jyOti vaLlalai
harahara muruganE Arumukhap-perumAnE sharavaNabhavanE shrI guruparanE enap-pOTri

name: vandE vAlmIki kOkilam vANIkaravandE vAlmIki kOkilam vANIkara
lyrics: vandE vAlmIki kOkilam vANIkara vINAgAna viramata ramaNIya kUjita
madhuram varNita karNam manOhara rAghava mAdhurya cAturya caritam
ninditApa ghana nIla su-dhanum nirAgaL carita nIla gaganam
andhidAtikAnanda tapanam tat anumOdita prasanna vadanam
ati rUDhita kavitA taru sadanam aparimita kutUhala yutavacanam
daraNijA tanaya kusha lava krta anusangIta paramOnnata nitanam

name: varishai koNarndu vandArvarishai koNarndu vandAr
lyrics: varishai koNarndu vandAr shIr varishai koNarndu vandAr
tONa tangiDu mangaLamAnad kANa dAmOdaranukku rAdhA kalyANa
varishai alankAra taruNiyargaL kUTTam tAngAdu pOnadE rambhaiyargaL ATTam
murashai oliyaDakkum mozhi naghait-tETTam mOhana kaNNanait-tEDi alaiyudu kaNNOTTam
mundiri manipUvanti kuzhaliravai muttu pUnguzhaliNaitta vAsamum
mOdakamuruvi kannaTrUvi pala munadu pinadAna padumai phalahAramum
endiranadu ena kaNDavar mayanga mUndu mayangiyar AravAramum
iLamaiyavar ulagoDu avaLiyumuraviDa idu aduvena iyalAda kalyANa

name: vEl eDuttu EnvEl eDuttu En
lyrics: vEl eDuttu En nadandAi vaDivElavA un kAl piDittE paNindEn kArum ayyA
mAl aNaitta kandA mAdumaiyALin maindA pAl eDuttE vandEn pArkkap-pazhani tanil
paN tamizhAn paraman pazhamE peTrAlum enna un aNNan adaik-kETTu aDaindAlum vAdam enna
ponnaNi viDuttAi nI bhOgap-poruL taDuttAi kaNNin karumaNiyE kAvit-tuNi uDuttAi
azhagaik-kATTi veNNIr aNindu kATTi enmun ezhilaik-kATTi engum Ekan enrE kATTi
pazhamaik-kATTi pala malaigaLellAm kATTi kuzhalai mATrru siru kODu koNDAi nATTil

name: veLLI nilavinilE anda teLLa nilai tanilEveLLI nilavinilE anda teLLa nilai tanilE
lyrics: veLLI nilavinilE anda teLLa nilai tanilE kaNNan vENugAnam pADinAn uLLam
vENum vENumenru AdinAn anda vindai mukham kANa nangaiyarum angu kUDinAr
uLLapaDitAnum uyvadumAna yOga mAyai angu nADinadAna
vELai tanil nishi vELaiyum uyya vENakalaigaLum yAvaiyum uyya
nALaiyum pinnarum yAvarum uyya nADi vanda anda nangaiyar meyya
shuttip-parai tarattO maram illai tUdu shenru vara tOzhanumillai viddai
ennavenrAl shollavum vallai cinna vENugAnam anri vEronrum illai

name: vittagap-perumAnvittagap-perumAn
lyrics: vittagap-perumAn viyan peru jnAni vEda vyAsarE vaNakkam em vidyA guruvE vaNakkam
sattiyavatikkum parAshararukkum puttirarAna pulavA vaNakkam purANa munivA vaNakkam
nAnmarai vaghuttAi brahma sUttiram nAngu paghudiyAi toghuttAi
tEn kaviyAna deivika bhAratat-tirukkathaiyai migha urukkamAi amaittAi
malai malaiyAga ulagu viyakkum kalaivaLam kuvittAi lalvik-kaDalE

name: yekaDunnAvuyekaDunnAvu
lyrics: yekkaDunnAvu nA cakkani svAmi ekSuchApuni ceta cikki nE nonditi
uurakunda inka meragAdura merudhIra rArA kaugalincara
tApasAdulakuu mOhamu vaccite dhyAnamu seyuTa sAdhyamA eka
yenta vEDinA pantamElarA kantu rUpa shrI krSNarAjEndra
sadAshivuni mUdokannulalo kUDa intaTi tApamu leEdu kAdEmirA
nArImaNi nibhAda nErcaku yevarunnArurA ninuvinA gati mAkurA
pUlapaAnpupai poralucu ninnE kalasi melayuTaku valacitirA
tALajAla nI adhArAmrtamula celimitO nA kosagumurA
valaputO mIsalu tiruvutU ratani salupi asalIdercurA vyatha
dIrcarA neravercurA intilo yevarulerurA yeni nA
